title: Pleasantly Pleasant Staycation!
desc: We stayed at Grand Hyatt Singapore from 29 November to 1 December 2020. This was the first staycation during COVID-19 times, 10 months after our Chinese New Year Staycation in January 2020. Needless to say, we were very excited about this staycation at Grand Hyatt and were looking forward to it. Check-in was smooth, although the hotel was quite full during that period. Our room was on level 8. And we were pleasantly surprised that it included a living room too! We were able to move more freely in this extra space, choosing to watch the TV shows either in the bedroom or in the living room. The bathroom was great. Standing shower was nice, and the bathtub was wonderful. Quite a deep bathtub as compared to other hotels we have stayed. The location was a winning factor,

title: Wonderful Staycation
desc: For our anniversary, we chose Grand Hyatt for their location and halal Straits Kitchen. We had a seperate lunch reservation and both customer services were good. Room package was above expectation as it was big with a seperate living room and a bathtub to boot. Coupled with the Rediscover vouchers, will definitely come again. Wonderful experience.

title: Great hotel Staycation
desc: Great holiday staycation at Grand Hyatt. Room was spacious and clean. I took extra bed for my teenage son. New norm bfast buffet though with limited options. Check-in took an hour due to crowd but check-out was breeze. Great location and easy to find halal food around.

title: Conventional Stop Indeed
desc: Really great service and had a pleasant stay despite the restrictions in moving around. Staff were keen in accepting requests and are diligent. Preparations for quarantine stay were well prepared which really impressed me.

title: Classic Grand Hyatt
desc: Rooms were huge, location was excellent to explore Orchard Road, service was what should be expected from Hyatt. Room was well kept but design is a little dated. A lovely stay to celebrate my wedding anniversary. A suggestion for slight improvement - I don't think the hotel was really full so there could have been more flexibility in extending late check out by 2 hours instead of 1. Not a huge deal, but I'm sure will be much much appreciated.

title: Wonderful Experience
desc: The hotel has really good service, from the receptionist all the way to the concierge, staff members are always friendly and caring, and the condition of the room is very clean, would definitely recommend.

title: Perfect stay
desc: Customer service was good, very polite and friendly, last min asked for smoking room and a birthday cake for my husband. All was arranged perfectly for my last min request. We were upgraded to cabana room, very clean and spacious.

title: Spacious Room!
desc: Booked a night stay over the weekend. Fantastic location for shop and dine. Check in was pretty smooth (no long queues), the Filipino male staff were very accommodating too. Room was very spacious - suitable for family with young kids. There‚Äôs a separate living & bedroom area fitted with 2 TV. The bed is pretty firm for my liking, but the pillow were great. There‚Äôs a pillow menu too. The bathroom were slightly dated and dimly lit. Room cleanliness can be improved. Found food crumbs at the living area - the coffee table and TV remote were kinda dirty. Breakfast at Straits Kitchen (Halal certified) were awesome. Service were quick and impeccable throughout the 90 minutes period. Staff were very attentive. In all, stay was pretty relaxing. Highly recommended for family with

title: Best 5 Star Stay
desc: It was a delightful stay, check in was a bit slow as there were two couples in front who had issues with their check in but overall the hotel was delightful although the swimming pool was quite far and not as well maintained as expected. Rather awkward too as it was right next to the restaurant We could hear people above us in the bathroom so not sure if this is a floor issue or something

title: Experience
desc: I had a good experience with this hotel. Staff was friendly. The room is clean. The bathtub was wonderful. Toilet is great with side spray. Had a good stay with my family. I would recommend this hotel.

title: Wonderful stay
desc: Great customer Service. Room is clean, big & spacious. Fast Check-in & smooth check out. Nice breakfast with wide variation of good food. Such a pleasant stay we had.Will definitely come back again for a longer stay.

title: Good location and Friendly staffs
desc: Grand Hyatt is great location to walkabout in the morning and evening stroll. The staffs always smile and friendly even during busy days... Nearby shopping centres and restaurants nearby. Will stay again

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: Pleasant Stay with complimentary cake to celebrate birthday. Check in and check out was rather a breeze. Straits kitchen staffs professionalism was commendable but taste wise can rooms for lots of improvement especially their breakfast. Though i had a positive review on my stay one thing changed it all. Just happened to check my debit card statement and realised that i had been charged twice for deposit and only $100 debited back to my account. Had to call the accounts department as my email was not replied. Email address was given to be by hyatt receptionist and she knew the purpose too but seems that email is for general queries and need to be filtered. Had to make a call and go through the hassle to explain and wait for the money to be refunded. This is something which no

title: Clean n near to amenities
desc: Hotel room n barhroom was clean. Near shopping malls and movie cinema..Breakfast - lots of variety to choose from. Room was large with 2 TVs. Parking was free . Staff was very friendly and helpful. Overall good experience.

title: Excellent Family Hotel
desc: We had a pleasant stay at Grand Hyatt. Firstly, it is very accessible to everywhere. Secondly, the room is huge for a deluxe room. And plus point was the bidet in the toilet! My son loved it so much that he didn‚Äôt want to go home.

title: Staycaytion & Dinner at Straits Kitchen
desc: We had an enjoyable stay and wish we could stay longer. We would definitely return again! Our mothers are happy and love to return again. Dinner at Straits is nice not forgetting the sprrad for breakfastüëçüèΩüëçüèΩ

title: Choosing hotels based on their commitment to global sustainability
desc: The Grand Hyatt Singapore is the benchmark for hotels delivering a sustainable product. Congratulations must go to this team who truly deliver the promise. Sustainability is the key to a better world and Grand Hyatt are leading examples of how its done. Well done

title: A Pleasant Stay at Grand Hyatt
desc: Nice hotel. Very clean and modern. Very good location. Right in the heart if Orchard Road. Very convenient and within 2-3 minutes walk to Orchard MRT. Staff was always visible and readily available. Food spread at the restaurant was superb.

title: For my staycation
desc: The food experience was great, the room concept is very business concept and not children friendly. Can see the room really need a makeover because there are chip of peeling paint coming out. The swimming pool was ok, but a lot of fallen leaves in the pool.

title: 5 ‚≠êÔ∏ès
desc: Friendly staff. Checking in was easy. Had breakfast and high tea and food was fantastic but would be good if we are given slightly longer time to finish out food - given about 1.5hrs and it‚Äôs a bit too rush esp if you hv elderly eating with us. Other than that hotel stay was superb!

title: By far one of the best staycation :)
desc: We had a family birthday staycation and had a great experienceq. Everything was smooth from the start. The hotel receptionist that assisted us greeted us with a smile and was very efficient in checking us in. He even changed rooms for us as our assigned rooms were not ready. So we were able to check in both rooms early üòä Rooms were spacious, clean and comfortable üëçüèª Throughout our stay, we had a pleasant experience with your staff; from the receptionist to guest services and housekeeping. We would like to extend our gratitude especially to Mr Aqid. He not only assisted us with technical issues encountered after booking; giving us regular updates and making sure our staycation would go on as planned. Prior to our stay, he ensured to note down additional requests such as baby

title: Family staycation
desc: Excellent service..i was being served by a very polite and friendly receptionist.every question was answered with a smile.excellent hotel..honestly,i would wanna have another staycation at this hotel if given the chance..my sons love it too

title: Amazing stay, comfortable and excellent service!
desc: Had a really great experience staying at the Grand Hyatt; rooms are spacious and all the in-room amenities and cleanliness was on point. All staff were very friendly and helpful at every interaction I had and I felt very well taken care of during my stay. Special thanks to Royston at front desk, he always went the extra mile to assist with my requests and exuded kindness and passion for hospitality. He is honestly a gem! Thank you also to Tim and the gentlemen at the Concierge as well.

title: Pleasantly surprised
desc: We went for a staycation and was pleased at everything. The rooms were spacious and we had a bathtub. The whole room was very very clean, including the toilets. Everything was working well. The room was so spacious that there was a living area, an L-shaped sofa and 2 huge TV (one in the living and another in the bedroom. There was a door that can separate the living area and bedroom. The breakfast was superb. one of the best we had been.

title: Cleanliness
desc: Cleanliness of the room is terrible. specks of dust can be clearly seen at every corners of the room I've gotten. The air in the room was very dusty. Service rendered by check-in staff are very professional and friendly. Breakfast was the best.

title: Our weekend staycation.
desc: The check-in & check-out were smooth. The waiting time was not long. The staff that served us were polite, helpful and friendly. The room was big and clean. Will definitely come back for a longer stay. Keep it up, Grand Hyatt!

title: Awesome experience staying in Grand Hyatt SG
desc: The check in process was smooth and not hassle. Staff at the check in counter was accomodating and very friendly during the process of check in. We were able to get the room of our choice that we requested. The room was superb and exceptionally better then what we expected. It was clean, cozy and it feels nice to be able to experience our stay in the hotel. Informations given was adequate. Overall experience was more then awesome i would describe, cannot wait to return back to the hotel again, for another staycation. Really enjoy the moments here. Everything was easy and hassle-free.

title: Great stay at grand hyatt
desc: Staff is very friendly. Hotel room is big spacious and clean. Buffet spread has a lot of variety.value for money. Will definitely recommend others and it‚Äôs kids friendly. Big bathtub and tv channel has lots of channel to choose from.

title: Not recommended
desc: Long queue during check in and i was told to opt for no bathtub if i want my room to be ready right away. Upon check in the room,there wasn‚Äôt any free masks or sanitizer that was provided as per other hotels which I‚Äôve stayed before. I received a bucket of ice which they claims that I requested for it when I didn‚Äôt. The customer service agent called me in a not happy tone just to verify again that i actually requested for a bucket of ice whereas clearly enough I‚Äôve rejected upon delivering up to my room. There was no apology at all. Cake was send up at 4pm when I requested at 5.30pm. The swimming pool water was very salty and dirty,management should do something about this matter.

title: Great staycation
desc: Its our second time here. I booked Junior Suite as its spacious for me n fam. Me and family enjoy our stay there. Especially for my kids. Friendly and helpful staff too. Clean room as well. Will surely be back again

title: Friendly service, pleasant stay
desc: Very pleasant stay for my staycation with my family. Reception staff was very friendly and helpful. She tried her best and managed to get me a connecting room as requested. My family enjoyed themselves very much. Was very impressed with the cleanliness of the room even though I know this hotel is around for quite some time already. Will definitely recommend my friends and family to stay here in the future.

title: A Grand Staycation at Grand hyatt!
desc: Superb hotel, staff are really friendly. Value for money and the rooms are quite spacious and well planned. Do have a look out for Jeffrey, Jennie and Shanel at the front office, excellent customer service.

title: Old and lack of security hotel.
desc: Room were spacious but very old. My son‚Äôs eczema immediately flared up when he sat on the sofa. TV not working very well. After 10.30pm, hotel lobby have no security. No management to keep track of numbers of visitors allow per room after 10.30pm. Some rooms we passed by were smoking and making nuisance. Definitely not what I expected on a reputable hotel. Some rooms could have easily bleached the current law.

title: Noisy and unfriendly consierge
desc: Stayed for a short 1 night staycation on the 28 March on a sunday in the deluxe room. We arrived at 3pm for check in and had to queue for about 1 hour plus and after reaching the check in counter later, was told that the room is not ready. As a nice gesture, they offered us popcorns and a grand lounge waiting area with drinks and some tidbits. Got the room after waiting at about 530pm. So i had to queue again at the consiege to get the room access card and the male consierge by the name of Ayid was rather unfriendly and made the experience unpleasant. He didnt even provide the wifi password for the night stay. Room itself is great, nice and comfy furnishing, bathroom is great with a nice bathtub and shower. Bed is comfy with a nice tv. Channels is limited though. Most

title: Staycation
desc: The hotel staff were friendly and treated us well even though we are just locals. I can see that they did their best to provide excellent service. Straits Kitchen seems to be understaffed due to the new COVID buffet arrangement. More staff could be deployed to take orders from people's tables.

title: Excellent service
desc: A really pleasant hotel to stay in. Excellent customer service by the receptionist. Such a great deal via the klook apo, would definitely come back for future stays! Oh also, the bathtub is amazaaauyyyyyn.

title: Well rested stay
desc: Me and my wife enjoyed our stay and look forward to returning to Grand Hyatt. Katherine who assisted us with the check in was very friendly and welcoming. Breakfast service was very fast, even though they were very busy. All staff were attentive.

title: Review
desc: Customer hotline was terrible when I requested for earlier check in and heavy footsteps from above the entire night and the next morning. The customer service at counter was great though. There were strands of hair at the bed and at the bath tub, which were quite unpleasant.

title: Great stay at Grand Hyatt Singapore!
desc: Check in process was smooth. Great customer service by Shanel during check in. Room is huge and clean! Great hotel as it's located right in the middle of Orchard Road. Eateries everywhere. Far East Plaza is just next door.

title: Excellent!
desc: Checking in on a Sunday was rather busy, there were a lot of people but the hotel handled it pretty good üòå they were accommodating and super friendly and helpful staff ! Really would recommend this to all my friends and family ! Big rooms, good food & great location.

title: Grand Hyatt Staycation
desc: First time staying at Grand Hyatt. Hotel room is big where have separate living room and bed room. overall is happy with the hotel room. as for the toilet, it will be nice if the hotel got provide like toothbrushes etc

title: My stay
desc: Clean and nice place. Stayed at king dulex room and it awesome and spacious. Had breakfast food great. Staff very helpful and friendly. The location was also great. At the heart of orchard. Recommend this .

title: Grand Hyatt Stay
desc: Overall, we enjoyed the stay as the room was huge and the proximity was close to several malls. hence, there were abundant of food options and the room was in very good condition and my daughter really enjoyed the bathtub. However, there was abit of unhappiness with the service level at check-in. Check-in staff did not assist to arrange to help store the birthday cake for my daughter and merely said that the fridge would not be able to accomodate despite my request to check if further assistance can be arranged. However, after checking-in, i went to concierge to try my luck and the concierge managed to arrange the request for me.

title: My new favourite home away from home
desc: We booked the Deluxe King plus breakfast from Klook, so after deducting SRV, we were paying 160 (I won't add the extra bed and breakfast for the third adult) for 2 adults. If you have trouble deciding how to use your SRV, this is by far the best deal I've come across, especially if you are looking for a halal-certified breakfast. (In fact, go ahead and book before you read the rest of the review). Purchasing was fuss-free, and the correspondence with the hotel was also efficient and reassuring. Maybe it was a bit overkill, because my inbox was flooded by Hyatt (some emails were sent twice) but it's better than a certain hotel across the road (which cancelled my booking without informing me). They emailed instructions to make reservations for breakfast, and when I had trouble

title: Fantastic Stay Great Services
desc: We stayed last weekend. Hotel was crowded but their services were impeccable. We called for assistance with the amenities a couple of times and were always promptly sent. We came slightly earlier than check in. Having young kids in tow, check in was a breeze. We will like to compliment Charisce for her smiles and ensuring that all is in order for a fantastic stay. Staffs were all full of smiles despite the tight situation we noticed at the counter. We were only disappointed the next day with the lady at the fitness counter(gym). My husband was turned away when he wanted to use the gym and was told to proceed to the reception to clarify our booking name.... no idea why... Again, amazing stay and kudos to Charisce and the reception team.

title: Great service, classy hotel
desc: Staff are attentive and provided great service. They replied to my emails promptly prior to my stay and arranged for a complimentary cake for my Hubby‚Äôs birthday. Truly appreciate that. requests for added toiletries were promptly seen to. Food service during breakfast was great and staff were attentive to our needs. Room is huge and clean with nice modern styling, albeit could tell from certain parts that it‚Äôs slightly aged (tiles n windows etc) and soundproofing isn‚Äôt the best. Can hear noises from the corridor. Absolutely adore the bathtub and the generous space in the bath area. Overall a wonderful service. Thank you Grand Hyatt for a memorable stay to celebrate our anniversary and birthday!

title: Great experience!
desc: Grant Hyatt Singapore is the best hotel you should stay in during your visit in Singapore or perhaps Staycation for the netizen! Good local delights food, great facilities for shopping and etc. You should stay in order to know what I mean :)

title: Fantastic Stay at the Grand Hyatt! Everything was perfect
desc: From the rooms to the food. We loved everything! Stayed with my wife and lovely three kids. Best hotel stay so far. Breakfast and dinner at Straits Kitchen was awesome! If u need a Halal Foodie staycation, this is one of the best place to go!

title: Deluxe So Spacious
desc: We book Deluxe Room. Was so so surprise that room is spacious n bathroom is very big with Bathtub with separate Shower. Checkin was very fast as i checkin 6pm & checkout at 3pm. The hotel provide Halal Restaurant. Next Building Far East Plaza is Shopping Centre. Convienence to Shop n find Food. Bed is super king bed can fit 4pax. Room & Livong room have seperate aircon remote control. Living room with L Shape sofa n cushion. Overall stay, we family love it n definitely will return for more.

title: Great service, marred by room condition.
desc: The room we stayed, were unfortunately below expectations. It was a 2-bedroom family room. Not exactly a cheap room. The door to the main en-suite bathroom had to be forcefully pried open every time someone wishes to use the toilet. Overall, furnishings were quite dated. Giving the impression of a hotel living in its past glory. Which is a shame, because the staff is top notch. The room? Not so much.

title: Excellent hotel near heart of Orchard
desc: Had a pleasant stay at Grand Hyatt Singapore. Room was nice (albeit somewhat dated) and the food at straits kitchen was good. Always enjoyed a good swim in the morning. Pool and facility is clean. This was my fourth stay here

title: Big hotel room in Orchard Road
desc: We stayed in Room No 526 and 528. The rooms are separated and the 2 doors are far away from each other. My stay was during the school holidays weekend so it could probably be a busy period for the hotel. Pros: big, spacious rooms, with separate living area and bedroom. Bathroom is also big, with separate standing shower room, toilet and bath tub. Rooms have complete ammenities, toiletries, minibar and coffee/tea. Vicinity of hotel is walking distance to Orchard mrt station, a bus-stop and big shopping centres like Ion, Tangs and just a block away from Far East Plaza. Price is attractive for the hotel pros. Cons: Long waiting time to check-in and guests are made to stand up to queue. More than 30mins wait and another about 10 mins to be checked in at the counter. Staff are not

title: Grand Hyatt Stay
desc: Stuff are really friendly and food was delicious! Over here they go for quality instead of quantity! Everything was great except for the pool, it was abit dirty with quite a number of dried leaves on the floor. There were quite alot of ants on the chairs and hut too. other than that, everything was great, room was really spacious and clean!

title: Fab Staycay :)
desc: Was on a one day staycay but felt that i didnt wana leave and extend instead if i could hehe. The room was huge & we got the corner room :) Service was tip top, the checkin was a breeze just that maybe the flexibility of parking could be considered? Checked in at 3 plus and parked my car already in the hotel's carpark but was not given a complimentary cos i decide to go out around 7 for dinner. The complimentary was given after i checked out instead. Other than that bfast was great,varieties of food & staff were very friendly & accomodating. Definitely not my last stay at Grand Hyatt! :)

title: Staycay the stress away
desc: I loved my room. It was very spacious and cozy. Breakfast was good and we had the pool to ourselves for a good hour or so. Only wished there were towels available by the pool as my room was quite far from the pool. Overall, service was great!

title: Staycation At Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: The check-in and check-out were a lengthy queue. The room is dated , smell of smoke, we gotta asked for air purifier the next day as it gave us a headache on the first night, cabinet door was unable to close and hence the light got into the bed and have to realigned. Basin drain is faulty and waste water couldnt flow. The room condition is dated, the wooden furniture has scratch marks and the living area is not thoroughly cleaned.

title: Good hotel to stay
desc: This hotel offers a junior suite with a spacious room. The room is well furbished with separate television in the hall and bedroom. The toilet has both a shower and a bathtub. It has good facilities to serve the needs of different guests, clean and served by friendly staff.

title: A short Stay in Grand Hyatt SIngapore
desc: Check In Queue was long. Took about an hour to reach the check in counter. But there are guest realtions officer around to assist and provide some small snacks. Room Room was of a good comfortable size. The living area and room was separated by a sliding door. Bed is not exceptionally comfortable though. Amenities were adequate although i hoped there was a Nespresso machine in the room. Surrounding area Many food and shopping options around within a stone's throw. Near Orchard MRT station (less than 1 min walk ) Overall, a very good experience with the Grand Hyatt. Will visit again.

title: Excellent service
desc: Hotel room is huge for deluxe room with a hall and bedroom separated. Big bathroom with separate bathtub, shower etc. Room was clean. Brilliant service and tremendous staff that are welcoming and accommodating. We were being presented by jars of double chocolate chip cookies on arrival by Tiara and Yunus (the concierge) which was delivered to our hotel room. Thank you so much Tiara and Yunus! They provides excellent service. Check in was swift and easy. The hotel staff who attended to me at the counter named Khaterine(if i'm not mistaken) was extremely humble and cooperative too! I would definitely recommend a stay here üëèüèªüëçüèª

title: Memorable anniversary
desc: Thanks to Grand Hyatt Team. Especially to Salini Mohan & Numairah for the wonderful decorations setup. Very memorable moments for our wedding anniversary. Also the best food we had dine in at Straits kitchen for dinner and breakfast. Highly Recommended !! Shall return again in future.

title: Room was big, clean. Staff was friendly .
desc: Staff was friendly . Room is spacious and clean. Will definitely visit again :) however do expect slight delay when checking in due to cleaning and disinfection of room due to covid measure in place. Thumbs up for the great service .

title: Wonderful stay
desc: The corner room we had was very spacious with a living area separated from the bedroom, the walk in wardrobe and the beauty room. Stephanie at check in was very professional and helpful in advising us of the safety measures and requirements for pool usage / breakfast / gym very patiently. Quality of room and staff professionalism put the Grand Hyatt brand name at the top in the hospitality world.

title: Felt cheated during check in
desc: I booked a special rate 6pm check in and 3pm checkout for 3d2n and staff at the corner kiosk right outside of straits kitchen (on 29 March 5-6pm) told us that because we booked from Klook, and not directly, we cannot check out at 3pm on our last day. We were forced to check out on 12noon. This is unacceptable because everything is just 3 hours later than normal rate. Asked her what if i book a normal rate/time for 3d2n, do we have to check out at 9am then?? She didn't answer. Not a good first time experience in Grand Hyatt. üëé

title: Best for family staycay
desc: One of the best staycay experiences. Rooms are huge with partitions for living and bedroom area so you can have family bonding and not disturb your little ones sleeping inside. They even provide toiletries package for children including cute hotel slip-ons. Dinner and breakfast was amazing - prompt service despite SD measures. Thanks Hyatt for making this family vacay cosy and memorable!

title: Amazing Honeymoon Experience
desc: Went for a honeymoon as a pair of newly weds. Was served by Azizah and we were upgraded to a room better than our expectations. We were then served a complimentary cake to our room. We had dinner and breakfast at straitskitchen, which was amazing. Staff was suoer friendly and tended to all our needs. During the spa session we were serviced by rose and mia. They provided the best massage and was sure to keep us relaxed. Overall, a super pleasant experience. Would definitely return for a 2nd staycation.

title: The best ever staycations I had
desc: I recommended local or travellers to stay in this hotel. Awesome service! Brilliant place to celebrate special occasion here. Service was top of the world. The best part is, the hotel provide halal breakfast, lunch & Dinner. Especially when you dine-in at Straits Kitchen! I love the asians cuisine that they provide. Lovely!

title: Great stay at Grand Hyatt
desc: Great stay at the hotel. Room is big n everything works perfectly. Staffs are all helpful n professional. Check in n out is fuss free. Location is excellent, right in Orchard Road. Bed n sofa very comfortable.

title: Excellent!
desc: The service was excellent! The check-in process was smooth. Decided to check in early at 12pm as we wanted to do some shopping at Orchard. As expected, the room wasn't ready yet as the official check-in time was at 3pm. We were able to leave our luggage at the concierge. Had our lunch and shopping and we got a msg saying the room was ready at 2pm :) Booked the time slot for our breakfast through whatsapp . That was easy as well. Plus point is the halal dining at Straits Kitchen! Too lazy to have dinner outside, so we ordered in-room dining. Prompt service and the food was delicious! Breakfast was delicious as well. Excellent service by all the staff. 2D1N definitely wasn‚Äôt enough. Will booked a staycation again with the rest of the family. Hope Grand Hyatt could keep up with

title: Wonderful Staycation
desc: Much was expected from a known brand in hospitality, yet they exceeded my expectation. Personally i value human interaction, in this department Grand Hyatt must be very proud of their staff. From the personnel who assisted to unload my baggage, front desk and restaurant, they made the experience priceless. Kudos.

title: Grand Deluxe Room
desc: It‚Äôs a value for money for $200 a night via Klook. Spacious room with simple modern design room. There‚Äôs a living area and separate bedroom. Toiletries provided. Complimentary delicious chocolate cake given to celebrate our anniversary. Halal food served at Straits Kitchen. Accessible food eateries within walking distance from the hotel.

title: A wonderful hotel to stay in, that's GRAND HYATT
desc: Lovely and convenient hotel near Orchard Clean and quiet (I stayed on the high floor) Safe Distancing and Cleanliness of the hotel were adhered strictly to Food at Straits Kitchen (both breakfast and dinner) were splendid with ample choices of cuisine Staff were friendly and professional in executing their job...............

title: Nice place
desc: The check-in waiting time could be better manage as it is on school holidays. As it took us almost 1 1/2 hr to 1hr 45min to check-in. As it is on covid period, the SMM were all in place. Fantastic customer service

title: Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: I arrived for the check in early to avoid long queue as sch hols starts. Was attended by Jeannie (I think) she was friendly and let us check in early. The room was big and comfortable and lot of free bottles of water. Need to book swimming pool in advance and there are gym, spa, etc... Overall my family and I enjoyed our stay at Grand Hyatt. üòä

title: Amazing stay as always
desc: As a world of hyatt member, Hyatt hotels are always my first choice. Grand Hyatt never fails to amaze me everytime with its grandeur, size of room, facilities provided and the genuine attitude of staff. It was more than comfortable to stay in Hyatt, and i will definitely go ba k again. Thank you for the consistent amazing experiences!!

title: 2D1N Staycation
desc: I love the service at Grand Hyatt, they were all very friendly and accommodating to our needs. The room was very nice, however, our view was okay. We stayed at the 9th floor, and the place was amazing.

title: Highly Recommended!
desc: Had a staycation at Grand Hyatt with my husband to celebrate his birthday. The room was big and spacious. Love the king size bed and the bath tub. Service was great as well. We were given a mini birthday cake, which was much appreciated. We really enjoyed our stay. :)

title: room
desc: the room is huge can fit like more than 10. toilet is nice and clean. everything you need is there. location is good accessible. easy check in and express check out. covid protocol is done. everything went perfect.

title: Awesome Birthday Staycation
desc: Had a great 3D2N staycay with family. Pleasant surprise both our rooms were upgraded to Junior Suite. Shout-out to the accomodating, friendly & helpful Front Office Team namely Azizah, Mai, Jennifer, Tiara & Hartini. Keep up the top notch service ladies! To add, the rooms were superb! However, maybe they can do something to the product as in the bed (mattress & pillow) are kinda hard and not comfortable at all, which resulted to bodyaches. The tubs were awesomely big, I didnt even want to leave it. Visited the gym (its 24hrs), and its so clean and had alot of equipment for us to use. I would definitely come back for another round. Thank you for making my birthday staycation an awesome one!

title: 2D 1N Stay in Deluxe Room
desc: Waited for 40mins for room check-in on Sunday at 6pm which is slightly disappointing. Overall, the staff service is friendly and the room is very spacious. Location is right at the center of Orchard road.

title: Staycation at Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: Affordable room prices. Room is spacious, clean and up to date room services such as new tv receiver, with lots of tv channels to watch. Bathroom is huge and nice complete with beautiful bathtub. Fast check in and check out. Friendly customer services.

title: Excellent customer service & Comfortable Stay
desc: Love the customer service they have. The swimming pool might need some maintenance but they have an excellent gym facilities. Room is very spacious and comfortable to stay in. It does make us want to extend our stay or return back to enjoy the experience again.

title: Wedding Anniversary Staycation
desc: It was a memorable stay in Hyatt Regency Hotel. I would recommend anytime to my family and friends. Thank you Shaun for the late checkout it really helps and we appreciate it a lot. My daughter will celebrate üéâ their honeymoon in your hotels too this June 2021. Bravos üëèüèºüëèüèºüëèüèº

title: Family Staycation
desc: Great experience! Nice room to just chill.. Best! Highly recommend to my friends. Gonna try the next stay with lunch or dinner. Breakfast was not that bad but can be improved. Overall it was a great experience spending time with family.

title: Excellent Family Friendly Hotel
desc: Staycation for three days and two nights at the Junior Suite Room. Huge and clean room, spacious enough for my two toddlers to run around as well as enjoy the bathtub. The bedroom is separated from the living area that has a workstation. Hospitality is excellent. Informed the hotel at the last minute about my son‚Äôs birthday month and received a complimentary birthday cake with card! The hotel even provide bathrobe, room slippers and toiletries for kids (upon request)! The swimming pool is suitable for toddlers but requires direct supervision in case the kids walk down the stairs that leads to the deeper pool. Highly recommended and will definitely comeback. Thank you Hyatt Singapore for the awesome staycation experience.

title: Recent experience at Grand Hyatt (Mar 2021)
desc: Very pleasant experience during staycation at Grand Hyatt. Was granted slightly early check in and the process was smooth. Requested for a baby cot and it was sent to our room in no time. Prior to check in, informed the staff that the staycation was for a birthday celebration and we were greeted with a chocolate birthday cake and a birthday card. We opted in for dinner and breakfast package and were spoilt for choice. We were served with a reasonable portion of what was ordered. Special shout out goes to Mr. Shahri Buhari, Assistant Manager of Straits Kitchen. Not only did he greet us with a warm welcome, he dropped by our table every now and then and asked if our food was alright and if there were any other food that we ordered that has not arrived. As we were seated at a

title: Spacious and high class
desc: Customer service was top notch and check in was fast and fuss free! Maybe could have added abit more entertainment that are convenient for youngsters such as netflix or to be able to connect to phones.

title: Above Expectations
desc: Its our 12 years Anniversary and we have decided to stay @ Grand Hyatt this time around (last year was @ Shangri-La Sentosa) . Upon check-in, we were upgraded to a better room (presumably due to the fact that we stated to Hyatt that we are there to celebrate our Anniversary) . Within 5 minutes of settling in our room, the doorbell rang and a staff brought a cake and card for our Anniversary , complimentary by the hotel which is a wonderful touch. During our stay, we had the lounge access as part of our hotel package and we are very impress with the quality of the food they serve and the service levels. We normally have lounge access during our staycations and Grand Hyatt is amongst the best ! Room was comfortable, good sound proofing as our room was by the elevators and we were

title: A must to stay when in Singapore!
desc: Loved my stay in Grand Hyatt! I loved the spacious room, breakfast spread & their customer service! Will definitely be back soon again! Strongly recommended to my family members & close friends. Thank you Grand Hyatt for accommodating us!

title: Great Stay
desc: Had a short one night staycation over here. Spacious room. Separated bedroom and living room. Good for small gathering. Well equipped shower with toiletries provided (Balmain). Toilet equipped with water spray. Spacious bathtub to relax and soak in. Smoking room available upon request. Plenty of lots to park your vehicle. Valet parking also available. Halal food by Straits kitchen shouldn‚Äôt be miss.

title: Nice place
desc: Place for short staycation. Appreciate the comfortable room and halal dining. Good place for family and friends to gather. I like service & high floor. The ambience is nice. The food is lovely. Do come and stay

title: Lovely Stay At The Grand Hyatt
desc: We were greeted by a chirpy staff at the front desk and the entire team was helpful and accommodating to our requests throughout our stay. Breakfast at Straits Kitchen wasn‚Äôt spectacular but the impeccable service made up for it. Overall, it was a lovely stay though I‚Äôd skip breakfast if I were to return!

title: STAYCAY
desc: Its my 3rd visit in the last few mths. and the place there is so accessible. place is clean, staff and helpful and in fact they have recognised us as a family. will visit again soon. thank you for thre awesome stay! food are halal and the place is kids frenly too

title: Staycation at Grand Hyatt
desc: Had a one night staycation (room-only) at Grand Hyatt - check in 6pm & check out 3pm (booked on Klook). Had a pleasant experience. The service at Grand Hyatt was impeccable. Stayed here once before and by now, I have decided that it's my favourite hotel thanks to the helpful and friendly staff.

title: Excellent Hotel and service beyond expectation
desc: One of the top hotel on my list. A definite come back ensured. 2 thumbs up for overall experience right from checking in to checking out. Every glitch small or big is taken seriously and service recovery were prompt without any hesistation. A staycation choice with zero regrets.

title: Fantastic staycation
desc: We loved the stay so much and it was very worth it, bought it off Klook. Only setback was the TV cannot be connected to Spotify or Netflix. Did not get to eat at the straits kitchen as it was fully booked, be sure to reserve a slot in advance.

title: Lovely Staycation
desc: Although the check-in process was long, it was a breeze with many attentive staffs offered guests with drinks and popcorn whilst guests were queuing. Guests were also invited to patron few of their lounge whilst waiting for their rooms to be ready. The facilities were not crowded with guests as proper safety management are in place. Room was spacious and clean. Basic toiletries needed to be called rather than readily placed in the toilet.

title: Staycation at Grand Hyatt
desc: Room was huge, clean and comfortable. However, soundproofing was not good - we could hear people in the room above us running and stomping around non-stop. Nonetheless, the front desk was prompt in resolving this. They sent a staff to the room above very quickly, to inform them to tone down. The hotel was also accommodating to my fiance's request, and gave us a complimentary cake for my birthday celebration (chocolate cake was rich and good). Check-in process could be improved - we were given a room without bathtub upon check-in, which was contrary to the marketing on Klook's website. We requested for a room with a bathtub and had to wait 45mins past our check-in time as the room was apparently not ready. The staff also did not remind us that they had assigned us a room on the

title: Best hotel in Town!
desc: I had 2 rooms to celebrate my sister‚Äôs birthday. It was during the school holidays and despite that, the staff created a wonderful and pleasant stay. It feels like travelling abroad but still being in Singapore. Right from the hotel entrance to Front desk to housekeeping to In room dining, perfect! Katherine the Guest Experience Manager was phenomenal and a great example to her team. Perfect role model who deliver service with great passion and dedication. Sharin the Straits kitchen Manager, was friendly and professional. Great energy and positive example to his staff. Overall experience is perfect, Will definitely come back.

title: Lovely stay
desc: Breakfast was good and a comfort to know that it is halal. Shopping centres are walking distance such as Ion, Tangs Plaza, Ngee Ann City etc. The room we were staying at was superb. There is a living room area and a separate bedroom , so it was very spacious. A perfect room stay to celebrate an occasion. Overall, I am really satisfied with my stay at Grand Hyatt.

title: It was ok
desc: Too crowded. Requested for late check out (even just for 1pm), got turned down. Check out timely at 12noon, my lift lobby was full as everyone was checking out at the same time. I was on the 14th floor. Finally got on a lift, lift stopped at every level (I was on the 14th, so it stopped around 10 times?), bcos everyone was checking out at the same time. The lift lobbies on all levels were packed as well. My suggestion - make everyone check out at different timing if the occupancy rate is high - offer late check out but in batches maybe 1/2/3pm. It would be more efficient and make everyone happy. Room, service, food were all ok. Clean, friendly, nice.

title: Disappointed!
desc: Was asked to wait 1hr to get my rooms but only one room is ready after 1 hr and I have to wait for another 20 mins for the 2nd room. Wasted my time!!! Such a grand hotel with lousy service. Aren't the hotel supposed to clean up and get ready the rooms before 3pm check in time?

title: Great Staycation at Hyatt
desc: Recently did a staycation on 8 Mar 2021 with my mother, sort of a small celebration for International Women's Day. The check in process was swift and everything was settled without much fuss. The staff was great - one example was Azizah. I had visited 10 Scotts for their afternoon tea several times and out of curiosity, I asked if there was any in house discount should we dine there. I was perfectly satisfied if the answer was no, which it was. However, Azizah very kindly extended me a discount so that my mother and I could dine there, despite it not being included with my package/voucher. It was very appreciated as my mother had been quite interested in trying the food at 10 Scotts. That being said, it was Hyatt and their service is impeccable, as always. There was a very

title: Hyatt Stayed
desc: Check-in was horrible. The long queue ends up giving me aching legs & backpain. If the hotel expecting a big crowd on that week, they should have a plan to cut short the queue. The room i stayed got 'spirits' stumping, jumping, running around above the ceiling. Can't sleep well but overall I had a great stayed. Hotel looks, staff friendliness, room cleanliness, safety, breakfast were all great!

title: An excellent stay
desc: It was a warm welcome at the hotel. Staff were all courteous and friendly. Check in and out didn‚Äôt take a long wait. They even extended extra mile to make a great stay for me. Looking forward to a staycation in Hyatt again!

title: Grand hyatt hotel
desc: The hotel is clean and staff are friendly. Other than the soft pillow overall is superb. The foods at strait kitchen buffet is delicious and staff is attentive, fast and friendly. Breakfast is also delicious.

title: Very enjoyable stay
desc: We took the deluxe room and was given the room with bath tub. Eventhough it took a bit long to wait for the room to be ready, the family has been invited to wait at the lounge where drinks and snacks were served thus minimising the inconvenience of long waiting. Large room, clean and nice big king bed. The location is great - near to food places and mrt location. Planning to come back again :)

title: birthday
desc: Tv was not great as its response to the remote was low and was downgraded to room without bathtub without much prior notice. all the room doors dont have locks for some reason and although it was spacious it was harder to operate this room compared to normal hotel room.

title: Great Staycation
desc: The Check-in experience (16 March; 230pm) was great despite the long line. I want to commend Tisha for assisting my family of 6. She went out of her way to assist us. I want to express my thanks and appreciation for the service that we received from her. She dealt with the needs of the group extremely well. On another note, we love the ambience of the rooms; the location and the attitude of the hotel staff.

title: Awesome staycation!
desc: Overall, my parents were delighted with the free room upgrade to a King Suite and the complimentary cake! They were very happy with all the Hyatt staff that they interact with! Staff are all polite, friendly and efficient! Food was fantastic, service was tip top! Will come back again!

title: Disappointing stay
desc: Room was not up to basic cleaniness standard as there were pests crawling around the mini bar area. They infested the food that was supposed to be our family breakfast the next day. We had no choice but to discard everything. Nothing was resolved despite informing the staff there.

title: Facilities were good
desc: The facilities were very nice, they had pillow service and good breakfast at Straits Kitchen. Ms Ivy who served us at Straits Kitchen has a great attitude and was very attentive to our needs. We love our stay at Grand Hyatt, will come back again! Highly recommended!

title: The stay was amazing.
desc: I book the hotel for my fianc√©'s birthday celebration. When we step inside the hotel the staff greet us w a smile. We check in the room and the hotel was AMAZING. The toilet is huge. Will come back soon to stay again.

title: Birthday Treat
desc: I booked this using the Singapore rediscover vouchers so had a good bargain. Do choose the King/Twin bed deluxe room! It is so spacious! Location is excellent for shopping & dining. The fittings are a bit dated but still acceptable. Balmain toilet amenities smelt heavenly! The TV & DVD player (time to chuck that) needs an upgrade - smart TV would be nice.

title: Enjoyable stay at Grand Hyatt!
desc: Very spacious room! The living room was a plus point. Food at Straits Kitchen was not only halal but also fabulous and the staff there were awesome and friendly. Very attentive. The hotel is accessible to any of the malls in Orchard Road. It is in the heart of Orchard Road! Very convenient if you have shopping in mind.

title: stay at Grand Hyatt
desc: Was pleasantly surprised when I got a junior suite of over 500 sq feet. Room was spacious with all facilities provided. Bathrobe, weighing machine, bath tub(which we didnt use at all) Declined offer of cake for honeymoon celebration. Complimentary parking needs improvement.. Staff manning Concierge Counter not helpful.

title: Lovely hotel, good service and food
desc: Booked a stay for our Anniversary. I requested for some special arrangements and was pleasantly surprised with the quick response from Charisce of the Front Desk. She even arranged for a nice chocolate cake with ‚ÄúHappy Anniversary‚Äù wishes. She was also very responsive to my multiple emails as I had many queries and wanted to make it a special stay. Once that was settled, I subsequently called the general line to book my dinner at Straits Kitchen. However, the experience wasn‚Äôt good as I was passed from department to department. I had informed them that my reservation includes a dinner buffet but was told that there are no dinner seats available. Thankfully, after being passed to the 4th person, Ms Alice Philip took a positive approach, assured me that she will settle the

title: Excellent stay
desc: Staff was accommodating to our multiple requests and made us feel pleasantly welcomed from the minute we set foot in the hotel. Deluxe rooms were clean, spacious and very pleasant to spend the whole day inside.

title: Staycation 2 night in King Delux
desc: 1. I was informed to register between 9am to 12 pm, and the check in officially is 3pm. When we registered at 10am, we were told the waiting room is not opened, but the hotel will call me when there is available room. We hung around til 1pm, and when I approach the receptionist to check if the room is ready, he realised it is ready but we were not notified. My advise is to check with the reception perhaps hourly, else you may ends up waited for 3 hours like us. 2. The TV channels kept frozen up regularly, and it may even hung up to a minute. 3. The toilet sliding door kind of stuck and it‚Äôs required lots of effort to open and close. We decided not to report and leave it open most of the times.

title: Great accommodation option within the shopping district
desc: It was a short but pleasant stay for my family and me. We enjoyed the amenities and the friendliness of the staff. The staff were helpful and attentive to our needs while staying with a young baby. We would be happy to stay here again if given an opportunity next time.

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: Smooth check in and check out. Huge room with separate living room, cosy and comfortable. Given high floor and have nice views over Shaw Center. Love the in room coffees and teas. Like the greenery and waterfall. The swimming pool is a bit far and may not suitable for family with young children or elderly.

title: Staycation
desc: Booked Grand Hyatt through klook using the rediscover voucher, got a deluxe room with breakfast for two. Overall my experience was better that what I than expected, from the condition of the room to the breakfast. In my personal opinion, it's a good hotel to book if you are looking for a place to relax yourself and have good food as well. Will definitely come back again

title: Great guest experience!!
desc: Enjoyed the serenity at the pool despite being in busy Orchard area. Great team of staff that do their best to care for guests. Special mention to Shafiqah at front desk, and Yanni, Cel and Jennifer at the Spa, who are always welcoming and homely ambassadors. Kudos to them for making the experience even better.

title: pleasant lovely stay
desc: i had an excellent pleasant lovely experience during my stay in hyatt singapore and was upgraded to a suite while check in . thank you very much . would defintely be back again . all requests were satisfied. room dining and room service was awesome too.

title: Family Staycation
desc: Big Rooms and very clean. Worth to go. Breakfast was really good espcially when we have had not buffet for long long time Just glad buffets have come back to our life and hope for more normality soon. only improvement needed is the TV

title: Good stay, nice location
desc: The room was nice. Location is convenient. Express checkout. Only downside was the lobby area at L12 the entire carpet covering was smelly. Nothing much to do in the hotel btw. Should have amenities like kids centre for families visiting.

title: Guest of Honor - Well maintained iconic Hyatt property
desc: This was also a Hyatt Globalist Guest of Honor booking which a Globalist friend kindly helped with. A dummy check shows the price to be $266++ for a normal room, and $406++ for a Club Room for my dates. Check In ‚Äì The check in area was completely empty on a weekday at 1:30pm and I was attended to immediately. Jeffrey was all smiley politeness ‚Äì my pseudo Globalist benefits were explained, was proactively given a 4pm late check out, and I was heading to my room in 15mins. No mention of any ‚ÄúGuest of Honor‚Äù in the process though. Room ‚Äì I was accorded a high floor on level 20, Room 2017. title: A must stay hotel
desc: Grand place for staycation located in the shopping area, Orchard area. The service and standard is top notch. Given the covid period the hotel have staggered timing for guest to have their breakfast which is a well planned. Overall is a wonderful experience.

title: Staycation at Hyatt
desc: The check in process was a breeze, the whole process didn‚Äôt take more than 15 mins. The deluxe room was bigger than expected. It was clean and spacious and there was a study desk as well as my husband needs to work on the go. The staff were friendly and helpful. First time staying there and will definitely be back!

title: Great Service
desc: Fantastic room size. The interior looks much better than the exterior, which is a pleasant surprise. Centrally located just next to Far East Plaza/Shopping Centre, which has a lot of affordable food options. Great service from the staff.

title: Grand Hyatt experience
desc: Spacious room with separate living room and bedroom. In love with the bathtub as I can have a relaxation over there. I love the Balmain shower gel and body lotion provided, it smells good ü•∞ A good staycation with my beloved friend at Grand Hyatt~

title: Great Staycation with huge bathtab
desc: thanks for the stay, our room was very spacious. Check in was swift and the process of check out was also instant with the express check out. Hotel was quiet and located very centrally which made it very accessible to the shopping in the city.

title: Wonderful food and service
desc: Stayed there for my wife's staycation. Must say, the food, room and service exceeded expectations. The food was fresh and delicious with a wide spread of different types of halal food from Malay to Indian to Mediterranean options. Crowd management was also excellent, such that it didn't feel crowded even with a good sized crowd. The rooms were larger than expected, especially since we took the cheapest option. And the fact that it was in the heart of town meant that we could go shopping at a moment's notice! Service was exceptional, with every request attended to politely and genuinely. Special mention to Ms Azizah, who was attending to guest check-in on 25 Apr 21, for being friendly and attentive to our family. Will definitely stay there again for my birthday!

title: Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: Room size was luxurious. Very clean. Centrally located. Hair dryer has cool air function which suites my needs. Other than weak wifi connection and poor quality TV volume, we are completely satisfied.

title: Excellent experience
desc: Was sceptical to book hotels for staycation due to common complains of delays in checking in and checking out but my recent visit to grand hyatt was pleasant. Fast check in timing, excellent service and room was big and very clean. Housekeeping response was fast too. Very pleasant stay and i will be back

title: Staycation at Grand Hyatt.
desc: Stay was generally good. Location, facilities, service and cleanliness were up to standard. Welcomed with a birthday cake as it was one of our birthdays. Area that could be improved on was the firmness of bed and pillow. Both of us woke up with a stiff back.

title: Excellent stay
desc: Children enjoy the swim and the hotel room is clean. The staff are friendly. HALAL restaurant available. Suitable for family and staycation. Alot of nearby shops around the hotel. Safe and adhere to Safe Management Measurea.

title: Helpful and friendly staffs, great service and clean room.
desc: Excellent check-in process that was done in 10 minutes. Booked the king deluxe bedroom via Klook and the receptionist was nice enough to give us a 2 bedroom deluxe instead. Highly recommended for couples who are looking to wind down and relax! Or families who need a break away from school/work. Only downside is that they‚Äôre doing some renovation so you might hear a little noise and the pool is pretty meh.

title: Wonderful stay
desc: Stayed one night in April, typical deluxe room. Room was quite large, with separate lounge adjoining the bedroom. Check-in (on a weekday) was very pleasant, smooth and quick. Free parking (one access a day) & wifi included in the room rate. The hotel lobby, corridors and room were all very clean, well-designed. Room linen very comfy, bathroom luxurious and well appointed (no hairbrush & razor though). Nothing really to complain about.

title: Staycaytion at Grand Hyatt
desc: Buffet and breakfast were very worth it :) food was good. Room was clean and the bed was super comfortable!! Body soap smells nice as well :) Facilities were good too. Overall very pretty place and helpful staff.

title: Very nice room and good service
desc: Went there for a staycation, the room was massive. The staff helped me check in an hour early, even finding me a room with a bath. The room was very clean, with a king size bed, and the bathroom came with seperate shower and bathtub which I found very convenient.

title: Great experience!
desc: Location is just perfect, convenient to move around. Room is spacious and staff is friendly and attended. We have great buffet breakfast the next day, overall it is a nice staycation that we have so far.

title: Great staff, good service, amazing room
desc: Hotel is situated at a great location, very convenient. Hotel staff are so friendly and room service is always very prompt, unlike some other hotels. Nothing to complain about really. The room size was great for a family to stay. We were 4 in a room and it was very comfortable.

title: staycation at Grand Hyatt
desc: The overall experience at Grand Hyatt was fuss-free. The staff were polite, accommodative and responsive to our request. The room assigned to was cozy and clean. Efficient housekeeper. The walking distance to mall and transport was convenient as well. Well definitely be back this year! One of the best hotels in town:)

title: Expected better.
desc: Booked two rooms to stay with mum, sis and hubby. Check in was smooth. Floor was on the 18th, interconnecting room. Pool was ok but water was salty and jacuzzi wasn't working. Mum sprained her neck as she had a hard time climbing into the jacuzzi as there wasn't any steps. Room's hairdryer wasn't working. Mum's room aircon wasn't working well also and the entire room was very hot at night even though aircon was switched on to the lowest 18. Morning, then could feel the aircon. Not a very pleasant sleep. Pillows were too soft, no high pillows. Tv was also not working in my room and had to get the engineer to come. Breakfast was.... meh. Not worth the money at all. Only good thing was the rain shower as the water pressure was large which made it a very good shower each time.

title: The bed and pillow and curtains are really unclean and bad attitude services from the hotel staff
desc: The bed and curtain and pillow are unclean. There are several strands of male and female hairs stains and menustration stains on the bed. And hairs on the pillow. And good stains on the curtains. And they didn't change aroom for us and instead, receive negative emotions and services from the staff.

title: Clean, Spacious Room in Central Location
desc: Hotel is located along the shopping stretch in Orchard Road. Many dining and shopping options. Staff is efficient and friendly. From the moment you stepped in, to check in and all the way to checking out. Room is huge, separate living area, bedroom and a huge bathroom with bathtub. Totally awed by it and we really enjoyed our stay. Nothing to fault. By far one of our best staycations. Thank you and we will be back soon again.

title: Great stay
desc: Hotel staff were friendly and helpful. Requested for ice and utensils and they were able to deliver promptly. Check-in and check-out processes are very smooth as well. Overall cleanliness of the hotel room is great, location is convenient and the view is nice! Truly satisfied and I‚Äôve also recommended this hotel to my friends.

title: Excellent
desc: One of the better hotels I‚Äôve been to locally, and very worth the price. They really do everything they can to ensure you‚Äôve a good stay and goes above and beyond. Location is also central, right in the middle of town making it easy and convenient to get food or go shopping.

title: Staycation
desc: we were upgraded to the next room category. Lounge has a limited menu but good service. Buffet breakfast had good variety and the service was fast. We used the Gym and other facilites with ease. Thank you.

title: Nice spacious hotel room
desc: Room is huge, separate living area & bed room. Also enjoy the separate TV program. Totally awed by it and we really enjoyed our stay. Rest & Relax. The offer of the extension came too late, if not because we had plans we will definitely stay for another night.

title: Great Stay!
desc: Stayed at Deluxe King Room. The overall stay is more than enjoyable, the staffs are welcoming and warm. I‚Äôd say the best of the stay is the massage at Damai by Ibu Norani! The pool and gym is also well maintained. Loved the overall experience. ‚ó°Ãà

title: BEST staycay so far!
desc: Amazing service, from front desk, concierge, cleaning as well as during breakfast. Deluxe room was superb highly recommended! Spacious and clean. One night is definitely not enough! highly recommended, truly... Keep it up, Grand Hyatt!

title: Enjoyable and relax staycation
desc: Really loved it here. Room was spacious, staff were kind and friendly, our requests were all met. bed was really comfortable, felt like I was lying in the clouds. i did not get to try the bathtub, but the overhead shower was so good. Felt like all my muscle soreness were being washed away. overall would definitely return again. 100%

title: Staycation
desc: It was very fulfilling. Location was convenient, near an MRT station. Very nice view. Room was clean and spacious. Breakfast was amazing at straits kitchen, could've had more options for the buffet though.

title: Awesome staycation
desc: We enjoyed our 3D2N stay at the Grant Hyatt Singapore. Room is clean and the toilet is so nice with bathtub. The front dest staff is very friendly. Will definitely come again for future staycation. I love to stay in this hotel.

title: Damai Spa Experience
desc: It‚Äôs my first time coming to this spa treatment booked by my sister in law. Would really love to come back again for another healing process for my overworked body. I was attended by Mia. Friendly and great massager. Definitely skillful and knows whats wrong with your body. Thank you Mia

title: Awesome Stay
desc: Room is big for my son to run around. location is good, many shops to go. Food at straits kitchen is delicious. Hotel staff service was 5 stars. We requested from counter for smoking room & same level near with another family, request was able to fulfilled.

title: Poor service and zero service recovery
desc: Checked in on 4th April and the queue was terribly long. Despite the long queue, staffs made no effort to lessen the guests fustration. The least they could do is at least offer water to those in line. When it was our turn, the staff told us that only 1 room was ready out of 3 that were booked. We asked why and the front desk staff had no answer, only to call his mamager out. A indian lady appeared ( Forget her name) and was extremly rude. Her tone was bad and sounded like challenging us. Asked for her name card, however she said she does not have 1, and wrote her name on a paper as i wanted to send in a e-mail to complaint. By the time we got up, it was past 4pm. This was the start of the horror. Upon reaching our room, we were greeted by a stong smoke smell which was

title: STAYCATION @ GRAND HYATT SINGAPORE
desc: It was a family and birthday celebration for our foursome sisters. I chose Grand Hyatt for the warm hospitality and cleanliness, and dining at my favourite restaurants @ Mezza9 and Pete's Place. I am happy that my sisters enjoyed the spacious room, the birthday celebration for my 4th sister and the time and memories we had at Grand Hyatt.

title: Special Occasion
desc: Hotel was spacious and comfortable. Had a pleasant stay at Grand Hyatt for my birthday celebration. Would recommend it to my family and friends. Though I hope the waiting time to check-in could be improve like update guest promptly maybe. Thank you Grand Hyatt :)

title: Good customer service
desc: Due to covid19 regulations, do expect long wait for check-in and breakfast buffet queue. Overall customer sevrice is good. Room is bigger than expected. Room is clean and everything is functioning. Breakfast was delightful though ala carte.

title: Enjoyable Family Staycation
desc: Family Staycation? Book the Grand Deluxe 2-bedroom unit. Perfect for small families with 2 rooms - a king bed and 2 twin beds, and TVs in every room! Only 1 bathroom, but with 2 toilets, it‚Äôs adequate for a short stay. The separate living room is great for family bonding time!

title: A well deserved break
desc: Had an excellent stay with family. Staff were helpful even though there was a crowd building up at the check in counter.The room was clean, spacious and the food was awesome. Very accessible to the shopping belt within Orchard area.

title: Staycation
desc: comfortable 2 nights stay. we are glad that we have extended another night. though the hotel is not new and modern but it is maintained very well. everything is good. with covid 19 situation. a lot of restrictions must be imposed and this definitely not easy for the hotel staffs. room is comfortable. though I would wish the carpet can be cleaner. the table was rather dust and there's a hint of musty smell. breakfast at strait restaurant is good. most of the service staffs are very polite and welcoming.

title: Family Staycation
desc: We had our family staycation at Grand Hyatt. Experience was wonderful. The room was clean and the staff are friendly, accomodating & helpful. The location is good for shopping and a lot of eating place. We will definitely be back to stay again. Thank you Grand Hyatt. Keep it up!

title: Amazing stay
desc: Smooth check-in, staff were extremely friendly and helpful. Room was clean and huge with a lounge area. Provided 2 cakes for birthday celebration and anniversary. Pool is small but feels close to nature.

title: Have a present stay
desc: The room is big & nice. Although we were given 10th floor but a little disappointed that didn't have a nice view. Smooth check in & check out. The TV set & bath towel quality is no good. Having blur vision of TV and kids complaint the towel is rough. But overall we still enjoyed our stay & will consider to go again.

title: Convenient location for a short getaway with family
desc: We were greeted with a very long queue for check in and it definitely did put our mood down for a bit cos we had 4 toddlers running around. However, we were offered to go to the waiting room at Lvl 21 so that was def a huge relief. Free refreshments were made available for them. Those who were still caught in the long queue were given cold drinks (milo/ribena). That was very thoughtful and it did cool us down a bit hehehehehe We were lucky to have gotten 1 of our rooms at 3:30pm. The rooms were clean and tidy. It was a rainy day so we stayed indoors and got free colouring books for the kids from the hotel to keel them occupied. That helped AAAALOT. Concierge was very friendly and accommodating when we had our food delivered, even though it was in the wee hours of the morning.

title: Family staycation
desc: A 2day 1 night family staycation at Grand Hyatt singapore. The hotel is at the heart of singapore shopping area, Orchard road. Book 2 room (deluxe) twin bedded with 3rd party klook. The room came with breakfast. What i like about the Hotel is their service. From the receptionist to a restaurant (strait kitchen) staffs. All of them are fantastic. The hotel are muslim friendly. The strait kitchen served muslim food which are halal with 5 star quality. The staff are very tentative to your needs. The dinner are good. Although, the food option are limited due to covid, there are still plenty of option to choose from. NO buffet only buffet ala-cart. The hotel is old but pretty well maintain. 1 room which i got is 612 which face back of the building with no view and another

title: Excellent!
desc: Rooms are big & clean. Toiletries are awesome & value for money! The location is good as there are lots of food nearby if you are feeling hungry & would like to eat outside. Check out was fast and easy as well!

title: Staycation experience
desc: I‚Äôm very happy with the service provided.Really love the cleanliness provided and the dinner and breakfast is good....all the Foods are service very fast...Rooms are big and spacious.Bidets sprays provided which is very important for Malay culture.

title: Great hotel,bad communication
desc: Booked a stay on 1 Apr (April Fool's Day!!). Ronnie from Corneige made it very special for my daughter, delighting her with a cake. It was delicious. However the booking of the swimming pool was really unpleasant. Hartini (from Corneige) and the front check in counter mentioned that there was not a need for pool booking for the timing I wanted. However, when I called on the day itself (just to ensure), I was told that since it was a public holiday, booking was required. To ensure safe distance measures were adhered to, only 35 pax was allowed and hence the pool was fully booked for the day. After making a fuss about the pool usage, my family was allowed into the pool but I am sure the number of pax in the swimming pool exceeded 35 pax. There was more than 40 pax. Besides the

title: Wonderful stay
desc: Very accommodating staffs and clean rooms. A true sample of excellent hospitality by the staffs. We were allowed to check in earlier. My family enjoyed their stay. I‚Äôll definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Love the stay
desc: First time experiencing Hyatt. Comfortable and spacious room with amenities provided even for my baby. Provided us with air purifier easing us of any worries. Will make a return to celebrate my baby‚Äôs First birthday!

title: Superb Staycation
desc: Was very pleased with the customer service and overall condition of our Deluxe Room. Check-in staff was super friendly as well as the room service help. We even had a complimentary birthday cake which was delicious.

title: Overall Good
desc: Room was big and with a additional living room with sofa and TV. Room was very clean as well. Check In was fast and requested for high floor was also granted. Very good location. Staff was also very friendly. Would come back again soon.

title: Need to double check of charges
desc: Always have to take note and aware that what you have been charged of. We are happy with hotel stay but not unpleasant when been charged after checkout, which we are unknown off. Called hotel and they said is system error, we cannot accept the explanation with 5 stars hotel.

title: My staycation @ Hyatt Singapore
desc: Excellent room sized at an incredible price. Very good location and walking distance to other shopping centres @ Orchard Road. Check-in was fast and checkout was a breeze without the need to queue. Will return again.

title: Horrendous breakfast and check in experience.
desc: Property location is extremely good. Property is clean and well kept. However, our customer service experience is bad. No one to help with our luggages upon reaching property eventhough there was no queue at check in. Best to avoid check in at 3-4pm. We saw a long queue at this timing the next day. Breakfast was just a horrendous experience. Food is served slow. Before our first order was even served, staff have asked us for our last order. Servers not even capable of making toast. We were served burnt toast.

title: Good family hotel
desc: Good family hotel to stay with comfortable room. Service was great when check in.. Strait kitchen was great with halal food and good service..can recommend to family and friends for stay cation..will look forward next year if given voucher

title: Great value though refresh overdue
desc: The external facade looked in the tooth. Booked a club deluxe king room for my family of 4. Was upgraded on check in to a 2 bedroom club room. The interior decor was a little tired but the furnishings were well kept and comfortable. The gym was well equipped. The pool cabanas were awesome and a great place to lounge about. What appeared to be a jacuzzi did not have jets but had seating; so it was not a plunge pool either. The surprise was the large selection of nibbles at the club lounge during evening cocktails. Combined with the alcohol on offer, it was a substitute for dinner. Breakfast had an equally good spread. Service was impeccable except for a small gaffe when shiraz was served when I had asked for chivas. Must have been muffled through the mask.

title: Excellent service
desc: Checkin was fast provided top floor room without even asking provided baby cot breakfast was excellent many choice of dishes hotel was not crowded there‚Äôs space n easiness in moving around the hotel enjoy the

title: STAYCATION AT GRAND HYATT
desc: Big and clean rooms, just furniture a little old school but really worth staying there. Location is really good. Bath tub and toilet were nice. Really enjoyed my stay there. Recommended! Suitable for couples with kids.

title: A memorable staycation at Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: My wife and I went for a short staycation at Grand Hyatt on 8 April. That was the first time we stayed at this hotel. Prior to Covid, we travelled quite extensively and we have quite a good reference as to the quality of hotel accommodation and service in many other countries. So here is what we think of Grand Hyatt in Singapore during our staycation. The location is perfect, next to shopping, amenities and the MRT. The room was like new, well maintained and spacious. The smell was "fresh". The bed was nice and comfortable. The fabric of the sofa was clean and free of stain. Service was superb and staff very courteous. We strongly recommend Grand Hyatt and we are planning to go back there some time soon!!

title: Excellent Stay
desc: It was our wedding anniversary and was given a special room upgrade. Room is spacious & clean. Reception staff was very helpful and friendly. Location is walking distance to heart of Orchard shopping areas. Would love to come back again....üëç

title: Stay at the HYATT!!
desc: We had a wonderful family staycation and birthday celebration recently at the GRAND HYATT. I think this hotel has some of the best staff I have ever met- Professional, friendly and engaging. Will definitely come back again.

title: Best staycation experience
desc: I loved the dining experience. Very helpful staff and though they have been serving each table without fuss nor query, yet they portrayed professionalism and care. I would like to commend Vasu from Straits Kitchen for putting his utmost best 'performance', attitude, care, hospitality and professionalism. He deserves to be recognized for his excellent service. Will definitely be back again.

title: Great room and spa facilities!
desc: A week prior to arrival, I called them giving them my preferences of wanting a bath tub rather than a walk-in wardrobe for the executive king room and a late check out. I was told they would list it down but with no guarantee. A day prior to check in, I received an email that I have been allocated a slot for early registration between 9-11am. As we were unable to make it, I was told we could come anytime after that. We arrived at around 1ish and there was a line for check-in. We waited for quite a while as there were only two counters opened despite it being the Good Friday weekend - we checked in on Easter Sunday. Each group checking in did take a while as well. After about half an hour of standing in line, it was finally our turn. The staff at the check-in counter was really

title: Staycation
desc: Overall, pleasant stay in the hotel. Staffs were friendly and helped to extend our check out until 1pm. However during breakfast, we have to request for butter and jam as they didn't even offer to us. Normally if one is eating toasted bread or croissant, it should compliment with it. When I ordered the pancake, was surprised to be served with two mini pancakes only, was meant to be more for kids menu though, as it was not stated.

title: The hotel staff are very friendly. Overall stay and hotel ambience is really cool and cosy. The room itself is clean
desc: The hotel staff are very friendly. Overall stay and hotel ambience is really cool and cosy. The room itself is very clean and comfortable to sleep in. My family and I had a good time during our 1 night stay and we can‚Äôt wait to be back for the next !

title: Fantastic Deluxe Room
desc: Service was great and hotel buffet breakfast was served individually due to covid 19. Staff provided early check in and late check out without any request as room was available on weekday. Great and attentive service

title: Good location for a staycation
desc: Very nice ambience Nice friendly staff Neat and big spacious room Easy check in and checkout Cons Pool was not clean enough No proper lighting in the pool area In room minibar is fully chargeable( not even free cokes)

title: Classic gem
desc: The Grand Hyatt Singapore is an icon in the shopping belt in Singapore for as long as I can remember. Finally I had a chance to enjoy a short staycation at the hotel in May. It‚Äôs certainly a well oiled staff management team as its service in all aspects was just tip top! It might be an older styled hotel but its classic elegance & high standards of cleanliness in well appointed, very generously sized rooms made our stay a most memorable one. Will definitely be back sooner than later.

title: Awesome stay
desc: This is my first time staying hotel in singapire and i choose grand hyatt. The best hotel, early check in and very convenient to everywhere..will come back again . will bring my mother to stay at this hotel

title: Super comfortable
desc: The bedroom was super spacious, well cleaned, and extremely comfortable. Staffs were understanding, friendly, nice, and helpful. Check-in was faster than expected. Overall the stay was smooth-sailing and an enjoyable one.

title: Nice room. Zero service
desc: Room is nice and spacious. Very clean bathroom with strong water pressure. Check-in service staffs and operators can be friendlier. Don't order food from in-room dinning. There are better food down the street

title: Say no more
desc: Worth the price & the best thing is the location is near to everything. Be it beverages to shopping or daily needs. Just name it. It's within your vicinity. You definitely won't regret staying in an awesome hotel!!
