title: Wedding banquet at the final timeline
desc: My daughter's wedding was scheduled on 16 May 2021. On 14 May Singapore government announced tightened measures for Covid control to prohibit dining in public starting 16 May. Fortunately there is "Grandfather Allowance" for wedding only to proceed on that day but every guest needs to be tested. Grand Hyatt is excellent in helping the frustrated couple to find the resources needed and generously allows space and rooms for them to cope with the requirements. Under these circumstances, the wedding is a simple one with limited guests and my daughter has no bridesmaid to help. We are so thankful to a lady staff who attended to her all the time and helped in every detail. The bride's changing room was also tidied up timely during the whole event. These are out of expectations!! They

title: Big room and convenient location
desc: Big room and convenient location for the hotel. Just few steps to reach mall for shopping + eating. Hotel very clean and nice pool + garden , very relax place to chill surrounding. Very polite staff + helpful

title: Staycay
desc: spent 3D2N staycay w my bf for his bday with grand Hyatt and their menu was amazing! Absolutely loved their breakfast and their hospitality towards their customers. Despite covid-19 no high tea buffet, we were given the choice of vouchers to return or room credits which we preferred !

title: Great service and amenities amidst new Covid measures imposed
desc: Had a great stay at Granf Hyatt on the day new Covid measures were imposed and every staff we encountered was friendly and accommodated to our requests promptly and with proper distancing measures. Pre-booking of amenities and check in slots were fuss free and efficient. Kudos to all staff at Grand Hyatt for the wonderful stay!

title: Not as great as expected
desc: 1- Room 611 is very noisy. because the room where they drop the laundry is right beside the room. so u can her the bingbang sound and the door will vibrate badly. 2- The pillow is very thin. Hurt my neck and I do not have a good sleep. 3- The swimming pool is not as big as what shown in the picture. 4- The main phone in the living room cannot use. 5- I forgotten my access key in the room and requested for CS to assist. Called at 1130am. have to call 3x to ask what time they can send help. Help arrived at 12:02pm. by the time, the room card cannot be access because checkout time is 12pm. I also cannot extend my checkout time even when the 30min late was made by GH employee.

title: Stayacation
desc: Check in and check out process were fast and hotel was kind to give us a small little cake for my daughter's birthday. Hotel room is clean and super spacious for a family of 4. Roll away bed was given for free as we have 2 kids below 14.

title: A great stay
desc: Very good stay. It's location is very near to many amenities and malls and transport is also located nearby (Orchard mrt) which is just a very short walk away. Great friendly staff and requests were met.

title: Fantastic Stay
desc: Fantastic suite. Excellent space and bathroom. Very enjoyable 2 days stay. Check in service is relatively fast and straight forward. Due to Covid we cant dine at the restaurants, but food delivery is pretty smooth process and no issue.

title: Awesome staycation
desc: Such a wonderful experience especially for a staycation with the family. Staff charisce was extremely pleasant and helpful. We booked a deluxe room which was very spacious. We had the comfort of a bedroom and a hall area which makes it east when having a staycation with family.

title: Second staycation, awesome experience
desc: My first 2D1N staycation with Grand Hyatt left an awesome experience in us. It left us wanting more. This time, it was a 3D2N staycation but it left us wanting more. Big living room, big king size bed, big bathroom gave us the best experience we had. I'm not sure which other hotel can provide us with such an experience for such a price! Looking forward to a third staycation with them!

title: Welcoming and wonderful staff
desc: Heard great reviews on Grand Hyatt from friends and damilies so decided to give it a try. This is my 2nd visit and my family and I had a great staycation. Staffs are frindly and welcoming. Check in was a breeze as they allowed you to pre register and choose a timing to check in. It was awesome they allow early check in but due to room availability. Will definitely return!

title: Great stay
desc: Everything was great but when we entered the room it has the welcoming name on tv screen but they got my spouse name wrong. Beside that it was a great stay. Due to the covid situation choices of breakfast is still alright!

title: Huge room size
desc: The room and bed were huge and good for a small family to stay in. Pillows that came with the room was slightly uncomfortable but we requested for more pillows which were fluffier and provided more support. Breakfast selection was good.

title: Incredible Stay Experience
desc: When the government of Singapore announces the Phase 2 strict measure, we were very worried that we may not be able to proceed with our stay at Grand Hyatt. However, our worries were eased when Grand Hyatt contacted us and offered alternative choices. With the alternative options given, we chose to go ahead with our reservation. Upon checkin, we were welcomed warmthly by Jeffrey and Azizah Sulaiman. They made us feel very comfortable and we became more excited to stay at Grand Hyatt. The checkin procedure was seamless and straight forward. Thank you so much Jeffrey and Azizah for the fabulous service and checkin experience! As we entered the room, we were welcomed by the tastefully decorated room. Room smells fresh and clean. I have asthma and I really appreciate the

title: Lovely stay
desc: First time at Grand Hyatt and I had a great time. Staff were all very friendly. Special mention to Cherize and Jeffrey who helped checked me in. It was Cherize‚Äôs initiative to assign me to a room with a nice garden view and I truly appreciate it.

title: Great staycation at Grand hyatt
desc: From check-in to checkout..everything was good no delays, feel welcome staff were all helpful friendly polite room was clean and everything in working condition. Grand Hyatt made my staycation of 4day 3nights a rly great time! Would definitely go bak again!

title: Staycation
desc: Had a really lovely time at Hyatt for my recent staycay. Perfect location with tonnes of food options nearby. Expected the pool to be packed based on my past experience with other hotels for staycation. But the pool was empty except for one other guest, perfect for lounging.

title: Excellent Grand Muslim Friendly Staycation!
desc: Originally just another weekend getaway amidst a pandemic to celebrate a simple birthday, turned out to be a gorgeous stay in with loads of beautiful things to say! Excellent spacious room! Toilet is so wonderful equipped with a bidet, something that is not so usual in hotels nowadays. There is a shower and bathtub which was simply exquisite! Lovely living room and bedroom - a king bed! So delightful! The front desk staff was so nice that we felt so ‚Äòpaiseh‚Äô coz we only booked the room without anything else! Overall best hotel experience ever in Singapore so far!

title: An enjoyable first staycation for my parents
desc: 50 points for - amazing service, friendly, kind and always with a smile. even the lady who called at 7am to check my breakfast order was nice. - spacious rooms: we took a 2 bedder which was great for our party of 3A1C, my parents got a deluxe room which was almost equally as spacious. separate living and bedroom spaces, and a large bathroom. would definitely highly recommend if you have younger kids because there is more space. - pool is salt water and even at night, it was tepid so made for a great swim. - pool booking slots opened a week before your check-in! - 50% off room dining, we had breakfast one day and it was a decent hotel breakfast. $70 for 2 American breakfasts and 2 kids‚Äô meals. The pancakes was quite a let down though, thick and dry. - a downside of doing a

title: Great stay!
desc: Hate that i missed taking photo of the room that I stayed but nevertheless my baby and husband enjoying the stay as much as i did!! I had King Deluxe Room throughout my 3 days 2 nights stay over at Grand Hyatt Singapore. And I had the best time spending time with my family there. Staffs were super friendly & helpful during my stay there. The staffs that attended to me was Concierge: Fadzlee, Zakiah, Fadzrul Front desk: Shafiqah, Catherine & duty manager Jennie Platon Best service ever! Would definitely come back!

title: Big Rooms!
desc: The room that was booked is king Bed Deluxe but one thing for sure, calling it a room is an understatement. It was more of a junior suite. What greeted us when opened the door was the living space; furnished with a work table, a sofa and a 42-inch flatscreen television. Very spacious, it‚Äôs ideal to entertain any more guests if you have. This time, I brought my siblings along! So the space is really enough for all of us. Television wasn‚Äôt a smart TV, unlike the ones that most branded hotels are using. I have my HDMI cable with me all the time so this really isn‚Äôt a problem at the moment. I wrote a full review and compliments on my blog. You can find the link on my TripAdvisor profile. Feel free to read!

title: The One and Only Grand Hyatt
desc: The Hyatt personnel were extremely attentive to our needs during our stay at Grand Hyatt. Special thanks to Kavind at The Concierge who made it a point to present our 21st year old daughter with some Hyatt delights (cake wine and chocs) Kudos to a first class service. Well done!

title: Best eve-raya staycation ever!
desc: Managed to get the last connecting room over the counter. The customer service were very accomodating to our needs. The room is immaculate and spacious! Such a good offer for rdv voucher! Will definitely come back here again with or without the voucher promotion! :)

title: Nice and big room.
desc: Had a nice and big room. Had a bathtub and a complimentary birthday cake. Room were well maintain and overall have a nice stay there. Had a 50% on my meal for room service. Would definitely come again.

title: My best hotel stay in SG so far!
desc: It was a birthday staycation and I‚Äôm so glad that I chose Grand Hyatt! It‚Äôs one of the most affordable hotels in SG that comes with good amenities and is very spacious. I liked how I was given a room with better view and that it came with a bathtub as well! The staff even wished me and gave us a bag of cookies which was so lovely! I also liked the fact that they have different check-in timings, mine was at 6pm so the entire process was so smooth, no queues and no hiccups at all! All the staffs there were so friendly! I would definitely choose Grand Hyatt again!

title: Great Stay
desc: Check-in was seamless! Excellent customer service. The room is clean and spacious. The bathroom is big and we enjoyed the bathtub. Overall a great stay, will definitely come back. Pillows could be comfier, but other than that, everything else was near perfect.

title: A good option for staycation
desc: Had a good staycation with the family for our Hari Raya celebration. Hotel rooms were clean and spacious. Staff were friendly. Location of this hotel is definitely one of the plus points. Wouldn‚Äôt mind staying there again for our next staycation.

title: Customer Support
desc: I have not even begun my stay and my blood is curdling. Let me start with: 1. Telephone operators - their "tone" when handling calls is more like "what do you want" rather then "How may I help"; 2. The reservations team- I dont know where to begin. Since my first contact I have been through more than 8 people and still counting....... via email. When I choose to call, I am placed on hold and the phone drops conveniently not once but 3 times. Now that all 3 ladies have my reservation numbers, lets see if anyone of them would take the initiative to call or email me. 3. If the management is bothered to improve, best they check their phone logs and calls to ascertain what is going on, improve and perhaps have a productive team to keep customers. I am holding my breathe to what is

title: Perfect staycations
desc: Worth the stay for 3 days 2 night. Everything was good and clean, child friendly too! Staffs was friendly and polite! Smoking room comes with balcony as we were lucky enough, room is cosy. We will be back soon!

title: Amazing stay at grand hyatt
desc: i was pleasantly surprised by how large the room was. i had contacted them in advanced as i was celebrating my boyfriends birthday and they prepared a cake for him. They were extremely patient with us when attending to our room service needs. really highly recommend this hotel.

title: Value for money.
desc: My first impression was already good when served by the fronted desk charisse, her interactions with the guest is really with pure intention of giving us what we deserve. iIfelt at home and every request was granted. She explained everything . Housekeeping service is also superb and they make sure everything is perfect. Will definitely come back. Will definitely comeback.

title: Best hotel ever!!
desc: Upon check in, We had a warm welcome by Ms Charisee, she was attentive, friendly and went the extra mile by providing us a complimentary birthday cake & a better viewing room. She made us feel very welcome and it was a great start to our staycay. Even the housekeepers were friendly and paid attention to our needs, there was a Chinese Female housekeeper who remembered our room number, greeted us daily and checked if we needed any help. The room itself was FANTASTIC. Spacious, had black out curtains, almost soundproof and the most importantly, cleanliness of the room was top notch. I would definitely recommend this hotel to my friends & family!

title: Enjoyable. Will come back.
desc: Loved the spacious room, especially since i have a crawling baby with me. Tv worked well, beda was comfortable, loved how big the toilet was as well. Booking of pool was easy. Enjoyed the breakfast spread, very pleased with it. Only wished that it could have been extended on Sunday when the new measures came in. Didn‚Äôt like the price and what was offered for the in room breakfast dining. Just that the room / hotel is quite dated. Perhaps a renovation to the pool is needed.

title: What an amazing room.
desc: beautiful hotel with beautiful rooms. my room didnt have a great view (it was very closely facing another building), but as we stayed in with the curtains drawn most the time and our gaze fixated on the giant TV which we hooked to our laptop (bring a HDMI cable if you'd like), it was not a problem for us. HUGE room with a living and working space which helped greatly as I worked from the office for a bit, and it felt so wonderful to have such a big space. The bathrooms were top notch, clean and roomy. It was nice to live in bathrobes for 2 days before returning back to our daily lives. The hotel offered a $100 extension to check in early which we obviously gladly took. p/s. scan the QR code on the table to look at the compendium and see the types of pillows that are available.

title: Great Experience
desc: Stayed in the Deluxe room for 2, for 1 night. Room is very spacious, bed was comfy and big. Bathroom was amazing, comes with bathtub and separate shower. Toilet is separated from shower and bathtub. Had a great time!

title: Nice staycation experience
desc: Excellent location near Orchard road. Offers different hours to help reduce check-in time and cope with safety measures. Very spacious deluxe room with renovated bathroom and 2 large TVs <<accepting USB drives>>. Floor sound insulation not the best though. Breakfast selection was good, time booked in advance, a bit of queue at the egg station. Staff was nice at all steps. Special mention to Aina at the restaurant for her attention, speedy work and big smile. Recommended for staycation, good deal.

title: Family vacation at Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: The guest rooms were nice and spacious. The food at Mezza9 and Straits Kitchen were good. Oasis BBQ was not value for money - $S$68++ and we did not get quality food and also very few variety. Food did not taste good. All 4 of us who went though the same.

title: Clean room and friendly staffs. A good staycation place
desc: The room is clean and spacious. Staffs are friendly and approachable. From check in to dining to check out, it is a smooth and seamless process. They make the guests feel welcome. The Straits Kitchen has full variety of local delicacies. The foods were delicious. Wish we had extend our staycation for more than a night.

title: Love it!
desc: Stayed at Grand Hyatt for my own personal staycation. Love how the rooms are clean and beautiful. Location is good as it is only around 5 mins walk from Orchard station and hotel is located in town. Thank you to Fateha for being nice and checking us in as well! :)

title: Great service in Grand Hyatt
desc: Was a great staycation at Grand Hyatt over the weekend. Fateha from Front Office noticed that it was my fiance's birthday staycation and she very kindly assigned a room with bathtub and early check-in upon request. Complimentary birthday cakes were given to us during the stay and while we were dining at Straits Kitchen. Room was clean and well kept. Very pleasant stay overall!

title: Great room!
desc: It was a good stay. We enjoyed the pool, breakfast and of course the room. We got an upgrade to the corporate suite room which was very spacious. I would be coming back o grand Hyatt as everything I want is there. Good food, location, room and good family experience.

title: Great Staycation to Relax and Recharge!
desc: Made used of SRV to have a quick Relax and Recharge Staycation with my girlfriend. Having stayed at Hyatt Regency Naha and Seragaki Island 2 years ago prompted me to choose Grand Hyatt Singapore this time round. The other factor was the Rendang! We had bought the Rendang Bento Box during the COVID period and I just could not forget how good it tasted so we decided to book 2 nights including Buffet breakfast and dinner so that I could eat the Rendang again and it tasted just as good! Hope to be back again for another Staycation with Rendang!

title: Best hotel service
desc: If you are looking for a responsive hotel, Grand Hyatt would be the one. Room was kept in tip top condition and all equipments (TV and other amenities) are superb. It's makes my stay with Grand Hyatt a memorable one as the staff are friendly and smile ready. Location are easily accessible. Would love to go again in near future!

title: Great service by Aqid and Hartini
desc: Upon checking in, there was a miscomunnication on my room due to third party bookings. But Team leader Aqid and Assistant Manager Hartini took over and went an extra mile to resolve it and ensured a smooth transition to my new room. Amazing service by them. Grand Hyatt, you have 2 staffs who embodies the value of your organization. They do indeed CARE for your guests. Keep it up!

title: Awesome hotel
desc: Must say the staffs Jeffrey and Tisha are friendly and helpful . Service is awesome , room was clean and spacious .Overall stay in The Grand Hyatt was amazing. Would highly recommend this as a getaway .

title: Spacious rooms, excellent F&B options in the property and friendly staff
desc: My wife and i checked in for a staycation at the property. The room was spacious and cleaned well. Check-in was pretty easy too and staff were friendly. Would definitely recommend staying here. Thanks!

title: Staycation
desc: We had an excellent time at Grand Hyatt celebrating Mother‚Äôs Day with the family. From check in to check out, everything was seamless. The rooms were nice too! Kudos to the staff for making our one night stay a great one!

title: Staycation with family
desc: Its was my 3rd time staycation at Grand Hyatt Singapore. Each time it was a very pleasant experience. Clean room.. Having a friendly staffs are one of the reasons why i choose Grand Hyatt Singapore. They are there always to assist you. Their food is like WOW!!!!.. I always love their laksa... Thanks Grand Hyatt for having me and family for our staycation during pandemic period.

title: Not great. Not awful
desc: Came with family. Check-in took nearly an hour, hard to get info on restaurants bookings and online tool didn‚Äôt work properly. Breakfast was not what ordered & way overpriced. Pool and room was nice though.

title: Awesome stay!
desc: Room is clean and spacious, facilities well-maintained and doesn't feel like an old hotel. Staff are friendly and breakfast as pretty good. Suitable for business stay or family vacation as there is a living space for you to work or spend time with family. Location is very convenient

title: Very Good Experience
desc: Food at Straits Kitchen is nice with more varieties of asian food. Very impressive. Breakfast is also very nice with wider array of asian food. Wish there's nasi lemak as well. And the roti prata should not have sugar.

title: short vacation in grand Hyatt
desc: staffs are all very polite and friendly ensuring your stay is pleasant and well taken care off. Hotel is very clean and neat. Very good meals available at the hotel restaurant Straits Kitchen.. Locality of the hotel is very good and close to shoppings mrt station restaurants etc

title: One night stay
desc: Room was big and quite value for money since it comes with a big lounge area and bathtub and shower as well. However for a five star hotel in comparison with others in Sg it definitely has room for improvement. The hotel overall hasn‚Äôt upgraded much digitally and the devices like TV and even speaker were of shabby quality. Ultimately the hotel staff were prompt in service and made the stay pleasant overall despite the initial hiccups of allocating a bad room that was not prepared beforehand. But their follow-up was greatly appreciated.

title: Large room and v good location
desc: Very large room, came with a separate living room. View was not the best but excellent location in orchard. Swimming pool was abit old but still okay. Near the MRT and between lucky plaza and far east plaza. The bed was large and very comfortable.

title: Foodie stay
desc: I stayed in a deluxe room for 1 night with dinner and breakfast. Room was big and clean. Bed was king size and comfortable. Hyatt contacted me before my stay and i was able to do my dinnet, breakfast and pool booking. My special request for extra bed was promptly met. Food at Straits Kitchen was slightly dissapointing. Very few vegetable dishes. No expensive items for the price.only good thing is free flow of drinks. The drinks were good. Overall it was a memorable stay. Thank you Hyatt.

title: Staycation
desc: We stayed for 3 days 2 nights to celebrate our anniversary. Room may seems old but it was really huge. We did experience noises from nearby rooms on our 2nd night but the assistant manager took note of it and did a great service recovery. We appreciated that they took note of our feedback really promptly and even followed up with an email to us. Their service is really üëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèª

title: great stay with family
desc: have appreciated the safety measures put in place by the hotel and its staff to generally help guests be safe from this pandemic situation. Nice amenities and availability of toiletries for the children too. We like the fact that the hotel is generally well staffed and the lobby crew are actively on the lookout to help us.

title: Great hotel that offers better service than most highly rated hotels in Singapore
desc: Great hotel that offer better service than most highly rated hotels in Singapore. Hotel staff are very friendly and accommodating. Hotel room is clean and we felt very safe and assured with their COVID-19 measures in place. Highly recommended.

title: The stay is good
desc: Hotel room is spacious, have bathtub. Hotel area is convenient to have lunch and dinner. Have smoking room also. Hotel staff is friendly too. Express checkout is so convenient. The price is worth for the staying.

title: Overnight staycation
desc: The room service were very prompt and accommodating. There was a clip that was not properly dispose of from the previous guest which made us a little paranoid if the room have been properly cleaned up. The TV needed some fixing of the cables which the technician help us to do so.. just hope that there will be a check on the cables as it took some time. The pool side was not well maintained, water was weirdly salty and there were mouldy surfaces.. collection point of towels were not at the designated place (likely due to covid) so we had to walk back and forth - we had to go a distance to collect the towel and drop it off at the collection box and then walk again towards our hotel room.

title: 2nd visit
desc: Second visit to Grand hyatt. 3 stars because reviews on the hotel was great for their birthdays however, it was my birthday but staff didnt even wish me upon checkin and nothing as small as a cake was given to me or anything which made me feel not noticed Other than that, room is great and clean. Thank you

title: Great Stay
desc: Clean and comfortable stay. Service was excellent by all the staff. A great place to stay with family. Food was great. Pool and amenities were plenty. Even its during the covid period, we able to enjoy it

title: Excellent stay!
desc: Enjoyed my stay here. Staff was amazing! Professional, efficient and responsive. Room was clean and neat. Managed to get a room on a high level and the view was pretty calming at night. Bed was nice and bouncy!

title: leisure
desc: Daughter called front desk to inform them on our anniversary stay and was surprised with anniversary cake from hotel. Nice Gesture. Appreciate. The chocolate cake was nice and moist and fresh. Thank you for taking the time to make our stay comfortable.

title: The best customer service I have ever had
desc: Thank you Nadirah and Cherish for everything you had done. I love the service and my family really enjoys it very much. My children loves the swimming pool and my mother in law loves the room. We are indeed happy to come again.

title: Fantastic stay at Grand Hyatt Deluxe room!
desc: Very spacious & clean room. Amazingly friendly & polite staff, from concierge to reception to housekeeping. Central location with great access to major shopping malls & eateries. Will definitely go for staycation at Hyatt again!

title: Feedback
desc: i have an unexpected wonderful bday celebration at Hyatt. I booked the room through Klook and was being served during check-in by Fadilah. As i urgently need to go for other appointment, i've requested for early check in and she show empathy by letting me in the room earlier. I was given the corner room with the street view.The room is spacious and i get more than what i paid.Bed was comfy and best of all the bathtub was big and looks clean. I was also suprised by the small gesture when i was greeted with a birthday cake and jars of cookies after returning back into the room later at night. There's a small note with a birthday notes and written by Zakiah.The personal touch arranged by her just lit up my Grand Hyatt stay experience . Night staff counter Ireen was worth

title: Great Hotel Experience and Birthday Staycation
desc: Celebrate my daughter 3rd bday with wonderful celebration with family and friends. I booked 2 rooms under Jr suite. I feel so amazed with the staffs there. They are so friendly and have a very good customer service. They even give a complimentary bday cake & cookies and late check out. Thank you so much and please continue with your great services to all your customers. I would like to give Compliments to the staff that assisted me during my stay, Concierge: Fadzlee,Zakiah and Fadzrul Front desk: Fadillah, Catherine & duty manager Jennie Platon Housekeeper: (i couldnt remember auntie name working on 25-27 jun. Please input her name coz she is very good. i left my things there and she pass it to my good friend. thank you auntie!)

title: Perfect!!
desc: One word to sum up or stay... perfect! From the guests services who accomodated to all our requests, to the huge almost suite like rooms, to the delectable halal dining, to the gorgeous swimming pool... all top notch. We definitely enjoyed our stay!

title: hotel experience
desc: hotel was in a very condition and spacious. however we only manage to get our room at 4.30pm. we previously also asked for a complimentary cake to celebrate my mum's birthday however it was missed out.

title: Bad Customer Service
desc: Check-in was delayed by 3 hours. Left cupcakes at the concierge counter and they were destroyed because staff dropped them. Staff was not apologetic at all. Really bad experience though we went there for a celebration

title: Spacious and great priced staycation at Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: I stayed at room 838 which has a living and bedroom. Very spacious. Include bath tub, shower and separate toilet. Location is fantastic as near to shopping and food and cinema. The rate is very good at S$200 a night and i stayed 4 nights. Clean. However, i didn't have meals in hotel.

title: Great stay!
desc: Loved the stay - staff were friendly and even offered a free upgrade. Went for a birthday celebration and got a complimentary cake - which was extremely decadent and tasty. Thank you! Would love to stay here again.

title: Awesome Rooms & Service!
desc: Absolutely outstanding hotel perfectly located in town. Helpful, friendly staff like Zakiah, Jefreen, Ireen, & Fazrul who go above and beyond for a smooth check-in & entertain our needs whenever we gave a call to the reception. It was a birthday surprise for my husband during our stay, which we had not mentioned, but they obviously saw that at the check in. It was a lovely suprise when they came & surprise us with a lovely pastry from the kitchen to our room! Also an excellent breakfast buffet. We will definetely come back with friends and I would highly recommend this hotel.

title: PERFECT AND WONDEFUL HOTEL
desc: Perfect location, amazingly clean and huge room. Service were superb even before I checked in. Staff were efficient , friendly and great services were provided. Not forgetting they were helpful and friendly. Great facilities and amenities. Will come back again.

title: Perception Change Towards Grand Hyatt
desc: I had bad experience during reservation and had late check in but their reception teams made it all worthwhile. I was given late check out and complimentary of extra bed. I was also given free upgrade & my request to connecting rooms were fulfilled. Children enjoyed their stay throughout and i managed to do my online business while on staycation and the kids were occupied in the other room. Their service teams was efficent and fast too. Fully recommend especially when you want to get around in town. To get food are just walking distance around the grand hyatt.

title: Superb
desc: Thanks to the Grand Club team lead by Ken, we felt that we are truly at home as we are well taken care in every aspects. You bought us so much laughter and at times near to tears, laughing. Thanks Ken for making the right decision to move Grand Club services back to the lounge on 21st floor. The superb soup your team served everyday ‚Ä¶. I can feel I looked younger now after drinking all your nourishing ‚Äúhome cooked‚Äù soup. Big thanks to Ken, Norman, Jun Her, Careen, Peggy, Dylan (from SQ) and all others from the Grand Club. Thanks to the concierge team lead by Faisal. Faisal, you are extremely helpful and I can feel the warm from your services.

title: Great stay in Hyatt
desc: Overall, we are pretty much happy with our stay. We would like to spend our time again in Hyatt. We love the generous room space , the food in Straits Kitchen. The time with the family is well spent. We would like to applaud the service rendered by Mr Osman from Straits Kitchen. He made our day! We pray for his best of health. Kudos to Hyatt for having a long service staff like Mr Osman. Front desk was great too (we are unable to recall the name of the staff). She is very helpful during our checkin. Oh perhaps the TV could be better. A smart TV (that allows us to beam apps from mobile devices) will be good as the kids loves to stay in the room and watch their movies on Netflix/Disney/Apple TV app.

title: Staycay slay
desc: Room was huge and great for family. Location was awesome. Express checkout was helpful. Swimming pool had shallow parts which is good for little children. City view was ok. Bathroom was really nice and big and bathtub was used with the bathing salts provided.

title: One of the best staycation
desc: We loved the huge room with the adjacent living area and the bathroom. The only downside was the view from the room and the pillows were too flat but the king size bed was awesome. Didn‚Äôt manage to use the gym due to restrictions and had breakfast in the room.

title: Great location, great staff and amenities
desc: Booked Grand Hyatt on the day of the check in via Klook. Check in at 6pm and to check out at 3pm the next day. Jennifer checked us in, we interacted with her and even though we did not request fr a smoking rm prior, she managed to assign it to us based on our last min request. She even called us personally an hour later to let us know our rooms are ready. The room is huge and there‚Äôs bathtub and bidet! Love hotels with bidet. Overall stay was amazing. Will definitely come back again!

title: Wonderful stay
desc: Great staycation at the Grand Hyatt Sin! Check-in was a smooth and pleasant experience with Chrarisce (sorry if I had misspelled your name!) and you can feel the warmth from her service. The room was in good condition and it‚Äôs very spacious, it‚Äôs a pity we couldn‚Äôt stay longer. Only thing unpleasant was the stomping sounds, coming from our room above in the middle of the night, but that was taken care of swiftly when I rang the Guest Services. At check-out, Tisha was again very warm and patient with me. She definitely went beyond expectations to ensure her guests are happy. Thank you for the wonderful experience despite the unfortunate Covid situation!

title: Staycation
desc: Great hospitality, staff are warm and friendly especially Charisce, Katherine and Faridah, always smiling. Rooms are spacious and smelling fresh. This was our second time at this hotel for this year and would not think twice about coming back. Room service menu was fantastic and offered great discount. Thanks again for the excellent service!

title: Staycation in SG
desc: Enjoyable staycation as the borders are mostly closed. Large and clean room, suitable for both leisure and for work. Internet connection was stable and working. Staff were friendly and helpful and assisted even at 10pm when nephew threw up.

title: The best stay during thos Covid 19 pandemic.
desc: We enjoyed ourselves very much eventhough is just a night stay. The procedures for the pandemic is well arranged. The best part was having the pool by ourselves coz we booked from 8am to 9am. I don't think we will ever experience this scenarion again in future. A memorable stay for us.

title: First and probably last stay at Grand Hyatt
desc: So I was previously a long stay guest at Sheraton Towers and was given the option to stay at this Hyatt property as Sheraton had to be converted into a full quarantine facility. I thought Grand Hyatt should be fine and of equal standard, boy was I wrong! The first room I was given was a dingy musky room by the lift with a "city view" facing a depressing concrete air well and algae growing on the walls... after complaining, I was given a slightly better room with a partial garden view. I thought things can only get better from here but again I was wrong. I was just told that because I'm a long term guest, they will only clean my room once a week!! They won't even clear my trash or give me fresh towels daily?! OMG, what kind of a 5 star property is this? Look I get that the

title: Excellent service by Concierge Kavind Bala
desc: Kavind very kindly arranged for a complimentary birthday cake and ensured that the bottle of wine I ordered as a birthday surprise for my friend was all ready and waiting in the room when they checked in.

title: Excellent Service and Location
desc: Although the property is a little dated, the rooms were spacious and very clean. Excellent location, everything u need for a staycation is there, cinema, supermarket, good food and public transport. Far East shopping Centre is just beside which hosts many nail, lash and massage joints. Perfect itinerary for a short staycation!

title: Unique holiday
desc: Opt to do a holiday on home ground.choice of Hyatt hotel planned by my daughter was perfect.Hotel surprised us with a mini birthday day.Ambience is as what a hotel as grand as this welcomes us-grandeur. 1st time seeing a room where aircon temperature is adjustable.Though food was done as dining in,we love the presentation of it. If covid19 is still ongoing, maybe a suggestion of better TV channels is a good idea. All in all, it is a super comfortable stay. Being in Orchard too, no doubt shoppers haven. Thank you for the great experience.

title: Overall satisfied
desc: The room is spacious. The TV is supported the HDMI so my boyfriend brought along his xbox so we can have movie session whenever we have free time. During the lockdown period, we enjoyed 50% off for the room dining service. Pleasant stay and we have stayed total 4 nights with Grand Hyatt. Walking distance to Orchard.

title: Staycation @ Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: I made the bookings only a few weeks prior to the actual date and everything was being processed efficiently. The ambience of the hotel was very welcoming and the staff were kind and friendly. The amenities were of good quality and well taken care of. The food was good as well and I had no complaints whatsoever. Thank you for the wonderful stay and I hope to experience it again soon.

title: Impressed with the services!
desc: Staffs were all well trained and very polite and friendly! From checking in, to meeting my needs and even checking out! Room was huge and clean! They even provide all toiletries. I‚Äôm glad I choose this hotel for my girl birthday! Awesome team!!

title: One of the best hotels I've stayed so far in Singapore
desc: Every staff that served us were lovely, from the personnel who held the door at the entrance for us, the staff who took our temperature, the personnel that guided us to the check-in area, and the lady who did our check-in seamlessly, informing us of everything that we needed to know and catered to our request to the best of her ability! Really wanted to highlight the housekeeping crew who refreshed our room for us, it was spick and span when we got back and the personnel (an Indian man) who delivered our room service dinner who was nothing but warm and polite really added on to our already positive experience. Please relay this message and commend your staff for me! <3 10/10 would recommend anyone to come here and stay once in their lifetime at least. Looking forward to my

title: Smooth and pleasant stay right from the start of booking to the end
desc: We got a very early start by checking in at 9 am, the front-desk staff, Charise who attended to us was pleasant and welcoming. Requests were attended to very promptly and the room we were given was spacious and best part is our request for a bathtub was accommodated. Breakfast was decent considering that we could only have in-room dining. The swimming pool was also nice, water was warm not chilly cold at all! Grand Hyatt is worth our staycation!

title: Laundry services
desc: I must insist that the level of laundry services is expectedly low for a 5 star rated hotel since they did not follow as per instruction indicated in the form and the fact that my handkerchief went missing

title: Hyatt Couple Exprience
desc: Stayed during CB Phase 2 HA. Its to celebrate a specia ocassion. The chexk in was a breeze. Staff were friendly n courteous. Requested if possible smooking room, and was given. The room exceed our expectation. The bathtub able to fit 2 pax ! Its soo nice and the amentites were all Balmain Paris

title: One Night Experience
desc: The staffs are very friendly and smiley. Exceptional and thoughtful service to have arranged a chef‚Äôs choice of cake and birthday card for my partner upon knowing we are using the hotel for the celebration. The food is great with attractive discount promotion. Room is spacious, clean, and comfortable. Highly recommend Grand Hyatt hotel for anyone who are searching for a nice hotel to stay.

title: restful family retreat
desc: Spacious grounds with lush landscaping and large rooms made larger with interconnecting doors. Special thanks to manager Jennifer for her assistance from early check-in to service recovery for smoke tainted room. Looking forward to return and experience your full range of amenities post lock down.

title: Nice Staycation
desc: Love this place. Check in by Katharine was quick and she was very friendly. Room is very spacious and breakfast spread is awesome as well. Much thanks to Hartini for preparing the amenities for my friend & I, we will come back‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Great staycation experience at Grand Hyatt
desc: From check in to room service, everything adds up to a great and wonderful experience. The check in reception staff Jennifer was very professional. We had interconnecting rooms and makes everything much easier. In room dining was good too, especially with the great discounts offered during this period. The location of hotel is good as it is near to amenities eg transport, shopping, food. Overall definitely a superb experience and we definitely got a good deal for such spacious rooms.

title: Great Hotel & Friendly Staff
desc: Serviced by friendly counter staff, Tisha, with great hospitality. She is accommodating by making an extra mile and effort to approach her manager regarding our requests for high floor with scenic view as well as the possibility to swap the dates for breakfast dine-in. The room is spacious and spectacular. The furnishings are properly staged and appealing. My family really enjoys our staycation in this hotel.

title: early check in
desc: Grand Hyatt will send you a email before you check in to have a choice to book in early My partner and I chose to do so and got a slot to book in at 11am-1pm while usually normal booking in timing will be 3pm upon arriving at 12pm, staff told me that our rooms will be done in about an hr time and a text msg will be sent once our room is available we then to go out for lunch and after 1hr later we came back to the lobby to wait for a while more a1.30pm and our rooms are not ready yet I went back to ask the staff which then told me it be for another 30mins and we have to wait for the text msg to arrive waited for almost an hr which is then 2.20pm which I then chose to verify with the staff again asked me whether I received an Sms, I replied no but then told me the room is

title: Nice and huge room
desc: We booked a deluxe room. It was huge with a separate living area. The breakfast served came from the halal kitchen which is good for us. The pool is nice. Not able to use the gym due to the current Safe management measures.

title: The best hotel that has smoking rooms.
desc: The reason why I keep coming back to Hyatt is that it has smoking rooms. Though it is clearly stated as smoking room, the room does not have that cigarette smell. Do remember to indicate your request before your check in.

title: Good service, comfy bed but bad sleep quality.
desc: Sound proof is quite bad. Although I enjoyed my stay, I had a disrupted sleep throughout my 2 nights there. The kids above us slept late and we could hear running, loud thumping, even in the morning as well. The room beside us were loud too, not sure if it was the shifting of the chairs or even closing the doors. It was loud enough to wake us up. Other than that, I love the size of the room. Would love to go back again if our room is not near any of the noisy guests!

title: Another Great Stay at Grand Hyatt
desc: This was my second time staying at Grand Hyatt. We specifically picked this hotel as we really enjoyed our previous stay. Ms Fitri from the frontdesk greeted us with excellent customer service during check-in. As a member, we were given complimentary upgrade. The room is huge and comes with good toiletries/amenities. We requested room service for breakfast and the food were delicious with generous coffee. There is a famous bakery Plain Vanilla at Ion and im glad to enjoyed their cakes and pastries right at the comfort of the hotel room. Of course, the excellent concierge and doormen that never failed to open doors for guests with smiles and greetings. These are the group of people and front-liners that we always tend to overlooked and say thank you. Will definitely recommend

title: Bad staycation. There are better hotels out there with better services.
desc: Booking details were changed without any notice, neither was there any compensation. Although this is during the P2HA measures, it is simply unacceptable to not provide guests with alternatives. Booking made was for buffet breakfast with Straits Kitchen, instead, we were given ala carte breakfast sets because ‚Äúthe kitchen is closed‚Äù. I could not even get a refill of coffee, let alone additional food items if there was not enough food, which is all chargeable. 1 of the 2 televisions in the room was not working and the onsite engineers were unable to recitfy the issue, unless it was the next day. Overall, bad experience at the Hyatt. At the price you are paying, premium services should be expected, yet I felt like I was not being valued as a customer.

title: Best experience you can ask for
desc: As compared to my past staycay at other hotels, Grand Hyatt is by far one of the best experience I had during my stay especially during this covid period. Fast room service, great birthday cake, pickup phone calls almost immediate. Very polite staffs. Room was huge, love the bathtub and the amentities. Flexibility in meeting our requests. The only thing I could think of to improve is checking in took quite awhile, as there is a number of people queuing and there is no cooling air condition in the lobby.

title: Excellent hotel for staycation
desc: Strategic location whereby the hotel is within walking distance from Orchard Mrt. There are many Malls and places for shopping as well. Convenient and extremely comfortable stay. The facilities are well equipped and I loved the layout for the hotel room as well! There are working space providing as well beside the bedroom, bathroom and wardrobe. Thanks for letting us to check in earlier as well!! The online check in is fast and efficient. The reply in email is also very prompt. Definitely will come back again to this hotel for another stay!

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: (a) Check-in process is super quick; (b) the hotel also provide an online check-in; (c) the room is very spacious and the bed is super comfy; (c) near to shopping center and restaurants; and (d) will definitely return again with family.

title: Bad stay at the Grand Hyatt
desc: Really horrible. I had 3 rooms booked for my family staycation. Upon check in we had to swap 1 room immediately due to lights not in working condition and no bath tub. Later in the evening around 6pm, my second room had to be swapped as the lights were turning off and on by themselves and it was a freak show. By the next morning, I realised that I was sweating in my sleep as the aircon in my sleeping area was totally not working at all, and there was a loud machinery sound that affected my sleep. I had the worse sleep ever in a 5 star hotel and went home to take a nap. Usually do not have any issues with my experience in SG local staycay, but this experience with Hyatt really opened my eyes. The hotel has literally fallen to shambles.

title: Warm and welcoming stay
desc: Really enjoyed the stay at the hotel. I was able to get the room which I requested. They gave me late check out too. The staffs are good and able to help us order breakfast even though we ordered late and bring to our room on time

title: Excellent stay
desc: Check in process was easy and smooth even during this covid period. Front desk agent, fitri was very polite and friendly. Room was very spacious and big. Room amenities was sufficient enough for the whole stay.

title: A staycay you will need!
desc: Clean and comfortable room in a great location. Kids had their own space and TV. Pool was another nice spot to just chill. Tips: Early check-in is a must and book for pools in advance. Halal room service is available from Straits Kitchen in case Kids needed a refuel after pool time. We will definitely consider Hyatt again!

title: My Awesome Birthday Staycation
desc: From the welcoming desk staff till we checked out, all staff have served us v well. They were so friendly and helpful in attending to all our needs. Due to the heightened restriction measure , we had to dine in our room for our breakfast, this was a pleasant experience cos we don‚Äôt have to queue for our food. However, the food was a bit cold when we received it. Otherwise we have a great stay.

title: Good experience. Highly recommended.
desc: Check in was prompt, our room was upgraded to a nice suite which was clean, bathroom taps and shower were in good working condition. In Straits Kitchen where we had buffett breakfast and dinner, staff was attentive, asian food was of high standard.

title: Staycation
desc: Staycation with family cum Birthday celebration in a spacious, clean and comforting Deluxe room. Although it was a private occasion due to the Phase Two (heightened alert) COVID-19 situation, it was still a joyous birthday celebration well-spent with the family, lots of fun and quality time.

title: Best stay so far
desc: Very helpful stuff, told them it's for anniversary and they gave the highest floor with nice view also a anniversary cake to surprise us!~ can't ask for more as they did their best for the customers. Definitely will come back and visit and recommend my friends and family to come stay and enjoy the accommodation with this hotel

title: Perfect stay
desc: Spent 3d2n with my friends. The rooms were so much better than expected and the staff were really friendly. It was an enjoyable break and a fun one too. The location is really accessible with many shopping centres nearby.

title: Great Hospitality
desc: Hotel Room was very Spacious and clean. Was greeted warmthly by their staffs. Smooth check in. The Chief Concierge Faisal was very cheerful and kind. He walked me till the main door and wauted for my taxi to arrive. To the Front Office ladies too. Thanks for arranging a Fruit Platter and Brookie to be sent up to my room.

title: Extremely disappointed!
desc: One word upon stepping inside the hotel room #1046 - D.A.T.E.D My sister insisted we had a little staycation at Grand Hyatt. It was her birthday week, so whatever she wanted, I would say yes (unless she wanted the moon!) She had a staycay earlier this year and she seemed to really like this hotel property. I strongly disagreed after spending 3 days there. Definitely a bigger room than most hotels. There was a living/work area. Probably good for business travelers, then again, not enough outlets. Extremely dark and uninviting bathroom. I refused to use the bathtub. Bathroom came with one sink. Most hotels I went had duo sinks. Overall, the room was dated and in desperate need of a renovation. Room was not completely cleaned. Could see dust on the shelves in the bathroom and

title: Honeymoon staycation
desc: Hotel is in good location. Friendly staff at the check-in counter, the name was Fitri if im not wrong. My husband and I loved how spacious and clean the room is. The breakfast is delicious, worth the try. Would love to come back here again! Thank you!

title: Highly recommended
desc: Highly recommended, Great room, spacious, large. There's a living area and also a bedroom with a Comfortable king size bed. View is great from high floor. Separate shower and toilet. Our room comes with a bathtub, which is great. Staff is very friendly and courteous. Great stay. Love it.

title: Good location and excellent service
desc: Location and surrounding is good. Excellent services and staffs. smooth check in and check out. only swimming pools is abit far as it‚Äôs at another building need to walk. But overall the amenities is all good.

title: Excellent ambience
desc: The hotel room is spacious,very clean,smells good,great ambience to rest and relax.. the toilet is clean,comes with bidet too! Family friendly. And there are many shops nearby which is just less den 5 mins walk.

title: Grand Hyatt Singapore #1!!
desc: Grand Hyatt Singapore is probably the best hotel I've ever stayed in Singapore, perhaps in the whole of Asia. Staff is very friendly and welcoming. My room is always clean, service is top notch. Location is in the middle of Orchard and accessible to MRT. Their World Hyatt Program is the most generous hotel club. I will never stay in any other hotel while I'm in Singapore. Thank you Grand Hyatt Singapore!!

title: Pleasant Stay
desc: Had a pleasant stay with my partner. Everything was clean and we tried calling the room service to check on complimentary services and we were pleased by their fast response! We were pleased that we were given high floor and with bathtub as per requested.

title: Good staycation
desc: Great spacious deluxe room with excellent service and clean, well-appointed rooms. Beds are comfortable and bathroom is huge. Great facilities too like lawn tennis court and reasonably spacious swimming pool. Service is friendly and efficient. Straits Kitchen breakfast service could have more choices but good and fast service there too. Hotel is covid-conscious with many hand sanitiser stations located around the hotel and lift lobbies.

title: BEST HOTEL I'VE STAYED IN THUS FAR.
desc: My family would travel when I was younger and I've stayed in quite a few hotels. Despite the others being rated as 5star hotels, there was always some problem (even minor ones) that we faced. HOWEVER, Grand Hyatt was absolutely perfect from start to finish. I was having a very stressful time with a lot of disappointments but my stay here changed all that. It made me feel as if all the difficulties I've faced was because I was meant to be there that weekend. Thank you for an amazing weekend!

title: Grand Hyatt
desc: We came here for medical treatment been staying for over 2months. The staff were very accommodative treated us like family. Despite my husbands disabilities staying in Hyatt made it very comfortable. No flaws perfect staff.

title: Top Notch Service Experience
desc: I picked Grand Hyatt Singapore for my long-term stay due to its location and the layout of their suites that come with a kitchenette and spacious dining and living area. What stood out from the first to the last day was the excellent service I received: thoughtful, attentive and personalized. The hotel is quite big and during weekends become very busy without the service quality dropping. A number of hotels in Singapore seem to have struggled with service quality issues and Grand Hyatt did extremely well. Rooms are a bit dated but I heard that the hotel will undergo a complete refurbishment.

title: Awesome Staycay during this pandemic
desc: My second staycay after 4mths decided to choose back Hyatt because the room is really spacious and cosy. Booked through KLOOK because the price was reasonable especially the room that I was getting definitely worth it. Overall, my experience at Hyatt was great no complaints. Will re-visit again.

title: Lovely experience
desc: Staff were very accomodating and helpful. Room was clean, big and well worth the money. Love the food. Nasi goreng and satay were really good. Service was really top notch from check in to check out. Will definitely return

title: Vacation of Grand Hyatt
desc: Its was a smooth process. From checking in, spending the night and to checking out. There was a bit of delay in checking in due to the hotel full occupancy. Overall it was a pleasant stay as usual. Will consider booking the hotel again.

title: A well deserved staycay at Hyatt
desc: A very good hotel to have a staycation with family. Location, food wise and atmosphere was excellent. Breakfast spread was awesome. Very kids friendly. I will certainly come back with my family to have more staycation here!

title: Nice hotel
desc: Hotel location is good as its in the middle of town area. Hotel is clean and the service staff there is very friendly. Especially the guest service attendant named shafiqah. Very pleased with her friendly service. I would like to commend her for her excellent service. Looking forward to staying again in the near future.

title: Home away from home
desc: We had to get away from our home due to neighbours renovation work and hard to rest with a newborn. So we decided to stay a the Grand Hyatt. It was indeed a wonderful stay and got much needed rest. The staffs were very caring and helpful. Definitely would stay there again given the opportunity Highly recommended

title: Husband Birthday Surprise
desc: Thank you, Grand Hyatt, for the amazing experience! My husband and i had a great time staying with you! From the moment we enter the hotel to when we left the hotel, it was really a pleasant stay. I booked a night stay for my husband‚Äôs birthday surprise and we are very pleased with the warm welcome by Shafiqah, the receptionist at the front desk. Shafiqah was kind enough to give us an upgrade to the very huge room. The check-in process was very smooth, we did not have to wait so long even though our check in was at 3pm. I was very pleased and happy with the extra huge room for my husband‚Äôs birthday surprise! When

title: Staycation
desc: Overall a great stay. Friendly and smiley staff. We are in luck to be able to enjoy a decent buffet spread before the HA kicks in. Breakfast choice variety was great. Location of the hotel was great you can do your late shopping in orchard.

title: Our recent staycation at Grand Hyatt
desc: We recently stayed at Hyatt Singapore for our weekend staycation It was the usual with Hyatt standards. Check in and out was a bit delayed as there were few people in queue, being a World of Hyatt member did not help. Breakfast and Hi-Tea spread was really good. Overall a well rested staycation.

title: Staycation for anniversary
desc: Truly enjoyed my stay to celebrate my wife's anniversary and daughters birthday. However, I would rather they could put more in the surprise for my wife anniversary as well. Wish we had balloons. Overall they were quick to render assistance and request.

title: Amazing place
desc: The rooms are great. Bathroom is amazing. Staffs are efficient. Checking into the hotel was fast and easy. Child amenties are also available upon request. Birthday cake surprises are alao available upon request.

title: Best stay thus far
desc: My husband and I really love the room and the location is so convenient. Check in was fast and efficient! Very good service from the team! The rooms are big and spacious! My daughter enjoys the spacious room too! Everything was great and will definitely come back again!

title: Spacious room, great breakfast
desc: Great experience with Grand Hyatt. Rooms were spacious, we got connecting rooms, was even bigger. There were 2 TVs per room with HDMI port. Aircon was cold enough. Wide variety of breakfast buffet, able to walk around and select the food:)

title: Best Experience
desc: We got a room upgrade after knowing that it was my daughter's birthday! Superb room! Was very spacious and clean! Service was top notch! Food at Strait Kitchen was delicious! Would really love to come back for another staycation.

title: Pleasant stay at Grand Hyatt
desc: Ms Charisce was the employee that greeted me with a bright smile when I went to the receptionist to register for my check-in. I appreciate her good work and also her pleasant personality when interacting with me while trying to register my details. I was very touched that she notice that it was my birthday while taking down my details, and immediately offered for an early check-in for me. That really made my day and I couldn‚Äôt be more grateful for her graciousness and attentiveness. Would like to extend my biggest thanks to the Duty Manager, Ms Azizah as well for agreeing to Ms Charisce special requests for me. I really appreciate all of your sweet gestures to make my birthday a pleasant one. After checking in to my room, I was also greeted with a mini birthday cake from the

title: Enjoyable stay
desc: Quality amenities in a large room - towels, bathrobes, cot, soaps, children soaps, tea. Came with large bathtub, great water pressure. Easy to book and empty swimming pool. Lots of food options around the hotel.

title: Nice staycation - among the best value for money
desc: Second time staycation using Singapore Rediscover voucher. We checked into the King Bed Deluxe which is equivalent to a junior suite in other hotels for a very good weekend rate of S$260. Room was spotless and clean, not issues as all.

title: Nice staycation
desc: We had a very nice staycation at Grand Hyatt for 1 night. Staff was great. I was disappointed that the Martini Bar was closed during our stay. The Martini Bar is one of my favourites in Singapore. The hotel still looks wonderful, however a bit dated especially the rooms. Would be nice to have a Nespresso coffee machine in the room. The tv channels were limited. Some other hotels have Netflix or option to stream your own. I missed that, but we had brought our own devices to watch movies.

title: Getaway without getting away
desc: A nice solo stay to celebrate my birthday. Was pleasantly surprise with a birthday cake when I returned to the room after a nice walk along Orchard Road. Staff in Straits kitchen was friendly and helpful as always. A little upset at check-in.

title: Wonderful stay
desc: It was a surprise staycation for my husband's 30th birthday! The staff provided us with a cute birthday cake! Due to covid, we were given disposable utensils which was very thoughtful! We really enjoyed our stay at Grand Hyatt!

title: Great place to relax
desc: Deluxe room is spacious and clean. Love the bathtub and breakfast..Place is conveniently located at orchard with many malls nearby to shop and dine. The chatbot to book breakfast, check-in, and swimming pool experience is seamless as well. Used the SRV voucher for it and feel that it is value for money to stay for the weekend to relax.

title: Family
desc: Good service, nice hotel. The breakfast buffet not much of choices. Staff friendly. Swimming not kids friendly and shorter time , only 1 hr per slot and per day. Overall still a good time place to stay.

title: Value for money, centralised location
desc: Hotel room is big and value for money. Breakfast was great. Staffs are friendly and polite. Location is centralised, walking distance to many shopping malls and food establishments. I‚Äôve had an enjoyable staycay, highly recommended!

title: great place to stay, big rooms
desc: compared to all the rooms within the same price range, grand hyatts rooms are larger. the stay was comfortable although all the guest services took very very long - they delivered ice 2 hours after i asked for it, and spare toothbrush 40 mins after i asked.

title: My favourite hotel in sg
desc: Ive been to a few hotels in sg, some which are twice more expensive yet hyatt has proven itself to be better than those super hyped and overly expensive hotels. Service was good. Rooms were excellent. Location is perfect. Well done hyatt. I will surely return and stay longer the next time:)

title: Great stay.
desc: Though I got a room with a view of another bldg next to it, my overall stay was indeed a pleasant one. Staff were friendly and polite, especially at the halal Straits Kitchen caf√©, check in and out were smooth. Would definitely recommend it to family and friends.

title: Exceptional service, spacious room.
desc: Highly recommend the stay as it is one of the better room I have been to among other hotel in Singapore. The room is big and spacious for the price paid. Super worth it. The customer service experience is excellent also. There is nothing to complain about them. Me and my girlfriend decides to stay here for our anniversary every year if possible.

title: Great room & Friendly Staff
desc: Great Service provided by Charisce at the check-in counter. Polite and Patient in explaining the facilities and help to extend my checkout knowing its for a special occasion. Second time staying here as it consist of both living room and bedroom. Very cosy bed and great facilities

title: Fantastic Staycation
desc: This is a review on behalf of my parents, who went for a couple staycation at Grand Hyatt. Their first ever staycation. Appreciate the thoughtfulness of the reception staff, who took the effort to "chase" my mum with her granddaughter to give them a door gift for children. Room was spacious, and service was great. They enjoyed a relaxing spa experience at the inhouse Damai spa. Our room was clean, and had a nice garden view. Thanks for making their first staycation experience a great one!!!

title: Quarantine stay
desc: Excellent stay, wonderful staff and a lovely room! I was well looked after and was provided with assistance such as even the organising of a stationary bike to stay fit whilst stuck in the room. The hasty delivery of grab food orders has also made the stay bearable and enjoyable!

title: Staycation @ Grand Hyatt
desc: It was a very smooth and hassle-free staycation. Staff were friendly, approachable and knowledgeable. Location was highly accessible. Room was spacious and clean. Overall, would definitely consider coming back for another night!

title: Fantastic Staycation
desc: Me and work buddy had a wonderful stay-cation during our stay at Grand Hyatt. We intended to have a stay-cation cum doing our duty on weekend. Internet was awesome. Fast and excellent. We were absolutely ecstatic with the condition of the room where it had a work table and also the cleanliness of the room was exceptionally good. Breakfast was fulfilling as well. with so many choices to eat from. It was a hearty meal. We were just wondering if there were any smoking rooms. But nevertheless smoking point was near as it was just outside of Far East Plaza. Will definitely come back again.

title: Great Staycation!
desc: Booked a last minute staycation with my wife and it turned out to be one of the best staycation we've had. Greeted warmly by the Concierge staff when we entered and were checked in by Karen. She explained to us about our entitlements and on breakfast hours and wished my wife happy birthday as well. Annnd the upgrade to a junior suite! During afternoon tea, Mr Othman from Straitskitchen did a wonderful job to ensure that we enjoyed our meal by checking on us and creating small talks. Thank you. We will be back!

title: Staycation
desc: Staycation at Grand Hyatt was pleasant. Would have been great if we could have stayed longer but the price was abit too expensive. Enjoyed our stay there. The food was Awesome. The staff at the restaurant were very efficient and pleasant. The front desk were very welcoming.

title: Dad‚Äôs birthday stay

They got us the perfect connecting room-comfortable and clean. I‚Äôd love to come back here.

title: The Hayats' stay at Grand Hyatt
desc: Highly recommended clean, spacious room & huge tub. Professional staffs, family friendly, great ambience, delicious food. Bali feel swimming pool area. Smell of food while swimming. Look forward to a memorable stay.

title: Awesome stay!
desc: Always love going back to Grand Hyatt due to their super clean rooms and excellent service. Everything we requested for came promptly and all staff were courteous and polite. Beds were also comfy. Special thanks to Fateha at check in for being so efficient and accommodating!

title: Amazing Staycation
desc: Decided on GH for staycay (a break from our work against Covid0-19) and also celebrated friend's birthday and we got an early check -in which was great for us to set up the place. We're served by Katherine who have a pleasant personality and it was smooth. We couldn't resist opting for the late check out option as it's a good hotel to stay. We got king deluxe room with breakfast included and we enjoyed the whole staycay. The breakfast and the service was good too and probably it's weekdays thus not a lot of people. The toilet is equipped with spray bidet which is a good advantage, plus the bathtub! Overall, the location is accessible within town area and it's a pleasant stay with the bath tub for our own 'me - time'. Looking forward to coming back and stay again.

title: SO GRAND
desc: The hotel continues to be my personal favourite whenever I look for a different brand to stay with. While being an older hotel, it remains a classic with friendly designs and very hospitable service that warms the heart. Once again, my heartfelt thanks for the entire team for making this experience such a great one or SO GRAND as you may call it in your lingo. Again, a special shout out to Sihan, Fitri and Sean for all the nice arrangements made for this stay. We will definitely be back!

title: Family staycation on 21 Aug 2021

title: Amazing Staycay @Hyatt
desc: My family and I, we enjoyed our staycation tremendously. The services were excellent. The staff were friendly, warm and approachable. The breakfast was amazing but just a little short! It was an amazing experience indeed! Thank you Hyatt! üíúüíúüíú

title: Spacious room
desc: I had two staycay @Grand Hyatt within 2 months; June and Aug 2021. I have requested for connecting room; the rooms were so spacious and comfortable. Would definitely recommend it to family and friends.

title: Great stay at the Grand Hyatt Singapore!
desc: Special thanks to the Guest Service Officer, Karen for her helpfulness and excellent customer service. We got the room with a bathtub and that made my kids the most happiest people during our stay. Thank you Grand Hyatt Singapore!

title: Very good place for staycay
desc: I would definitely recommend this hotel for staycay. Very nice rooms and bathrooms. Cozy and pleasant experience staying. The bathtub is great . The customer servjce is excellent. They are always there to attend to you

title: Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: I was celebrating my birthday together with my friends. There were 4 of us since the visitors are limited due to the current situation. We didn't have a hard time during the check in since front desk officer Shafikah was very accomodating. She was very friendly, kind and bubbly. title: Great stay!
desc: Very clean and very nice staff. Always ready to provide for anything that we needed, with a smile! Hope that we can spend more nights at the hotel and hopefully enjoy breakfast there as well next time!

title: Great stay spacious room!
desc: Happy with the hotel room and enjoyed the large spacious toilet. Walking to the pool was quite a hike from our block but signages were relatively clear and was easy to navigate. Looking forward to stay again.

title: Le Grand Hyatt
desc: Beautiful room and lovely pool! But the weather was a wet one but reading beside one makes a great birthday retreat during pandemic times. A little disappointed that there was no special attention since it was my birthday, although highlighted a couple of times, but the stay was a nice one.

title: Perfect staycation for 2

Everything was perfect for our wedding anni. We were given a complimentary cake too. Highly recommended to all!

title: Deluxe Room - Best staycation

The room was spacious, clean, high level (stayed on the 19th floor with garden view). It was so good the first night, we extended our stay for one more night. Best staycation by far for me.

title: Good hotel
desc: Service was excellent. Cherise and Jeffrey at Front Desk went above and beyond to ensure my nephew had a nice birthday celebration! The hotel may be a bit dated and could do with an update but the bed was comfortable and water pressure was excellent. The staff and their excellent service are why you should stay here.

title: Welcomed with Warmth
desc: Stayed for a night to rejuvenate from a month-long schedule of strenuous activities. The receptionist (I don't recall her name, I believe I saw "Sharisce") was warm, cheerful, and made me feel welcomed to Hyatt. She ensured that all my requests are met, knowing I wanted to relax. Karen was also very warm despite doing the graveyard shift. The person who handled the Room Dining calls was also very friendly; you could tell she was smiling over the call. I think her name was Hasnah? Third stay here and I can tell it won't be the last. I loved the spacious room with the bathtub, and I also loved the hospitality from everyone!

title: I can hear footsteps at night, poor flooring!
desc: At first i heard the footsteps during the day. I thought it was still bearable. And it dragged on till midnight and i couldnt sleep because of that. All they could offer is change of room. Who would move at 1am?

title: Awesome Staycation
desc: We chose Grand Hyatt as our honeymoon staycation. Our room was a suite and was big and roomy. The bathtub was spacious and bed was extremely comfortable. So comfortable that we slept until we nearly missed the breakfast bell. The breakfast was very tasty and there was alot of food with good variety.

title: Amazing experience at Grand Hyatt
desc: Spent my anniversary at Grand Hyatt this year and it was worth every single penny! Just as expected of a 5 star hotel - the room was clean and spacious, bedsheets were spotless and comfy, room service was really delicious (we ordered steak and ribs, wasn't expecting much but they still wowed us here too). Cherry on top of our stay here was the customer service. In general, all the staff we've met here was courteous and sincere. Special mention to Kavind, our concierge who made our anniversary here an even more memorable one. Upon noticing that we had a special occasion going on, he brought us a little jars of chocolate cookies as a gift to congratulate us (cookies were also yumm btw). It was a simple but heartfelt gesture and we really appreciate it. Thank you Grand Hyatt

title: Awesome staycation!
desc: We stayed at The Grand Hyatt from 6-8 August and from the time we checked in till we checked out, we had such pleasant and awesome stay. Staffs were friendly and great! Front desk Charisce checked us in and she explained the hotel‚Äôs information with us in detailed. We had small talks and it was a great start to a great staycation. Love love love everything about the hotel and all the staffs!

title: Repeated guest
desc: This was my 3rd time staying there. The rooms were so spacious and comfortable. Everything was in order except for some missing towels that were easily resolved by contacting desk service. The hospitality was great and most importantly, i couldn't ask for a more better location in the hearts of the shopping district.

title: Nice rooms and friendly staff. Good view from the rooms given. Staff were friendly and were there when needed help. Will
desc: Nice rooms and friendly staff. Good view from the rooms given. Staff were friendly and were there when needed help. Will soon book my next stay with Grand Hyatt singapore again. Thanks for the good service Grand Hyatt and to the staff name Shafikah,super good service.

title: Great Service
desc: Everything from checking in to the stay, to checking out was seamless and perfect. i had an enjoyable time and thank you again Jerry from front desk for being soo helpful to all my queries and requests!

title: Staycation

Thankfully i brought my laptop. The tea bags provided were great!

title: One of the best hotels in Singapore
desc: Rooms are spacious and clean. Location of hotel is situated right smack in the middle of orchard. Plenty of amenities around. Customer service is always so gracious. Smooth check in and check out. Safety distancing always.

title: Love Vacation
desc: We were happy to have the suite. Not expected it to be big and worth the price we are paying. Requested for a bathtub n late check up as we got our room quite late..We will surely recommend to our family and friends and will be back.

title: Staycation
desc: We had a lovely staycation at the hyatt for two nights. They provided us with a late checkout as well. The room was fabulous and bed and linen were super comfy. Pool was lovely and the takeaway food boxes were a great and affordable lunch time option l.

title: Great Food Great Staycation
desc: Great dinner and breakfast at Straits Kitchen, service staff were helpful, small crowd and spaced out seating was a bonus, room was nice and clean, had a great night sleep, very comfortable staycation overall

title: Our anniversary staycation
desc: I love everything about grand hyatt. Check in and check out were smooth, the staffs we very friendly in helping us to bring our luggages up to our room since we have a stroller and everything. The housekeeping staffs were also very friendly. Will definitely come again!

title: 1 night Staycation
desc: booked one night stay on a weekday using SRV vouchers. Room was large and very comfortable. They gave many pillows with varying firmness level. The aircon was easy to adjust. The TV has HDMI input but no DisplayPort input ports so bring your own adapter if you want to use your computer!

title: Great stay!

title: Awesome!

On the old side (could be improved). But overall stay experience was great! Would love to stay again in future!

Aircon decided to stop in the middle of the night and we need to wake up to readjust it to restart it. We apparently can access the floor without using the access card which is a concern that anyone can go to any floor or rooms

title: Great staycation on special occasion
desc: We were greeted with a great smile from Katherine. It‚Äôs out 1st time stay in Grand Hyatt and we felt Welcome! Beautiful lobby ambiance and best thing we got a great room. Above our expectations. It make a birthday, to be remembered. Thank you Grand Hyatt. Will definitely recommend you to others

title: Staycation at Grand Hyatt
desc: It was marvelous and the staff are friendly and helpful. The stay was good with spacious and big hotel rooms to stay. I like the swimming pool and the facilities in the hotel coupled with nice shopping malls in the vicinities helped me to have a relax stay. Thank you!

title: Lovely stay
desc: Huge room with great facilities and customer service. Easy early check in before arriving at the hotel and the room is clean. Big kid size bed enough for 2 adults and a 3yo. Overall a wonderful time with my husband and son.

title: Unforgettable
desc: Was my first solo stay cay and checked in myself. Told the staff there and they made it very smooth and easy for me. Family and friends have been asking me about my stay and they told me they're coming here too soon.
