title: Best Staycation
desc: The hotel location is super convenience. In Orchard with many shopping malls around it, high halal food options, public transport is easily accessible. hotels are clean with delicious restaurant and friendly & helpful staffs!

title: Staycation at Grand Hyatt
desc: The room was big and great, very comfortable as well. Apart from the aircon going on and off multiple times by itself throughout the night, the stay was good and worth the visit. If have the chance, will definitely revisit Grand Hyatt.

title: 4 months stay at Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: My parents stayed here for four months for a medical emergency trip to Singapore. I can say Hyatt team is very excellent in taking care of us. Shoutout to Jeffry Front Office and Kavind from Concierge team and the whole staff. They attended us very well that I cried a bit when I checked out on behalf of my parents today. They are already like our second home. Thank you Grand Hyatt for the excellent top notch hospitality

title: Not a good experience
desc: Had a power trip when we were staying in the hotel, was not able to contact front desk even through the landline. Had to use my own phone to call the front desk, 20mins later the electrician came into room and fixed it. However, there was no follow up calls from the front desk not until 2 hours later the incident. Tried calling the front desk 3 times after the incidents (even through the Operator) yet no one picked up my calls. desc: Booked a one night stay for a family‚Äôs birthday. On top of that, his team were very polite and professional in attending to my queries at the reception. We felt very welcome. The hotel room was spacious and comfortable. The toilet looked grand too. Overall, the hotel and the service from the staff exceeded our expectations. Would definitely come back here again for another staycation!

title: Long needed Staycation
desc: Had a 1 night stay. The room is not ready when we check in and the waiting time is long. Apart from that, love the room. Very big and spacious. Comfortable and cosy. The location is also ideal. Overall, love my stay there and will return.

title: The worst birthday staycation ever in a hotel
desc: Arrived at the hotel with high expectations, got brought back to reality. First up on arrival, with more than 4 bags plus 2 luggage, there were no one in sight to assist. Guessing they are short on manpower. Next was the queue to get checked in, waited long to get checked in, got brought to a different level to have my checkin done. Again, the staff who brought us up just watched us carrying everything on our own, when clearly our hands are full, there were no help offered. Next upon checkin, the duty manager Mindy was pretty substandard. I have indicated its my birthday celebration, having booked a 3 day 2 night stay checking out on a Monday which is a non peak day, requested for a late checkout, only to be given a 1 hour extra extension. After much haggling, finally

title: Horrible experience. No covid safety measures in place..
desc: Anyone us able to have access to the lift to walk up to any rooms without restrictions. Swimming pool was overcrowded without any personnel on duty. Allowed non swimmers to be around the pool without registering therefore there are people crowding around which is totally more than 5 pax. Hotel staff do not care about situation after being informed. Staff mentioned ‚Äúthere‚Äôs nothing I could do‚Äù

title: Spacious room & modern facilities
desc: Stayed for 2 nights for a business meeting. The room was much more spacious than expected. The hotel staff was kind enough to offer a complimentary upgrade to a suite bigger than my booking. Location was convenient. I had no problems with meal options. Hotel breakfast variety was good. Scrambled eggs could be better though.

title: Peace and Tranquility in a World of Chaos
desc: Grand Hyatt was a sanctuary of cleanliness and well managed protocols in the current chaos of COVID travelling. I would recommend also staying here once "normality" resumes due to its centralised location in downtown Singapore.

title: Late Check-in
desc: This is an unexpected experience at Grand Hyatt for our Honeymoon Staycation. Communication on checked in timing is confusing for customer. We have booked the hotel via klook for a late check-in at 6pm but received an email from Grand Hyatt stating the check-in timing at 3pm. Hence, I have made a call to the hotel to confirm on the timing, the staff told me to come at 3pm without even asking for my booking number. Assuming my check-in time at 3pm, I reached the hotel at 430pm on the day itself and was told my timing was at 6pm. Still, the staff mentioned that we will not be able to check-in at that timing, instead we only received a message that the room was ready at 7pm. Also, on the check-out day we requested for a slightly later timing. However, the staff mentioned that it

title: Cleanliness
desc: Room was not cleaned properly. Trash were still found in the bathtub and bins. Tables still has stain unknown stain. The floor still had bits of crumbs and the kitchen items were not washed nor clean.

title: Best stay!
desc: Had a wonderful time here. Check in and out was a breeze. All the ground staff was nice and welcoming. Dinner and breakfast at straits kitchen was awesome! Love the spread. I love the huge room and bathroom. Hotel is located in Orchard Road and you can walk to all the shopping centres, like ION, NAC and Paragon. Complimentary parking tickets were given as well!

title: Service at the reception upon check in, to dining in, to the facilities and equipments offered both at the gym are great
desc: Had done a 2d 1n staycation as my wife surprised me for my birthday treat. Was very well received over at the reception by a warm lady called Sha...( apologies for not remembering how to spell her name ), and over at the Straits Kitchen restaurant. At the end of our dinner, they surprised me with a wonderful small chocolate cake and wow it‚Äôs really good quality chocolate used. The only suggestion for my dining experience is to have more choices as my wife had mentioned that they used to have a sushi/sashimi counter but this time round there was none and the choices were narrowed down. Facilities ie:gym, sauna closes early due to the covid situation, was hoping it would have longer opening hours if it is not possible for the usual 24 hours usage. Everything was great but

title: Lovely stay in Grand Hyatt
desc: It was our first stay in Grand Hyatt and it was a pleasant one. The hotel prepared a celebratory cake for my bf‚Äôs birthday which was really thoughtful. Location is strategic and room is spacious and clean. Worth the price! Would love to be back again in future, thank you üòä

title: Big room.
desc: Took the deluxe king room and the room was huge. The location was great with lots of ammenities and shopping around. One of the best halal restaurant in Singapore. Would recommend to visit this place again.

title: Great Location for Stayca
desc: Confirmable, clean, spacious, the king size bed felt like you can roll around endlessly. Classic room layout, with all necessities being accommodated for. Extremely friendly service staffs and room service staffs.

title: Honeymoon
desc: It was a really pleasant stay! From the personal handwritten notes to the cake. I love love the 4D3N stay. We got a free upgrade to the junior suite, the breakfast was continental. There was a whole lot of range!

title: 3D2N
desc: Had a great 3D2N sstaycation. Service is good and location is great, just beside Far East Plaza. Surrounded by shopping malls.Had a birthday celebration for my daughter and she really enjoys the stay.

title: Great Hospitality!
desc: Great hospitality from the time we check-in till we check-out. Front desk even arrange for the extra bed for my 5 yr old boy along with a birthday cake for his birthday. Straights Kitchen also gave us a complimentary cake to celebrate our boy birthday. Thank you Hyatt!

title: good staycay
desc: Stayed 2 nights for my bf birthday and booked via Klook when they had promo. Book the deluxe room with a separate living room and tub. There was a queue during check in and then was told there wasn‚Äôt room available atm so I had to wait. Was also given an option for single beds with no tub and I obviously rejected. Took 1.5hrs to get my room. Front charice(?) Managed to get me my room even tho there were ppl in the queue!! Luckily was able to check out at 1 instead of 12, better than nothing right. Room was very spacious and bathroom was very nice. The tub keeps draining the water even tho I locked the drain. Pool was very nice as well, opens till 9 but bit awkward cause the restaurant is just beside and people can watch you swim. Good experience overall

title: A hotel not to be missed
desc: Excellent and professional Front Desk check-in with all our queries answered. Concierge was fast and friendly in retrieving our birthday cake. Room was well maintained by Housekeeping in tiptop condition. Room rate is very attractive. Booking through Klook. Well Done Grand Hyatt and Klook.

title: Spacious room in the heart of Orchard
desc: Great stay and love the size of the room, perfect location! Customer service was friendly and patient. This is my second time having a staycation in this hote. We had a great time and the hotel felt super clean and safe to stay. Will definitely recommend to my friends and family! Thank you!

title: Family staycation
desc: This is a good hotel for a short family getaway. The swimming pool is nice and the gym has lots of equipments. Location is good with good food and restaurant all around. Will definitely come back for another staycation.

title: Old but Gold service
desc: Good news is that the Grand Hyatt will undergo an extensive reno soon. That will definitely boost the image already having a renown highest standard of hotel services. During the era of COVID you will expect a longer waiting time but surprisingly it takes about 15mins wait. The check in was smooth, staff was ever friendly and professional. Room was little outdated interior alas it was tip-top clean and comfortable. One of the best king bed and pillow we ever had, no wrong about it. We truly enjoyed our staycation.

title: Good break in these trying times.
desc: We booked a short staycation through Klook as there was discount for a Deluxe Rm stay in Grand Hyatt. It was well worth the ~$200 per night paid. The hotel room was spacious, and clean - thanks to the housekeeping. There was a bathtub which my daughter enjoys immensely. And the pool sits nicely among trees and waterfall, making it seems like a tropical swimming heaven. Atlas, the downside is that the pool is at another wing, so we had to transverse through some distance for it. This is worst when it rains; we had to brave the rain to get back to our wing. Food was good. I love their Laksa. We had room service for dinner, and breakfast delivered to our rooms as well due to the COVID situation. Down side is that we had to pay for an extra breakfast set for our daughter there and

title: Grand Hyatt Hotel going the Extra Mile
desc: Had my stay at Grand Hyatt Hotel, Singapore, at 10 Scotts Road recently. It was a wonderful experience as the hotel room, the ambience and the food were all fantastic. And what's more, the hotel staff were all very helpful and they even helped to find our missing item. Thank you Mr Deva and Mr Kavind for your kind assistance!

title: Poor Customer Svc
desc: Went for a family staycation. Nice hotel but service level is a let down. Gives me the impression that they do not welcome locals on staycation. Service not up to it. From reception to conceige, seriously. There are much better choices.

title: Top choice as family hotel
desc: This is our third time staying here. Love their Grand deluxe room so much. Spacious, clean and they provided bidet. The location is easily accessible to anywhere. The staffs are all polite and friendly. The last time i stayed there, they handled the crowd so well even though we had to wait for our room. Hence, no complaints coming from me!

title: Very good service and cleanniness üëçüëçüëç Will staycation again with my family
desc: Very excellent service,cleanniness and we so friendly all the staffüëçüëçüëçThe room was so spacious for the big family.Very convenient to find food and stuff around this area hotel.My kids really love this hotel so much and Will staycation again with my family

title: Superb Stay
desc: It has been a wonderful and fabulous staycation we had so far. It's a very welcoming and condusive environment. The staffs are very friendly and helpful. The food are to my expectations and enjoyed the servings very much.

title: Dope hotel
desc: It was a pleasant experience. All the staffs were very courteous and helpful. Room were very spacious and comfortable. Only downside was the view, around the building were just even massive buildings.

title: Amazing staycation
desc: Rooms are big and spacious. There's a sofa sitting area and a work station. Bedroom as privacy and bathroom is big and with a bathtub. They gave us a room with the balcony as requested for smoking room.

title: Excellent room
desc: I had an enjoyable celebration in grand hyatt. This is the 3rd stayca I had in this year and this is one od the best. The room Is bigger than average hotel room, as spacious as a suite. Not forgetting the bathroom is something i am very particular about. It exceeded my expectation. Strait kitchen is a good choice if you like local food. It is my 2nd visit, I love the quality of the food they provided.

title: Staycation at Grand Hyatt
desc: Room was very spacious and comfortable. We really enjoyed it and had a wonderful time celebrating my boyfriend‚Äôs birthday there. So easy to put up my decorations as well. Super convenient as it is very near orchard!

title: Grand Hyatt staycation 5th to 6th Sep
desc: Hotel is in good condition. Breakfast was good albeit slightly rush with time restriction to be adhered to. Staff at Straits Kitchen were extremely helpful. Staff at reception were helpful but could be more welcoming (for 5 star hotel like Grand Hyatt)

title: Great staycation experience
desc: Not the first time that my family has chosen this hotel and won‚Äôt be the last time either. Great location at town area. Beautiful rooms. My kids thoroughly enjoyed the bathtub and swimming pool. Speaking of which, i would like to thank the management for accommodating to my bathtub requests for my stays there. Really appreciate how the staff make us feel welcome whenever we‚Äôre there. They were great with kids too, handing out colouring books and crayons to keep them occupied while the parents handle the check in process. Overall a wonderful experience thus far.

title: Grand hyatt
desc: It was a good stay! Good service. Surely we will come back! Room was clean. Bed comfy. The room is spacious. We love it thank you grand hyatt! We would like to thank your service and kindness towards us.

title: Good for short break
desc: The restaurant service is excellent. The menu need changes as I had been there couple of times but still the same. The room is clean and cosy. Apart from the shower cubicle, the toilet should have water drainage.

title: Great experience with staffs.
desc: I would like to say thank you to fadzrul,yunos,katherine and ireen for all the help.. they have done a great job.. they have made the transaction smooth from the time we reach and till we get our room.. my family enjoy the stay.. thank you so much guys...

title: Nice environment but need improvement
desc: Overall, the environment is nice though swimming pool is not so well maintained. Cleanliness of the room need to seriously improve. Also, the unfriendly Indian lady at express checkout counter need to retrain.

title: Staycation at Hyatt
desc: Our first staycation at Hyatt as a family of four was such a blast! Loved the spacious room and of cos my two girls went wild with the bathtub! Although it was a peak period because of the school holidays, the service was excellent and prompt. From the registering and check in service to our luggage delivery to the making up our rooms, the staff of Hyatt are just wonderful, friendly and smiley throughout! Definitely coming back for more staycations!

title: Awesome Service and Breakfast
desc: Despite the crowd due to the September school holidays, staff was ready and facilities were well-managed. Straits Kitchen staff was phenomenal in service and breakfast was incredible! The rooms were extremely comfortable- my friends and I enjoyed a good night's rest!

title: Very good hotel if you want prime location

title: Excellent service
desc: Was here for 14 days due to Singapore's Stay-at-Home Notice for travellers. Staff are helpful, courteous, friendly, and professional. Room was clean and neat. Felt at home despite having to stay in a room for 14 days owing to Singapore's COVID-19 measures. Excellent meal service. Food generally tasted good.

title: Family staycation
desc: Had a great time there. Check in, booking of amenities were great and seamless. They called to book breakfast slot 1wk before check in.The room was huge! Breakfast and hi-tea was fantastic! Staff was helpful. Great location

title: Stay at Grand Hyatt
desc: The hotel and the room were clean and the staffs were helpful. The food was delicious and with many varieties. However, maybe due to the pandemic, the check in process was was long and waited more than one and a half hour for our room to be ready. Overall, the stay was pleasant and will recommend to others. Will also return in the near future.

title: Wrong choice of staycation
desc: Bad choice to chose Hyatt for my family birthday celebration. Am still waiting for a follow up for my kind feedback to them. And ‚Ä¶ still nothing. Guessing they are busy. Don‚Äôt think coming back after this experience. Despite being a member. Keep it guys.

title: Highly recommended
desc: Went for a staycation to celebrate my daughter birthday. GH gave a whole cake as a complimentary cake. Staff always have a smile on their face and made guest feel warmth. The room is very spacious, comfortable and clean! Highly recommended for family with young kids!

title: Staycation
desc: Location just beside Far East plaza. Hotel smells very good, room was exactly as in picture. Room and toilet were spacious, convenient for a group of 5. 2 tv available. Would be great if hotel provide microwave and smart tv as well

title: Excellent location and comfortable room
desc: Receptionist was polite and efficient. Room was clean and it felt at home. However bed can be a little softer but could do with a 2 night stay. Friendly for family with younger kids. Overall worth for what I spent.

title: Short overnight stay
desc: We had a short overnight stay in the deluxe room which has a separate bedroom and living area. Very comfortable size for a small family. There was 1 big tv in each of the bedroom and living room, so kids can watch their own shows.

title: Terrible service
desc: I booked this hotel for my wife birthday. I choose this hotel without even looking at the review because I knew this was one of the top hotel in Singapore. This is one of the hotel in my wishlist for quite sometime. Especially each time I passed by when I was shopping at Orchard road. But I was wrong! Together with my 9 years old daughter, we arrive there at 3.45pm to check in and I was told by the hotel staff that our room is not ready and We have to wait for another 1.5 hr. Deeply disappointed! Shortly, my wife came over and meet us in the hotel lobby, she was surprised that we were still waiting in the lobby for our room. title: A short gateway with family
desc: The check in process quite fast, since its school holiday. The staff who attended me was able to explain whatever doubt that I'm having. The room is quite spacious. The room we got was at the end so its quite quiet and peaceful.

title: Lovely staff, wonderful food, great initiative by the hotel to reduce food waste.
desc: We stayed for 3 days 2 nights at the hotel. The room was clean, spacious and had everything that we needed. We were greeted by friendly staff and could see their genuine smiles even behind the masks. We tried out the Treatsure box that was offered by the hotel restaurant, The Straits Kitchen. The hotel joined this initiative to reduce food waste from the buffet offerings by the hotel. The food was amazingly good, the staff at the restaurant were so friendly and helpful. We thoroughly enjoyed our experience there.

title: Staycation
desc: I am impressed by following responses/services received: 1) Delivered my bags to my room. 2) Attitude showed by the chambermaid cleaning the room (2036) next to my room (2038). I approached him about where to get toothbrush in my room. He knew I was waiting for another room, suggested to me if I could wait for just another 5min so that I would have two rooms side by side. I delighted accepted him suggestion, he then called the front desk but unfortunately it was declined by front desk staff. In the end, the other room was all the way to the end of level 20 (2009). Chambermaid sensed what customer needs and responded to meet customer‚Äôs requirements. Very good. I believe below points can be improved: 1) Instead of 3pm check in. I was made to wait till 6pm to receive my first

desc: Thank you, Grand Hyatt for making up the plan of me and husband happy with good gesture by wishing us happy anniversary at the customer service. The anniversary cake was serve in the room and also at the straits kitchen.. so happy and memorable. Sure will comeback and bring my children and family here.

title: Everything you would want in a hotel
desc: This is our 2nd stay this year. Our room is 2132 and the view out is great. We requested for a higher floor and the hotel exceed to our request and allocate the highest floor for our room. This room doesnt have a bathtub but it is replaced with a dresser and a walk-in wardrobe. Love the extra space. The room comes with separate living room and bedroom area. I feel this hotel has everything you would want in a hotel stay - really big, spacious room, great service, fully equipped amenities, accessibility to food, shopping and transport (bus/mrt/taxis) and price is one of the best for a hotel located along Orchard Road. Will definitely be back again for a staycation.

title: Amazing service
desc: It was just a 1 nigth stay but it felt amazing. Beds are great, bathroom was spacious. Hyatt really takes care of you. I can‚Äôt wait to go back. Food was great too!! There was so much variety. It was quiet and exactly what i needed

title: Awesome COVID staycation
desc: Receptionist name Fitri is great in being patience, helpful and polite in processing our check in as we had to book 4 rooms due to covid restrictions. she even went to the extra mile to serve complimentary cakes as we are celebrating Oct birthday.

title: Excellent Birthday Staycation
desc: Excellent service. Went for one night birthday staycation Requested for non smoking room, bath tub and a small birthday cake and all done nicely by the team. Check in was extremely fast, no long queue and many staff attended. Check out was express and they allowed me to have slightly late check out. Room is huge and clean. Staff are mostly friendly and attentive. I‚Äôm glad the sauna and steam room are open even tho during heighten alert measure (by booking system to avoid crowd). Definitely will revisit this hotel again. Thank you Grand Hyatt Singapore Team.

title: Old but nice hotel
desc: Went for a family staycation here. Hotel is quite old but service was great, food was the best. Was especially impressed by the service in Straits Kitchen during breakfast. The rooms were big and clean but not as cosy as I would have liked it to be. The beds were relatively low in height and did not have that nice bounce you get with 4/5* hotels. Blanket was also quite thin and not fluffy. Overall, would I come back? Yes I would:)

title: Great service and exceptional food
desc: Overall experience was wonderful, staff were very attentive at the concierge, restaurants and for room service. The suite was very clean and enjoyable. The food at breakfast and lounge were also very delicious. Would highly recommend for a stay here.

title: Great staycay!
desc: Had a short stay here over the weekends with my buddy. Lovely spacious room. The service and hospitality was exceptional; from requesting to have a smoking room, to experiencing a fast and smooth check-in and also received complimentary cookies! Special thanks to Ireen & Azizah of Reception for the assistance with the room. Also, special thanks to Tiara of Concierge for the lovely complimentary cookies. Would definitely stay @ Hyatt again in the future!

title: Superb Family Hotel
desc: Staff were all friendly and accommodating especially when we had a super active and screaming toddler. Amenities were great during this pandemic, food was easy to access, quick shopping a walk away. Pool is kids-friendly except for the occasional dragonflies but generally a good hotel stay with families and young children. Hotel also has a handicap facility - our hotel room was fantastic with this handicap facility. Made our stay all the more sweeter. Thank you Grand Hyatt Singapore!

title: Good sleep
desc: King size bed was super nice to sleep on. I like how its at orchard and theres so many options. If u feeling cheap can go fareast next door if u feeling fancy can go paragon. But within the hotel, esp by the pool, its so quiet and serene, away from the city life

title: Staycation
desc: Purchased this through Klook and its value for money. Good location with eatery and shopping just nearby. The room was huge and more than enough for 2 people. Good that the hotel offered halal breakfast and i was spoiled for choices. 10/10 will come again!

title: Good decent hotel stay
desc: Overall a good decent hotel to stay in. Especially for family staycation. Affordable price and complete amenities. Halal food for muslims so it is definitely a plus! Sucks that the COVID measures hindered plenty of things.

title: Great place for wfh(otel)
desc: The lounge space that is separated from the bedroom was excellent. Thoroughly enjoyed my work from hotel stay there. It was a good staycay location with the shopping malls nearby. Can't wait to be back in Nov 2021!

title: 3D2N Staycay
desc: Cleanliness was great, room was perfect. Had a really great stay. Check in experience was good although had to wait a little. Hotel was really thoughtful and gave us a cake to celebrate our anniversary! Room service was quick, beds and pillows were comfortable as well.

title: Perfect staycation
desc: Grand hyatt, always deliver based on their reputation. My family was very happy to stay. Perfect location, spacious room and bed, friendly staff, Swimming pool was cozy, all was good. We will visit again soon.

title: Bday staycation
desc: Our 2nd time staycation at grand hyatt! Super love the hotel even my 4 yr old also wanted to stay in the same hotel again. Room and toilet are very clean and customer service was tiptop. Will definitely come back again!

title: Wedding anniversary staycation
desc: Cherise was amazing . The check in process was quick and pleasant. We enjoyed our stay in Grand Hyatt very much. We didn't managed to use the swimming pool as it was under maintenance. The room is huge and the mini bar is free of charge.

title: Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: My spouse and I stayed in their deluxe room on 24th-25th Oct 2021. Upon arrival, we were greeted by the Concierge team, Saun, Rezal and Fadzrul who were so ever helpful to show us the Reception counter and initiated to help us with our items. The front desk staff, Mr Jeffery and Ms Shafiqah gave us a warm welcome and was pleasant and efficient while checking-in the room for us. We were impressed by the size of the room. It was spacious for the 2 of us. We felt like home. The buffet breakfast at Straits Kitchen was great! We were spoilt with variety of spread to choose from. And their staffs were simply helpful and friendly. The conceige team were equally amazing. Ms Tiara, especially wrote a greeting card, wishing my spouse a happy birthday. Along with it were sumptuous

title: Clean and spacious room
desc: The room is clean and spacious. The hotel staffs are very polite and very helpful. When we just get down from taxi, the staff then automatically come over and help us get the luggage. They help to send the luggage to room and bring us to check in counter. Everything is smooth and fast.

title: Family Staycation (Birthday)
desc: Came here for a much needed staycation and also to celebrate my wife's birthday. Staff was very friendly and helpful from pre-stay till check-in. As I have my two children during the stay, we were also offered some very delicious welcome cookies. We were offered an additional hour to celebrate my wife's birthday. The service is welcome and unexpected as this was our first stay with the Hyatt brand and I do not have any status with this chain, or at least as far as I could remember. The property is old and the fittings and room are showing signs of age but I understand that the property would be undergoing some renovation to rejuvenate the hotel. The room we have was a suite which meant lots of living space although the toilet floor gets wet easily from the design of the

title: Sister's Birthday!
desc: I booked this stay for my sister and her family to have a short getaway for her birthday. The hotel even provided a baby cot for her 4 months old baby. The hotel was clean, staff was very friendly and accomodating ensuring their comfort during the stay. The room was also very spacious! Straits kitchen food was amazing.

title: Staycation
desc: Great hotel at a great location. Many food and shopping outlets nearby. Deluxe room was big and unlike the new hotels nowadays. Room was split into a living and sleeping area. Living room had an L-shaped sofa and a large writing desk.

title: Awesome stay. Felt the Hyatt touch as always..
desc: It‚Äôs always great to get to meet old friends who is still there in Hyatt. Service as usual has always been great and phenomenal.. Looking forward to the new look and many more staycation after the renovation!!..

title: Great Stay
desc: Convenient location, near to Orchard mrt station. Many shopping malls around, walking distance from Orchard to Somerset to Dhoby Ghaut.. Big and clean room. Super fast response when request for towels, ice, water. Highly recommended.

title: Good staycation
desc: Nice big room comparing to majority hotels. Pity there no sport channel for English Football. Complimentary 4 bottles of drinking water per day. The fridge a bit too small. Location is excellent as it at orchard area, you can visit Takashimaya and Orchard Central easily. It also very near the Orchard MRT.

title: Large comfortable room, a bit dated but perfect for us
desc: We had a large king-sized deluxe suite room with a separate living area and bedroom. There was a tub and hot water was super hot, and water pressure was very good. Two TVs in the unit, a desk and comfortable sofa, added to the overall comfort of the space we lived in for 3 days. Thank you for the warm service too!

title: Great relaxful stay and nice food.
desc: The service was excellent, employees were polite and respectful. The room is clean and tidy. However I expected more of the room amenities. Breakfast buffet has delicious spread of food. Overall I was satisfied and enjoyed my stay.

title: Nice place for staycation
desc: Room was big, with a bedroom and living area. Receptionist was friendly and helped us get a room with bathtub although we were assigned 1 without initially. Loved the bathtub. Breakfast was quite great too.

title: Huge and nice place
desc: Clean, huge room, ample customer service! Friendly staff, except I felt the walls are kind of thin as they are made of false walls instead of cement. Overall experience was good as the room was huge.thanks

title: GREAT SERVICE! FEELS AT HOME
desc: The front desk officer named CHARISCE. She is so joyful and helpful. Kind and passionate on her work! Understanding the guests need and welcoming us in a homely manners. The lady named Karen too is helpful. Keep it up Grand Hyatt in preserving such asset to your company! Its my 2nd time and repeat soon!

title: Enjoyable Staycay
desc: It was a 2D1N staycay at Grand Hyatt. Check in was smooth and without a fuss though we waited awhile for the carpark as all the lots were taken. Saw that there were renovation going on for the carpark. Hopefully the carpark will be bigger after the renovation. Love it that the room is very spacious with a separate living room and a kind size bed. Upon checking in, the receptionist told us they will send us something special since we were celebrating our anniversary, but we didn‚Äôt received any. Pillows are rather soft and flat after lying down for awhile. Overall, we did enjoyed our stay at Grand Hyatt and will revisit again.

title: Clean and comfy room
desc: The receptionist was welcoming and accommodating. The hotel room given was really big, spacious very clean. The buffet breakfast and dinner was also delicious as well. Thank you for the wonderful stay!

title: Lovely
desc: Place was located in Orchard, besides the newly opened eggslut. Gotten the Deluxe room for just $200 on a weekday. Room was spacious and staff were extremely friendly as well. Overall, a lovely experience.

title: Friendly staffs
desc: Staffs is friendly and approachable. Check in waiting time is slightly slow in during offpeak timing. But glad that check in process is fast. Book with RDV therefore only paid $100 to stay. Love the complimentary item that is given because able to drink some tea and relax after a day at work. Downside will be the cleanliness of washroom. Other than that all good. Will be back again for sure for the customer services. And also the room helper auntie is friendly and nice too. Thumbs up!

title: Awesome wedding stay at Grand Hyatt
desc: Wedding dinner at The Gallery was all I could ask for in a wedding, especially during covid times. Staff was helpful all the way and the support felt like a well-oiled machine, which is a good thing as nobody wants a wedding where things are not working. Everyone knew what to do and when, so kudos to the staff. Hotel stay was great and as expected from a 5-star hotel. Everything was provided for and in a timely manner. Breakfast options were somewhat limited but I'm not complaining.

title: Birthday stay!
desc: Overall, it was a good stay. Everything was fast and fuss free. Checked in and out smoothly. Location is great as it was near the shopping malls and food places :) However, the amenities were under construction! Can‚Äôt really feedback on that aspect. Would be great if given a heads up. Other than that, it was a great birthday stay üôÜüèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: Staycation
desc: We spent our staycation here in oct 2021. Nice location with 10-15 mins walking distance from the train station. To access via Wheelock place link to MRT. If you drive, they provide complimentary parking, do ask them for the complimentary season pass during your stay. Wide varieties of tv channels to choose from if you prefer to spend time indoor. With covid, if you like to access the pool to make sure to reserve online. Room is spacious, interior rather dated. Some areas of the room appeared dusty, water stain mark on the taps and toilet paper holder. Check-in took around 45 mins, the additional checks imposed for Covid is understandable.

title: Comfortable Staycay
desc: We booked Grand Hyatt for our anniversary staycay. The rate was really good and what was even better was the room size! It was like a suite, with 2 TV and full bathroom with bathtub and shower stall! It has a really big King Size bed, maybe its super King? Breakfast at The Straits Kitchen was good, the staff were very attentive and prompt. The food was good, especially the Laksa! Though Gym and Pool was closed for reno, they set up a fitness centre in one of the ballroom and the staff, Mr Gao, was very attentive and friendly. Overall, good stay!! Was already planning our next staycay in Grand Hyatt while still in the midst of our staycay.

title: Excellent Hotel and Remarkable service
desc: Every detail from check in, quality of the room, room service, quality of the food and club access was excellent. In these unprecedented time of Covid, the hotel ensured and took all the effort to follow all the regulatory keep safe requirements.

title: Staycation
desc: We love this hotel.. friendly staffs, good location, good food, hassle free, check in very fast, toilet are clean, room is big, check out also very convenient, king bed is nice, carpet room, mini bar items are free

title: Fantastic stay!
desc: A very reasonable and affordable staycation for us. The kids enjoyed it the bathtub the spacious room. Tv was not at the best quality but thats alright since we have our mobile devices. We loved how spacious the room is. Pity the swimming pool is under construction.

title: Disappointed
desc: Poor hospitality and services. Waited for Check-in for 40 minutes. I have book the room for about 2 month and yet it's not ready. I have to approach staff to get info. None staff take the initiative to offer at least a plain drink while keep us waiting. But overall dinner and breakfast is great.

title: Quick staycay
desc: Overall, the staycay was a pleasant experience even for a one nite stay. Room was big and clean. Only that carpark is limited and a little bit noisy for its current reno. ( should not have work on the weekends- include Sat). Most people want to have leisure and peaceful during the weekends. Took my dinner and breakfast at Straitskitchen. Food was very good and many varieties. Staff was very polite, helpful and very experienced. Overall experience, am satisfied.

title: A memorable stay at Grand Hyatt Singapore!
desc: This stay was intended to celebrate my 50th birthday but due to the latest restrictions, all plans have to changed. A big shout out to the Front Office Team - Sihan, Timothy, Jefrey and Fateha for making this stay an enjoyable and memorable one. The team was very engaged for all the pre-birthday arrangements with my friend till the day we checked in. Despite a busy friday afternoon, Jefrey at the members check in desk was professional and ensure my check in was done swiftly. The room we were assigned to was impeccably clean and with a nice scent. Thank you for all the birthday amenities from the hotel and also Fateha from the Reception who came to help and decorated the room.

title: Staycation
desc: Room was spacious, clean and very well maintained as compared to other established hotels at Orchard that I have stayed before. Staff was friendly, accommodating and helpful. Worth the stay as it is located in the heart of Orchard Road. Bed Mattress was a bit hard. Perhaps hotel can provide some baby/toddler pillow and blanket as there wasn't any with the baby crib.

title: Average
desc: Convenient hotel location, Good staff service throughout hotel. Clean, Spacious rooms, massage shower head. Worn furnishings, Slow response tv, uncomfortable air conditioning, faulty drawers, thin blanket, old tattled bathroom amenities, awkward magnifying mirror placement.

title: Value for Money But No Netflix and Bed Was Hard To Me
desc: The hotel is pretty old to my liking.. but I got it at a good deal with good breakfast and service the room was big and clean but TV was old with no Netflix or even YouTube .. and the bed was a little hard to my liking.. in fact I did not get good sleep :( but the bath tub was good

title: Large rooms
desc: Large rooms. Halal food. Free parking. Clean rooms. Friendly staff. Easy access. Many amenities. In the heart of orchard road. Large bathtub. Big bathrooms. Fast room service. Large beds. Near to mrt and popular shopping centre

title: Happy 3D2N stay at Grand hyatt
desc: Hotel room is very spacious while the living room is separate from bed room. Toilet is also spacious and I enjoyed my bath tub with lush bath bomb. Haven been going for staycation every month since covid19 but my first visit to Grand Hyatt Hotel. But I definitely will return back for staycation.

title: Perfect Birthday Staycation
desc: A BIG Thank you to Charise, Jenny and Jeffrey for making this stay an enjoyable and memorable one Excellent and Wonderful Staff. Friendly Service and very accomodating. Surely will come back again and I will recommend to my friends.

title: Excellence Through The Years
desc: I have been doing staycations here at Hyatt since I was a little girl and now, with kids of my own, I daresay the level of top notch hardware and software hospitality from Hyatt is still par excellence, evolving through the years gracefully.

title: Overall a easy fussfree stay with good size room
desc: Big room which is getting rarer in new hotels. facilities still well kept. love the big separate living and sleeping areas, bath tubs and showers. not much interaction with staff and the lobby area seems wide open to public as the restaurant is located beyond the check in counters so do expect a bit of crowd

title: Thumb up hotel!
desc: Got the room with bathtub! Big and comfortable! Able to rest and recharge during the stay! Second time return within 3months. Still good, front counter staff is nice and smooth check-in process. Will like to come back soon for another staycation!!

title: Room ok but buffet quality terrible
desc: Room was ok but buffet quality was terribly bad ! Food served cold and taste bad. Nothing like original taste. Very bad options and little verity. Might have caused me and family stomach issue which still disturb till today after 4 days

title: Excellent
desc: 2nd time coming for staycation. The rooms are really satisfying . Location is superb. Will definetly come again .the birthday complementary cake was nice . Room service was very caring and accommodating

title: A must stay
desc: The views in the hotel aren‚Äôt great, but that‚Äôs negligible in view of the awesome location, amazing hotel interior, and absolutely helpful and welcoming staff. Had my wedding here, my kid‚Äôs birthday staycation, and generally our go to hotel when we want to unwind and take a break. Definitely get the rooms with a separate living space and bedroom. Well worth it.

title: Staycation @ Grand Hyatt
desc: Very good hotel. Definitely worth the stay. Will plan to stay with my family here again. Did not get to enjoy some of the facilities like the swimming pool as they were undergoing renovation. If there was Netflix in the TV would be good.

title: Terrible customer service attitude
desc: Chose Grand Hyatt for our honeymoon staycaytion. When we did room service calls, attitude of the staff over the phone was terrible, not once but for both calls that me and my spouse made. Requested for additional tea top up. Staff not only sounded irritated but chided me off for not clearly stating which tea I wanted and how many bags of tea each. As per what staff said, ‚ÄúYou don‚Äôt just tell me what u want, u need to tell me how many of each u need‚Äù. Prior to that, when I just mentioned all 3 types, which was what i was provided in the room. She gave me an annoying ‚ÄúHUH?!‚Äù. Please. This is a 5 star hotel. I can‚Äôt accept this kind of service. Much less on our honeymoon stay. Late check out was not granted per request. Well that I can understand since our check out was a Friday.

title: Home away from home
desc: Business during Covid19 can be challenging but Grand Hyatt make it more easy for me. They are my family in Singapore and they are sincere and taking care of me during my stay in Grand Hyatt. The staffs are very sincere and estatic to welcome me back to the hotel

title: Family staycay
desc: Rooms are well-appointed and spacious, however our stay was right smack in the middle of the pool renovation though we booked 4 months earlier, we were only told 10 days before of the reno works. Breakfast spread was delicious and attentive service from the restaurant staff. Since the pool and gym was closed we had to find other activities ourselves to occupy the kids as none were provided by the hotel, along the Orchard belt.

title: Wonderful stay
desc: It‚Äôs a wonderful stay! I would love to come again with my family and friends. Thank you for the great service! The food is nice and delicious, the bedroom is clean, the location is just perfect! I love it!

title: Terrible service
desc: I just finished my honeymoon stay with my wife at Grand Hyatt, and we had booked a Junior Suite for ourselves. We thought that we would be receiving exemplary service here but were unfortunately mistaken. I have to say that one of the concierge staff ‚ÄúDeva‚Äù totally ruined one of our evenings there. He was very unfriendly and unprofessional, refusing to provide even the most basic of services such as bringing up food purchased, or even answering the phone when we called the concierge from the room. He cited the reason of not having enough ‚Äúmanpower‚Äù to bring the food up since it was 11pm, and that the guests would need to come to the lobby to pick up the food.. which quite defeats the purpose of booking a hotel room. Grand Hyatt is supposed to have a reputation for having

title: Excellent dinner service
desc: dinner and breakfast buffet so good. Service is on point and i wouldnt mind coming to Grand Hyatt again for another staycation. Just that the hotel can be more on point with the concierge and front desk. Tried calling a few times but no one answered. Other than that, everything is good

title: Great Breakfast
desc: The breakfast was amazing! It was nice to finally be able to get out of our chair to browse and choose our food visually. I would say the noodle station was superb. I wasn't expecting much for a Chicken Noodle Soup but the flavour exceeded my expectations. The flavour profile was amazing. Kudos to the chef. I didn't get the Laksa cause it looked pale, but my partner got it and we were blown away by the complex flavour profile. Wish we could go for seconds but we were too full trying out almost all the food. Wish we could pack it back to the room too! Would definitely go back for the breakfast! Amazing and spacious hotel room too! This was our second stay and we would come back here in a heartbeat! Amazing staff, amazing food. We did have some mis-comm with the staff regarding

title: the best stay ever
desc: i would like to praise all the staffs in grand hyatt for making my stay a memorable one. all the staff have given extra miles in helping me through out my stay. the team lead jeffrey, the valet staff, housekeeping and the staff from straits kitchen. convenient location near train and shopping centres and eateries

title: Was an bad experience
desc: My check-in timing was agreed through an email-but ended up waiting pass 3pm to check-in. Due to that when asked whether is it possible to check out later-but what was given was an additional 1hr but that was after asking them 3 to 4 times.

title: Old Bed Mattresses
desc: The bed mattress maybe full of bugs, body itchy and cannot sleep well. Beneath the bed linen may have bugs. Please use indoor slipper to avoid feet itchy. Do not ask for complimentary room upgrade. You will be sad. No extra table as we tried requested. A small working table.

title: Recommended!
desc: Great hotel with great rooms and food! Would definitely recommend to others. Friendly staff and good customer service. The food from Straits Kitchen was superb too. The breakfast selection came in a lot of varieties.

title: Great for family staycation
desc: The hotel staffs are friendly and observant. Suggested connecting rooms for my family with 3 young children. My stay was comfortable and pleasant without worries about my children running in between rooms along the hallway. Staff were nice and did not mind my children running at the lobby too. It was a regret that the pool was under renovation but it‚Äôs raining season now so it didn‚Äôt really matter if the pool was available or not.

title: Clean and big room
desc: Room is clean and big, it was a really comfortable stay. Bed is comfortable and bathroom is bigger than many other hotels. Location is convenient and nearby many eateries. Staffs were friendly and helpful. A very nice stay!

title: Staycation
desc: Room was fancy and clean, stay experience was rather good. Love the location as it is convenient to move around within Orchard area. Staff were attentive to details of stay and requests. Recommended hotel to stay for travel/staycation!

title: Staycation
desc: Room was beyond my expectation, it was spacious. Well maintain and cleaned. The location is also another plus point. Lots of eatery and shopping areas. However parking is a bit difficult as the space for parking is not much.

title: Awesome staycation with family
desc: Had booked two rooms for this stay with 3 kids (15, 13 & 9). Celebrated wedding anniversary on this day too. Wonderful amenities were arranged to the room. Will definitely book again soon. Thank you so much

title: Warm & Gracious Hosts
desc: Booked a night stay at the deluxe king room for my parents. Staff of hotel were all warm & gracious hosts upon entering hotel. My parents enjoyed their staycation. Halal breakfast was awesome. Special thanks to Ms Tiara & Mr Fadzrul for the cookies delivered to my parents‚Äô room. It was a thoughtful gesture for my dad‚Äôs belated birthday üëçüèª

title: Anniversary & Birthday
desc: We had a breeze and early check-in made possible by ever-helpful Ms Fateha with much thanks. The room is spacious as always and comfortable during my 3D2N stay together with my family. Will surely come back for future family staycation soon.

title: Excellent Service
desc: I've stayed in a few hotels in Singapore and this is one I can definitely see myself returning too. Location and value were great, easy to get to all parts of the city and also Orchard Road. Grand club lounge is a plus with excellent service. Hotel felt clean and staff always on hand to help. Thank you Ken Foo, Ivy and Careen for taking care us so well ü•∞

title: Worthy
desc: Excellent customer service especially the GSO and HSKP that attend to my need and request. This is my repeat visit. Unable to enjoy the swimming pool for my stay due to maintenance works. Will definitely come back to enjoy the facility. Other than that everything worth the penny. Highly recommended for friends or couple or even family for staycation.

title: Customer service was subpar. I really expected better.
desc: Went with wife & young children for staycation to celebrate wedding anniversary. To be honest, I had a more pleasant experience at Mandarin Oriental, Fairmont and Hilton. Customer service at Grand Hyatt was subpar and buffet was limited. Was promised a cake but not delivered. I expected, and have experienced, better at other establisments. Just my two cents worth: was underwhelmed by the experience and will look elsewhere for future staycations.

title: bad experience with grand hyatt hotel
desc: bad experience for my first booking of grand hyatt hotel.The hotel staff totally ignore the request from customer.Totally spoil my proposal of marriage .Wrong decision make for choosing grand hyatt hotel

title: Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: Room is big and clean... staff is nice and friendly. From Check-in that day to Check-out that day all very smooth. Location is good with lot of shopping centre around it. And not to mention good food also.

title: The place for free & easy staycation
desc: This is our second stay at Hyatt. Our previous experience was superb & so we came back for our year-end staycation. The deluxe room was spacious. The shower was excellent & the staff was polite. We‚Äôll be back.

title: Impeccable Customer Service!
desc: Staffs were very friendly and helpful. Very nice local food at the Straits Kitchen restaurant (do make your reservations early to avoid disappointment). Overall a very positive experience. Highly recommended.

title: As good as its name Grand :)
desc: My first time at grand Hyatt. Staff check in was good in them trying to fulfil your room request. The check in queue was a bit long however a lot was make up for by the room (spacious at 54 sqm with a separate living and bedroom area including like a pantry area at the door). Excellent location at just 6 minutes walk from orchard.. it had it all.. ‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: Well Maintained Hardware & Polished Service
desc: Pre-arrival communication with Karen was pretty good who acknowledged the requests yet manages expectations. The welcome by Katherine at the Member's Desk was one of, if not, the best welcomes I have ever experienced at any hotel. Her calming manner and pacing was a class act. She addresses the requests and was informative without being overwhelming or rushed. Afternoon tea at straitskitchen was pretty good, chefs for most sections were cheerful and were generous in their recommendations. Waitstaff were also happy at work engaging well with the modest crowd and when communicating with one another. Housekeeping though not encountered staged the room very well. Club staff are often held to a higher regard but generally met expectations. Sarah was the standout at the club with

title: EXCELLENT
desc: Like any other Hyatt, Grand Hyatt Singapore maintains the professionalism of taking care of its customer greatly. Always happy to stay here. Its employees are very helpful and always happy to help. Very clean especially in this Covid era. The food they have are very good too.

title: Great location, iconic Grand Hyatt ambiance
desc: This is one of the most conveniently located hotels in Singapore, just a few steps from Orchard Rd, ION and Orchard Rd MRT station. It is one of the world's most iconic Grand Hyatts. The staff are amazing and the food at the Straits Kitchen and the MezzaNine Restaurants is simply fantastic.

title: Old and in need of renovation and training
desc: Avoid this hotel at all costs if you value good quiet sleep, modern and new rooms and expect service levels to match price. If you don't mind overpaying, not sleeping well because of constant running, furniture shuffling and wrestling, carrying your own bags in and out on check in and out, cheap and tasteless instant coffee packets and electrical sockets that are so word they won't hold your plugs properly while paying for a 5-star hotel - this is your hotel!

title: Pleasant stay and enjoyed
desc: It was a great stay my little girl is the one enjoy it so much. Although the amenities is closed we still manage to enjoy the stay.. my baby enjoying the bathtub.. üòÇ.. We had a good sleep its quiet in the room‚Ä¶ breakfast its also good (laksa is a must) ‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: It was just OK
desc: Pool and spa was closed. The location is good. The bathroom had some issues of water temperature. Due to maintenance ongoing of all amenities, almost nothing to do in the hotel. Staffs are good and evening free flowing cocktail(you need to take it separately) was very good.

title: Staffs were helpful and friendly
desc: Had an incident and the room were full of mess and vomit. The staffs and manager in charge handled it well and clear everything till there is not even a smell. They even sent humidifier and diffuser. The hotel stay there at hyatt has always been pleasing, staffs friendly and the breakfast always so fulfilling delicious m üòä.

title: Staycation at Grand Hyatt
desc: Great Experience, will definitely stay again! Room was clean, requests were fulfilled and customer service team level of efficiency level is high. central of orchard, which makes everything so accessible.

title: Luxurious Stay in the Heart of Orchard
desc: Our first impression was the size of the room, as it was a size of suite compared to other hotels. We were assigned a Deluxe room with bathtub. The room was well insulated from outside noise. The king bed was comfortable and spacious for our night's stay. Breakfast served from StraitsKitchen did not disappoint us, the variety was just nice and food quality was beyond expectation. The only regret was not staying longer with Grand Hyatt. We look forward to going back for future stays.

title: Best Grand Club Lounge
desc: "Affordable price, excellent location! Very smooth reservation process, very friendly service everywhere in house, clean & large room, a very pleasant stay at the heart of Singapore, in the middle of practically everything!" I want to rate ur Grand Club Lounge as one of the best in town with the service and evening cocktail. Thanks to Ken, New Azizah and both sister Careen n Julia. ü•∞ü•∞

title: Not recommended at all...
desc: I don't feel welcoming from your team when I want to book for the breakfast appointment... And I am disappointed the special requests for our simple room request was not even fulfill... For instance on a higher floor & at least unblocked view... And the promise for our Anniversary like the cake was not even fulfill until we called to check, in addition, complimentary mini bar, your staffs told us that they purposely took all the chargeable items and only left a small bag of chips & chocolate bar & 6 cans of soda drinks... We had been visited Fullerton Hotel, Conrad Hotel, Park Royal Hotel in Singapore... And to be honest, their service was far more better than Grand Hyatt Singapore... We were upset that our 8th Anniversary celebration was not an enjoyable in Grand Hyatt

title: Average experience in the hotel
desc: I was expecting an excellent service from the hotel since it is a 5 star hotel. A week before arriving, i received an email regarding of pre-registration. It was so called a "cut queue" where i do not have to queue for check in. So i thought when i arrive, i would get to check in right away as i am with my mum which is in wheelchair but still, i have to queue to check in. Even tho, i was quite long queue but it didn't took long to reach the counter. Next, i requested a complimentary parking ticket for my brother to came in to park but when he arrived to the entrance of the carpark of the hotel, the staff told him to park at Marriot Hotel as Grand Hyatt parking is full. According to them, he can use the complimentary parking ticket of Grand Hyatt hotel. But when my brother wanted

title: Great Staycation Experience
desc: Had a great staycation at Grand Hyatt. The hotel is conveniently located in busy Orchard Road yet it is not rowdy. We stayed in the Executive suite which has a spacious living area and bedroom. Hotel room is generally quiet.

title: Staycation
desc: Room is surprising quite and cool despite some renovation on the other wing of hotel. Breakfast and dinner are of Asian flavour in Straits Kitchen are delicious and very filling. We recommend the BBq ribs, chicken rice and freshly prepared prata.

title: Top notch hospitality
desc: Feels like home with staff gladly accommodating to your request. Friendly and helpful too. Great location with malls within walking distance. Would always choose hyatt for staycations and events. Knowledgeable staff

title: Celebrated our 29th Anniversary in the same hotel we wedded
desc: Probably our 5th stay this year at Hyatt! It has everything to offer, great room, service and at the center of shopping and dining! Were pleasantly surprised by the card & cake left in the room when we checked in!

title: Singapore Grand Hyatt for 10 days
desc: Staff service was exellent. Rooms were cleaned well every day. Hallway carpet needs cleaning. Disappointed to find out the pool was closed until Jan 2022. Don't know the reason why. I don't think it's due to COVID protocols because my previous stay at another hotel had their pool open for all guests.

title: Amazing wedding reception and stay
desc: Held our wedding reception at Grand Hyatt recently and it was amazing. We are grateful to the wonderful team at Grand Hyatt for their effort in ensuring that our wedding reception went well and we were very well taken care of throughout. A number of our guests also commented that the food was delicious! We also enjoyed the comfortable stay in our suite. Special mention and thanks to our wedding coordinator Justina Yang (event planning manager at Grand Hyatt) who went out of her way to help us in every way she can and gave numerous good advice to help us along our wedding planning.

title: Value for money!
desc: Overall a very value stay with good service! The check in was smooth and little no no waiting time. Hotel was able to accommodate to my request for the room types. Room was clean and tidy. Bathtub is big as well. Room is big for family.

title: 2D1N staycay
desc: Service was great from the start, wonderful staff. Deluxe room was mostly clean and spacious, with a living room, mini bar, bedroom and en suite. There were complimentary drinks, luxury toiletries (but note that there's no toothbrush/toothpaste, shower cap, sanitary bag), etc. The kettle wasn't properly cleaned so we had to clean it ourselves. It's a small matter, but considering the price it's something worth noting. Otherwise a lovely stay.

title: Relaxing stay in the middle of busy town area
desc: Room 1003 - King Room Hotel & Rooms looks old but was well maintained. Room was spacious with a separate sofa. We need to wait for some time for A/C to get really cold. Wifi was stable. Breakfast was delicious with lots of varieties but only 2 slots - 730am & 915am. Location was too good - Needless to say. Checking in was quick though I saw a queue forming up after I was done. Sleep was actually good but was awaken due to some loud noise from outside the window around 6am - I guess it's the next building starting up their machinery.

title: Celebrating my husband‚Äôs birthday.
desc: I had a good stay at grand hyatt! the place was huge! love the fact that the bathroom is covered with marble tiles and it was nice. but if there‚Äôs smart tv, it will be better. and there‚Äôs a lot of foods nearby! so convenient!

title: Better than expected
desc: Room is huge and clean. Location is excellent and it is within the heart of Orchard Road. Many shopping centers and food choices within walking distance. Check in prompt and fast and the check in staff is able to cater to our special request.

title: Experience Staying at Hyatt Singapore
desc: Convenient location near the city center and comfortable place for staycation. Room was clean and reasonable spread at Club Floor n breakfast buffet. Check in n checkout were fast and convenient. Would recommend to everyone.

title: Check in
desc: I was a guest in room 1924 I check in @1500hrs and was told that my booked room is not ready. I waited for 3 hours sadly they only released my room @1800hrs I was so disappointed that I waited for 3 solid hours just to check in to my booked room. And the reception front desk personnel didn't even apologise. It's totally a sad episode for me and my partner. The booking was made for my birthday staycation celebration. My birthday was on the 3rd of November

title: Great stay, great buffet
desc: I don't know what people were expecting but I wasn't expecting such a huge room. Dinner and breakfast buffets were great. Staff were excellent, shoutout to asst manager Shari for being especially attentive and thoughful to my mom and I during our dinner buffet at Straits Kitchen. Room was a tad dusty but not insane that it's a distraction from the general cleanliness of the room.

title: Pleasant Stay
desc: It was a good getaway from the covid-19 fatigue! Staff was all friendly, warm and welcoming. Room was clean and we had a nice garden view! It‚Äôs my 2nd stay this year! Room price was also reasonable! Looking forward to my next stay there!

title: Amazing Staycation
desc: We had an amazing birthday celebration complete with dinner. Free upgrade for my partner's birthday and colouring sets for my daughter, everything was just perfect. Except that they misspelled our names, walking into the room looking at our names misspelled was just a turn off. Other than that, Mezza9 was perfect, our whole experience was so frickin smooth. We are planning to come back for my mother's birthday here next month.

title: One of the best hotels to stay in for a staycation and short break.
desc: Just a classy hotel with all around good service! Will definitely return with my family. Everything was clean and rooms were spacious, the concierge Faisal and Kavind were top notch, so too Fiqah the lady who helped us check-in and check-out. Splendid experience all around.

title: Overall is good
desc: Was there for honeymoon, hotel room was bigger than usual and in a very gd location in orchard. However swimming pool and fitness centre is closed. Could let us know in advance before we book instead of letting us know only after booking.

title: Awesome
desc: Great price package that comes with breakfast and dinner, hassle free check in/out, friendly and helpful staff, nice, clean and big room, food was great and a whole range of delicious spread, location wise was superb in d heart of busy city, in simple totally awesome experience and will be back for sure

title: 1 night stay with family
desc: The only care I experienced was during the breakfast buffet. Attentive wait staff. I rarely stay in a 5-star hotel, so I called 'Guest Services' on the phone in my room to ask which items were complimentary. The staff on the phone asked, "What items do you have?" I said: "Truffle chips, Alpen bar, Monogram tea, coffee, sugar and Coffeemate, and soda." She replied, "They're all complimentary." Sensing that something was amiss, I repeated my question and pointed out that my room had six cans of soda in the mini bar. The staff reassured me again, "They're all complimentary." I went to the lobby and checked with the express checkout staff as she was not tending to any customers, and she said only the coffee, tea, sugar and Coffeemate were complimentary, along with the four bottles

title: Bed
desc: The bed and pillows need to upgrade. Especially the pillows quality is not up to the standard. They need seriously to look into it in order to let the customer have a present stay and sleep during their stay.

title: Great Experience
desc: Room was great, very clean n spacious‚Ä¶ equipments we‚Äôre all working fine‚Ä¶check in was smooth n easy, rooms made available before check in time. Gave in to my request for connecting room, very happy and satisfied

title: A perfect staycation
desc: This hotel is one of the best. Couldn't find much fault. The water pressure on the rainwater shower is perfect for that calm meditating moment. Location is gd as it's at the heart of Orchard. Service staff was polite and courteous. Will come back again one day.

title: Poor food selection and quality
desc: Had dinner at Straits Cafe at the Grand Hyatt Singapore. The food selection was limited. The chilly crab was not fresh. The desert was not of good quality. The carpark gantry was faulty resulting in a long que going into the carpark. We were turned away and asked to park at Tangs with the promise of complimentary parking coupon. However when used exiting the carpark, it was invalid! Adding another $9+ into the bill! The service however was impeccable. Will NOT be returning anytime soon‚òπÔ∏è.

title: ALPHA FAMILY DAY STAYCATION
desc: MY first time having a staycation at Grand Hyatt under the courtesy of my division for our Alpha Family Day. Love the room as its spacious and clean. The garden view from the room is nice. All staff were friendly and knowledgeable. Breakfast is good and love the interior of the hotel.

title: Can be better
desc: 5 star hotel, with a 5 star expectations, but I felt only 2 star experience hence the rating Had a staycation here and some pros and cons Check in is rather easy, but getting an early check in is rather difficult compared to other hotels i been too. Waiting 2 hours for room, and funny enough is only after i chase them i was suddenly just given a room. Seems like there was room available but they wont give it to me earlier, upset with that Room is bigger than typical hotels, had a separate living room and decent size bathtub. Bed is king or super king but its quite hard. Same for pillows, very hard Unfortunately i was given a room facing the large air vent of the neighbouring building and it was quite noisy throughout Air con is weird being that it stops running once the room

title: Excellent Hotel !
desc: My family & I enjoyed our stay very much! Smooth & pleasant experience from check-in, to in-room dining, to check-out. We enjoyed the tub especially as the pool was under renovation. My son was very happy nonetheless. Room was clean & very comfortable. Definitely will come back again. Thank you!

title: Comfortable staycation
desc: Very comfortable stay. Request for a birthday cake at the last minute. And they send up to my room. Thank you. Looking forward to staying at this hotel soon. Nice bathroom as well. Very good location. Fast check in as well.

title: Staycation
desc: This is my 3rd holiday in this hotel ..comparing few other 5 star hotels in singapore I stayed. Biggest deluxe room hotel with wall in wardrobe. Hope to stay again before next year. Thank you grand Hyatt for making my stay rebooted.

title: A Grand Stay With Great location
desc: Arguably one of the best location for a hotel. Currently it is undergoing renovation thus some facilities are limited or closed. Easy to step out of the hotel within minutes to reach the stretch of shopping district. Food selection were great. We had dinner and breakfast at Straits kitchen and food was well liked by both kids and adults. With the covid measures still enforced, staffs tried to make it as accommodating as possible without risking any protocols. Room is clean though its dated looking. That is probably why they are going for a major renovation in the other wing.

title: Excellent Stay!
desc: We received several emails after our booking to highlight making reservation for pre-registration check in, reservation of our breakfast slots etc, all these were done through an app and was confirmed immediately. As our booking came with 2 free buffet dinners, the hotel staff called up personally to confirm that they have helped to reserve the table for us. So sweet of her! Our check in and check out was a breeze. The Deluxe King room was very spacious and very well maintained. One day is too short!

title: Almost there but need to improve in certain areas.
desc: Hotel is worn out. Shelves below bathroom sink need to be cleaned. Pls upgrade TVs to smart TVs. Unable to just switch on one specific spot light in living room. Usb charging ports are v. slow. Best thing I cld rem were the firm mattress and good location.

title: Better than expected
desc: Rooms are big and price are affordable . Customer service are excellent and all of my requested things are all fulfilled . Location wise , not ulu where you cant find shops . Easy to find a place to have our lunch and dinner .

title: Good Anniversary-Moon hotel to goü•∞
desc: The hotel is better than expected , very spacious and comfortable to be at . Totally recommend .. and not forgetting the area of the hotel, so accommodating.. near to mrt , mall, best part , FAR EAST .. can have your lunch dinner at there ..

title: Nice big junior suite
desc: A junior suite at offer of $200 was really a good deal. Rooms had very good sound proofing and though room was facing busy main road we could not hear the traffic. Room facilities were complete and beds very comfortable.

title: Great experience !
desc: It was a warm and welcoming environment .While checkin ,when I informed the staff about my husband birthday for that day,she immediately told me she will sent a request for a cake to be sent to our room later.Such a sweet and nice gesture from her. For our breakfast,thou in Covid situation,the services in the Cafe was still superb! Will sure book the hotel again in the future.

title: Hotel of Choice
desc: Warm hospitality, rooms are spacious and very family-friendly, freedom to move around the premises despite the need to abide by the current Covid safe distancing measures, ease of check-in and check-out.

title: The Hyatt experience
desc: The hotel staff was super friendly and everything was efficient, the only thing is that the TV does not have netflix, other than that, perfection. I spent 2d1n to spend time with my wife as it was his birthday and the breakfast spread was the best one I‚Äôve seen so far.

title: Excellent customer service
desc: Staffs have really make our day. Two thumbs up to Fateha for able to arrange a nice and cozy smoking room for us,Syafiqah for checking on availability for late check out and Tiara for their patience in managing our amenities request and needs since I have 3year old daughter.

title: Jack hammering and construction noise
desc: Jack hammering starting at 8AM on Saturday - what a joke. Big renovation is going on at the hotel. Avoid the hotel unless you get a room facing Scotts Road. Construction work never finished till late 9pm with slamming of metal bars here and there. Complained but to no avail. A disappointed stay and this is the last time for me at ‚Äú Hyatt‚Äù - stick to Marriott or Hilton.

title: Fantastic Hotel & Enjoyable Staycation
desc: The location of Grand Hyatt was the legendary shopping street, Orchard Rd. it is where the shopping and food is. Very convenient and the MRT station is very efficient. The rooms were very spacious and we had a comfy stay. The wardrobe area & bathroom is nice and huge. The generosity of providing bottled water should be applauded! There were by your bedside, in the lounge tables, at the mini bar, etc. The dinner & breakfast was delicious and many choices! Definitely will return again just for that! And the best part we did not expected we got 2 instead of 1 complimentary cake fm the hotel for our wedding anniversary!! Thank you Grand Hyatt Hotel Singapore! Highly recommended if it's within your budget!

title: 4 stars for a 5 star Hotel
desc: 1) TV reception was intermittent and when it rained, reception went off. 2) Certain things were not working correctly. At least the space and layout was appropriate. I did enjoy the stay nevertheless.

title: Wonderful stay
desc: A repeat visit. The spacious and very clean room never fails to impress. Staff from entrance to check in to F&B to housekeeping are well trained, polite and professional. Express check out is always a pleasure to have. Definitely worth recommending!

title: Amazing Stay and Outstanding Service
desc: One of the best staycay i've had. Breakfast and dinner was superb. Definitely need a smoking corner to be located in the hotel, just like how some other hotels do. For a smoker, it's hard for me to smoke because this hotel is located in Orchard, where i had to go to another location to smoke at the designated smoking area.

title: Best staycay!
desc: Booked a 6pm late check in and 3pm late check out with Grand Hyatt and it is the best timing for a well rested staycay. Room is spacious and bathtub is huge. Love it! Have halal restaurant on ground floor. Will come back next year for our yearly anniversary celebration.

title: 4 star hotel experience in 5 star establishment
desc: Considering myself staying in many t star establishment, this was one of the worst experiences i had. From slow check-in, to ordering of tea without tea leaves (only hot water provided), forgetting to allocate welcome admineties, forgetting to provide utensils requested for room service, to lack of understanding of signed up package at front desk, spoiled shower where water was erratic turning from warm to very hot, air con temperature issues and harder than usual bed felt more like a 3 to 4 star establishment. Even parkroyal beachroad 4 star hotel seems much better.

title: Big n spacious room
desc: Everything from booking to check was smooth. Had pleasant stay. Breakfast was good. Staff was friendly. Highly recommended for staycation. Sad the pool was closed for renovation. Check in and check was eady and simple. Location is 5star.

title: Beautiful stay
desc: Excellent stay with family. Shopping centers nearby. Only thing is there was no swimming pool which was known to be after booking. however the overall stay was pleasant. love to come back after the Pool had been restored.

title: Overall a Good Experience with GrandHyatt, but there is still room to improve
desc: Dedicated staff who arranged us packed food as we were checking out extra early during our last day in Singapore. Check-in process can be improved further to make guest feel 'at home' and easy in accessing to the use of facilities and breakfast restaurant in the hotel. We were not told anything about the change of policy ie. booking for breakfast slots or wifi password. The Digital Concierge is useless, can't even understand our request (using chatbot). Failed in booking my breakfast slots, ended up I called the operator....

title: A well rested stay.
desc: A one night stay on the x‚Äômas eve. The room was spacious, clean, comfortable and amenities were well selected. The discounted rate was very affordable for a 5 star hotel. The water pressure for the shower was awesome. Though the room was a bit dated but there‚Äôs nothing to dislike about the stay.

title: Spacious and cozy room!
desc: Booked it for my anniversary staycation! Staff was thoughtful enough to serve us a complimentary mini cake! Room was clean, spacious and cozy. Given us a bathtub toilet, check in process was a breeze. Overall, a pleasant stay and experience. Highly recommended!

title: Staycation
desc: Hotel is rather old but interior still well maintained. There were flies in the room. Room has no view. It‚Äôs facing Scotts residences. Mini bar could have a variety of drinks. It would be nice if there‚Äôs toiletries like: comb and shaver.

title: Huge standard entry level room at very reasonable rates at Orchard
desc: And with a huge bath/toilet that is compatible with the higher tiers in other hotels, what more can one ask? Feels like a suite! Hotel is not new, but the condition of the room, bedding, bath and electrical installations is tip top. Helpful and friendly chambermaids (very important to me). Certainly a value for money hotel at Orchard area. I will certainly book Grand Hyatt again!

title: Best Hotel Stay
desc: Excellent service from the minute I step out of my car till I left. From the valet to the Concierge we‚Äôre very helpful. Awesomeness to the max. Have shared this experience with everyone in my social circle and some are even looking for dates to book a stay.

title: 3D2N
desc: It is in town area. Shopping is not a problem. Hotel is old with some equipment need to be fix especially the toilet. Breakfast limited choices. When staying in Malaysia with same 5star hotel standard we have more variety but not HYATT.

title: Excellent location & warm hospitality
desc: Hyatt is located in the heart of Orchard. The hotel has a Halal kitchen & made dining in easier for Muslims. Also, the hotel is not very strict as to check on every single guests like some hotels. This make us comfortable & not intimidated.

title: Amazing Suite stay at Grand Hyatt
desc: *Double Suite stay updates - Grand Hyatt* One of the most luxurious hotel rooms in Singapore. If you like to stay in luxury, this is the suite to experience. Double Suite is a two storey (penthouse) room on the 20th floor of the Grand Hyatt comprising all modern amenities in a 1250 square ft. Room.
