The lower level has a 6 seater conference table for meetings, a work desk with table light, a B&O speaker for music lovers, a 5 seater sofa and coffee machine along with other stuff. The higher level has king sized bed, a smaller work table (with a view) chair with foot rest, wardrobe, a full sized bath tub. The stay at double suite comes with Grand Lounge access with soft drinks and light snacks till 6PM. The Grand Lounge serves alcoholic drinks from 6PM TO 8PM with medium to

title: Grand hyatt Stay!
desc: Rooms were spacious and adequate room available; recommend for families considering a place to stay in Orchard Room. Easy check in process and free parking for hotel guests; car park can get full at times so need to park at Mariott i understand from other guests.

title: Excellent staycation
desc: Our 3 days & 2 nites stay at Grand Hyatt was excellent. Everything was great fm the staff (pleasant & friendly), hotel condition (clean & nice) & location was convenient. Highly recommended & will return.

title: Excellent stay at Grand Hyatt
desc: Very clean, comfortable and spacious. Definitely a worthwhile stay! Customer service is prompt and excellent. Location is excellent with good restaurants choices nearby, as well as value for money options at the Far East Plaza just next to it.

title: Xmas staycation
desc: Pros: fabulous breakfast, very attentive & friendly staff, big room size Cons: wear & tear in room, some dusty fabric caused allergy, kettle looked dirty Suggestions: nesspresso machine, Air purifier?

title: Great location to wonder around orchard Road.
desc: I love the location as it is easy to wonder around orchard road. Nearby Takashimaya, Isetan, Tangs and Ion. Can do lots of shopping and then back to the Hotel to take a break. I love the huge room as I was on the 20th floor the view was view. The breakfast is excellent even thought there are only two timeslot and we didn't manage to get the 9:15 slot and have to settle for the 7:30 am slot which means waking up early. The latte is great to wake me up.

title: Great hotel stay. Convenient and friendly staff
desc: Grand Hyatt is a great hotel to recommend. Convenient location, great spacious bedrooms and clean fittings. The room interior is great and spacious. Comes with complementary drinks in fridge and some small snacks. Fully equipped with all essentials. Will definitely revisit again. (hopefully more improvements next round =D)

title: Clean hotel. Excellent room size and toilet. Water pressure is great!
desc: Fantastic stay at Level 20. Towels and robes are changed daily. Size of room and bathroom were amazing. The bathroom and vanity area make taking a shower and putting on makeup such a joy. Room promptly cleaned and when I requested for extra duvet and towels, my queries were attended to.

title: 1 night stay in Grand Hyatt
desc: Great place. 2nd stay here, Used SRV and it was value for money. Breakfast was also nice with a lot of variety. Hope there‚Äôs great deals in the future so i can stay here again. Receptionist Fiqah made the check in smooth.

title: Staycation @ Grand Hyatt
desc: Room is spacious and clean! Check-in is easy. Service is good and staff are helpful. Location is convenient . However, breakfast is a little disappointing. Overall, I‚Äôm happy and satisfied with our stay.

title: Celebrating our anniversary
desc: Overall a present stay at Grand Hyatt. We have a cake and a card for my anniversary. As requested we are given a room with bath tub. But no early check-in as recently the hotel was quite packed. Location is super convenient for shopping and food üòä

title: Great Hotel to Stay!
desc: The room was super spacious, got a k8ng size bed and a hall with bathtub!! Saffs are friendly. Check-In was simple. Great location! Overall Satisfied! You may choose Grand Hyatt as one of the ideal family vacation. :)

title: Statycation at Grand Hyatt
desc: I was a little disappointed with the service as I was promised a garden view room but ended being given road view. Even when they promised the room it was not ready even after 30 minutes. Had to take the road view room to avoid further waiting. The earlier staff did not hand over my matter to the new staff after shift change. Had to go through the whole thing with the new staff only to be told that the new room is still not ready.

title: Extended stay at the Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: I would like to mention some of the staff that really made my stay specially enjoyable. Ken Foo, Careen Gan, Julie Gan, and the whole Club Lounge Crew. They are so dedicated to excellent performance. They make you feel like family. Every evening I spent at the Club Lounge was special thanks to the professionals that work hard to make your visit a one of a kind visit. I feel I have made life time friends and look forward to my next extended stay at the Grand Hyatt in Singapore.

title: Excellent staycation at Hyatt
desc: Thanks for the great hospitality and service. We had a wonderful experience and we love to return to the hotel for another staycation. The room was very clean and spacious. Food selection was great and tasty. Love the experience with Grand Hyatt.

title: Great stay
desc: Had a great stay. Got our room early at 1.30pm. Room was a bit dated but spacious. Didnt get to explore the pool as it was under renovation. Had breakfast at the Straits Kitchen. Great selection & tasty. Club Lounge selection was average. Staff were friendly & attentive. Will be back when the hotel completed renovation.

title: Vacation to Singapore
desc: Excellent staff Excellent location out-dated rooms (fixtures/fittings) Excellent room service/food Swimming pool was under renovation. No indication of this on the hotel website (as far as I am aware). Would've been nice to know if this is the case. Hotel should have contingency/tie up with next door hotel (if any) to allow their guests to use another hotel's pool.

title: A great stay but crappy breakfast
desc: The room was spacious and clean. The bathtub was good. It is near town area. The breakfast was subpar, not up to my standard. The standard has dropped. There was little choices and the time was limited.

title: Excellent Friendly Service. Second home. Fanatastic location
desc: Located in a fabulous area with ease of excess and areas of vibrant activities. Staff are friendly, attentive and helpful. The feeling of homely comfort. Thumbs up for delicious foods served in the restuarants. Overall a truly amazing memorable experience.

title: Staycation at GH Corporate Suite
desc: We booked a staycation at GH corporate suite recently for our baby first birthday. Unfortunately, we have to wait for more than 3 hours for our room to be ready. the staffs were nice to give us another small room to temporary hold us but one of them told me the latest time i will get my room will be 5pm. at 453pm i called the front desk, they said my room not ready, need another 30 mins. finally we managed to check in the suite at 6pm and we have to rush to prepare our dinner. We were also not able to check out late because there are next guests coming in. aside from this unfortunate incident, i must say the suite room is nice and spacious.

title: Spaciousness
desc: Had checked in for a one-night staycation and was delighted with room size and cleanliness. Hotel was centrally located in town and great for shopping. Dinner at Pete‚Äôs Place was alright as expected but with limited choices.

title: An excellent long-stay at the best place to experience the heart of Singapore
desc: I have had a long stay at Grand Hyatt. I have stayed in multiple five stars across the globe (I am Titanium Elite with Marriot & Globalist with Hyatt), and writing this review from that perspective. Orchard road is the heart of Singapore, with so many malls, hotels, restaurants, spas. The road is beautiful and visited by tourists and locals with equal enthusiasm. Grand Hyatt is located very near to it - but still isolated from all the noise you may expect. The hotel is 'grand' as the name suggests. The entrance casts the first impression of grandness with beautiful stairs leading up to Mezza 9. The decor with lot of use of wood and marble looks classy. The hotel is full of multiple nice restaurants (Mezza 9 is my favourite) and nice lounges (10 Scott‚Äôs, the Grand lounge) and

title: Best view of Scotts Road
desc: Smooth & easy check-in, always get the best view for our stay. Best deal from Klook & big room for my little family. My daughter definitely loves the bathtub & my husband like the bedroom because got bidet. üòÇ

title: Convenient & comfortable!
desc: My family and I always look forward to our stay with Grand Hyatt! We love its convenience, very accessible to many shopping malls, cafe & restaurants. Their rooms are very private and super comfortable! Supermarket is just next door!

title: very clean & spacious room
desc: very friendly and helpful staff. very clean and spacious room with attached living room or working area to enjoy my staycation. Only slight issue is late check-in by 1.5 hrs which hotel automatically compensated with 1.5 hrs late check-out. Overall experience is very good, will be back.

title: Great staycation at Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: Staff service is nice and attentive. Hotel is undergoing renovation and facilities are generally closed. However, the stay was still good due to the service excellence from staff. Careen from Grand Club lounge was very attentive to my children's needs. Will recommend my friends and colleagues to consider their staycation at this hotel.

title: Staycation
desc: Superb hospitality. Awesome rooms. Excellent toilet condition. Extremely satisfied and happy during the stay. Great amenities. Shopping paradise. Food haven. Seamless check in and check out. Ever present frontliners. Thank you.

title: Excellent Staycation at Grand Hyatt
desc: The 2-night stay was very satisfying. Like the room interior design, layout of furniture and beddings, my desired kind of bathroom design and spaciousness. Overall big and clean room. Stayed on the 6th floor. View was alright. Very much wish to be back again.

title: Wedding Anniversary
desc: Celebrated our 26th Wedding Anniversary at Hyatt. We were impressed by the Great Service, clean room , excellent breakfast. Great Valet parking service. Enjoyed our stay there. Will sure recommend them to our friends.

title: Good and spacious rooms
desc: Enjoyed the stay in 2 big spacious rooms with a family of 5. Everything is good, including the locations. The only complaint is the lack of affordable breakfast for family i.e. should let children eat for free. But KFC and McDonalds are just next door as alternative.

title: Great hotel to stay.
desc: Love my stay at the hotel and the environment. Near to shopping malls and for foods. The staff are very friendly & very helpful. Foods are good and delicious at the hotel. Walking distance to shopping center.

title: Fantastic service, rooms and breakfast!
desc: Probably one of the best hotels in Singapore. Rooms are big and clean, staff service is impeccable and breakfast is fantastic. This is my third stay here since the pandemic and would love to return. Good job Grand Hyatt!

title: Reception team needs re-training
desc: Check in experience was just horrible. Came at 3pm during check in, as expected the queue would be long as it is check in time. Bathtub room wasn‚Äôt ready, when asked when will the room be roughly ready, check in staff mentioned ‚Äúoh that depends on the housekeeping‚Äù. I am a fellow hotelier myself, i was shocked that the check in staff did not take ownership at all, which explains the teamwork of the department. She could instead use better choice of words such as ‚Äúi can‚Äôt confirm what time would the room be ready but i will try my best to get the housekeeping to expedite‚Äù. The room for non-bathtub is available however she game me an option to wait for a bathtub room, which i did. Came back at 330 to enquire on my room as i am planning a surprise for a friend, i need the

title: Enjoyable Staycation
desc: We had always loved Grand Hyatt hotel with amazing customer services and huge and comfy room. Only regret was the swimming pool was closed during our stay. Will definitely recommend to friends visiting and families looking for staycation.

title: Recent Stay Experience
desc: Overall experience is good but the check in time takes 2.5 hours waiting. The customer service should give the guest heads up if the check in time will take longer then usual. The room condition is spacious & clean. As for the food, could add on more seafood for the dinner. As the ordering of the beverages is through barcode scanning, waiter should address this approach to diners.

title: Lovely Staycation at Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: Our family had a wonderful staycation at the Grand Hyatt Singapore, after not having been able to travel overseas due to the pandemic. Jeffrey at the front desk was helpful and kind, understood our need for a wheelchair accessible room and put us in a lovely room. Thank you, Jeffrey. We look forward to returning to the hotel again.

title: Staycation
desc: Checkin process is smooth, within walking distance to major Shopping malls in Orchard. Both breakfast and Dinner buffet very good. Received a bottle of complimentary wine which is a nice gesture from Hyatt.

title: Overall, the room is lovely to be in, although I believe it is past time for a renovation.
desc: The staff was extremely pleasant and accommodating. The staff is friendly and helpful, making breakfast and dinner a pleasant experience. The concept of a family room with a master bed and a twin bed room for the kids is a nice one that should be continued.

title: Amazing stay
desc: The staff were friendly and helpful in ensuring that we could navigate around contactless arrangements. Amenities in the room was enough for our stay. Prior to check in, we were already prompted to book for breakfast slot & facilities use. Great job!

title: Pleasure stay
desc: Room is spacious and clean, perfect for family including 4yo and 9mo. Staff were friendly and helpful throughout the stay. Location is perfect for shopping, play and nice restaurant. My son said he loved everything about the hotel stay.

title: Staycation.
desc: A good and enjoyable stay. Would love to come here again for a slightly longer period of time. Looking forward to more promos ahead to make staycation more affordable while we cant travel out of SG with all the restrictions.

title: Wonderful Stay, Excellent Service
desc: First return to Singapore in 22+ months, excellent service and assistance from consierge Kavind in all of the various foreign travel protocols needed. Great hotel locale, will return to the Grand Hyatt!

title: Grand Old Lady still surprises
desc: Grand Hyatt has been around for decades and yet surprisingly they've managed to keep themselves nice, fresh and pristine. Pete's Place continues to serve excellent food at reasonable priced too. The bread in particular was superb!

title: Enjoyable stay but service can be improved further
desc: Stay at Grand Hyatt Singapore for our anniversary. Waiting time for room could be improved. Room given is spacious and very comfortable, with a fantastic view of the street. However, service could be improved further, (guess it's resources constraints). The stay would probably be more fabulous if the swimming pool and gym were opened.

title: Reviee
desc: It was a great stay. Went there with friends. Hotel is clean. Cake is provided for bday occassion. TV channel is limited. Hotel food is great though. Bed is abit hard or stiff. Ammenities provided are good.

title: Hyatt is awesome!
desc: It's been a tiring year and winding down at Hyatt with the awesome bathtub in family suite made our day for this year too! I wasn't expecting the upgrade but the front office truly did their best to make sure my request for bathtub was fulfilled. The suite has big space unlike other hotels. We will definitely consider staying at Hyatt again especially for the cleanliness and it's rain shower! It's so refreshing !

title: Staycation
desc: Disappointed with my stay as compared to my other staycations. Feels like just providing you a room to sleep and offers little to make you feel as if you are on a vacation. There should be more incentives to attract locals to do staycations there and not just for the sake of feeling up the empty rooms due to lack of tourists.

title: 3 Days 2 Nights Stay
desc: Overall experience was a good one. Room was spacious and we were accommodated to our needs. The food was good too. Gym was pretty decent for a hotel. Superb location as it is located within town area. Spoke to one of the operator name, Azura who was really helpful and willing to go the extra mile for us!

title: Grand Hyatt Hotel
desc: Ideal location to shopping & food. Room is clean & spacious for a family of 3. Big bathtub. Check in & check out was fuss free.Breakfast selection was good. A pity that part of the hotel was under going a renovation during our stay. So pool & gym were closed. Overall still a pleasant stay.

title: Great!
desc: Location was in central orchard so walking distance to all malls. Room was clean and big, bed was comfy. Only downside is the choices of tv channels in room. Will book again when there is a good deal.

title: Awesome view!!
desc: The whole process was pleasing, check-in staff was friendly and polite. As I was in need of a Google cast, she has explained the things in detail. Was given 10th floor which has an awesome view in the orchard area. Will definitely come back again for a stay!

title: Huge room
desc: Veri huge room as compare to many other hotel, nice staff, good and nice size for family with kids except the chiller took very long to get my drink cold. Will visit the next time if still got chance.

title: Nice hotel with great rooms layout .
desc: Check in was a breeze. Well managed and not wait too long . Room was spacious and clean . Amenities was good and sufficient . (Balmain amenities). Location was good and near to malls and eateries aplenty beside at Far East . A nice place to go to and stay . Something which can look into is the mattress‚Ä¶ to match the status of the hotel , the mattress can be more comfy ‚Ä¶.

title: Amazing stay
desc: Had a staycay at Grand Hyatt and was so glad that I chose that hotel! Room was spacious and clean and beds were pretty comfy. They had a wide spread of breakfast which were all delicious! Staffs were all so pleasant and professional. Definitely coming back there again.

title: As Grand as it is...
desc: The location of Grand Hyatt Singapore is fantastic! It's right in the shopping area. Restaurants, food and coffee stalls, are also just steps away. The overall stay was very good and keep up with the fantastic service!

title: Staycation at The Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: Went for a staycation at the Grand Hyatt Singapore with my missus. Arrived at the front desk at around 2pm but was told that the room are not ready. Waited till almost 5pm and was told that the room are still in cleaning process. I insisted oh having the room key because my wife wants to use the toilet. When we when top the room, the cleaning made said it was done but then I found and inflated balloon made of condom by the drapes...WTH

title: Pleasant Stay
desc: Their deluxe room is spacious and cosy. Friendly and helpful staff at frontdesk to room service. Breakfast spread was delectable. Would prefer to stay for a longer breakfast period instead of the 90-min rule. Will definitely come back to stay again.

title: Grand Hyatt Delivers!
desc: Overall pleasant stay. Buffet dinner at Straits Kitchen disappointing though. Varieties reduced presumably due to Covid-19. However, believe that the price for walk-ins for the dinner have not been reduced..

title: Excellent
desc: Wonderful experience all around. Halal breakfast makes this hotel o preferred hotel to book in Singapore. The breakfast spread was delicious. Spacious room and the bathtub is deeper than most others. Highly recommended!

title: Wonderful service
desc: Each and every staff that we interacted with were absolutely amazing. Very professional, friendly and welcoming. Thank you, everyone, for the wonderful memories. I want to share about the fantastic service three of your staffs treated us with. Jeffrey checked us in, and he was incredibly joyful, sweet and friendly. He managed to get us a room with a bathtub and a cake for my nephew's birthday! Thank you, Jeffrey. I'm amazed at how cheerful he is even after handling a massive queue of people. He was hilarious and friendly. He made our day! Thank you, you're so awesome! I approached Ronnie at the concierge to enquire about a technical difficulty I was facing when trying to book a slot for breakfast. He tried his very best to scan for the problem, and he recommended me to

title: Lovely hotel!
desc: Really enjoyed the Deluxe Suite. Very spacious and comfortable. Breakfast at Straits Kitchen was delicious too! The hotel is in such a convenient location and staff members were helpful. I look forward to coming back after the renovation upgrades!

title: Staycation at Hyatt Hotel
desc: I was given a room overlooking the garden view. Gigantic room with lots of space. Ultra clean & tidy. Good housekeeping effort. Too short the stay. Next time should try a two nights instead. Well Done team Hyatt!

title: Awesome Staycation
desc: Would like to thank Mr Yunus and Mr Izzul for helping me with my bags and stuffs when i checked in and out they were friendly. Also like to thank Mr Fadzrul concierge for helping me alot with my staycation. Mr Faisal and the concierge team is very friendly and always welcoming me.

title: My surprise encounter
desc: This was my first time staying at Grand Hyatt, I always thought is just another hotel at Orchard. My pleasant surprise when I walked into the room ... a suite with king size bed and a good space for my 2 rooms that I booked. My family enjoyed ourselves, specially this for my husband's forthcoming birthday celebration.

title: Great breakfast service at the Straits Kitchen
desc: The Straits Kitchen team was wonderful at the breakfast service. The restaurant has one of the best breakfast menus in Singapore. We wished we had more than 75 mins, but we understand the constraint. The room was spacious and comfortable. Unfortunately, we had to wait an additional hour for check-in. Service at the reception and concierge were mediocre by Hyatt's standards.

title: Anniversary in Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: I had a pleasant stay in Grand Hyatt Singapore around the end of Jan22. It is for our anniversary. I told the check in counter about it and she offer us a discounted upgrade to a more spacious room. I am very pleased for this gesture and accepted the offer. The room has a living room where a sofa and TV are and a bedroom with a king size bed and another TV. The room has bathtub in the toilet too. We had in room dinning but the food is not that wonderful compare to the room. This makes me feel that the price is abit to the expensive side. The breakfast is buiffet style and have 6 counters. The food is acceptable but the price is also to the expensive side.

title: Great stay
desc: Was surprised at how nice the room was aesthetically and size-wise for the price I had paid. I booked the room via klook, in which I paid around ~$250 for a night. It was so worth the price and the room was absolutely comfortable and beautiful.

title: Marvellous
desc: Very good hotel, strategic location and excellent customer service namely Charisa & Jeffery. The room are very cosy and cleaned. Will strongly recommended to families and friend's with such experiences.

title: Grand Hyatt Singapore Experience
desc: I have stayed at a dozen of hotels over the years and am Platinum member in a few. This is on the top of the list of best stays/experiences ever. Staff was very hospitable and there for every need of mine. Great Breakfast & Lounge experience with a very hospitable team. Excellent property and very convenient location. Thank you so much.

title: So good to be travelling again
desc: With 2 years of no ability to travel outside of Western Australia due to COVID. It was such amazing to be back at Grand Hyatt Singapore, experiancing the way they take care of their guests. It is a wonderful property and the staff are execptional.

title: Great modern room
desc: Stayed in deluxe room. The living room area, bedroom & toilet is awesome. I borrowed HDMI usb from the hotel to watch netflix/youtube from my device. The housekeeping guy (room service) arrived my room promptly when I requested for toiletories. I bought magherita pizza from the hotel and wished that layer of cheese is thicker and maybe add other kind of cheese too (burrata cheese & blue cheese). I like the thin crust dough. Bath tub is big. The rain shower is the best part, the pressure is great, feels just like waterfall! The shower head is great too! 1 thing which I dislike the most is the mattress. Mattress is thin, not posh and not luxury. Mattress is hard and I can feel the spring. I am sure Hyatt can do better with the mattress, as the brand itself speaks luxury and rate

title: Perfect stay for a special occasion
desc: Stayed for one night but I still enjoyed staying at Grand Hyatt. Love the big room and bath tub. Check-in was done at 11am so we left our bags at the concierge. We had a shopping spree and lunch while waiting for our rooms to be ready. Check-out time was done swiftly.

title: Meets minimum expectations
desc: Very poor sound proofing. Especially from the room above, can hear foot steps and door banging. (There's a slim chance, 4 heavy weight champions were staying above me). Broken rollers on toilet door, making the heavy door extremely difficult to close and open. Uncomfortable bed and pillow. Could be due to personal preference. Stayed in a room similar to a junior suite with a living area attached.

title: Awesome experience as always
desc: Hyatt is a place we‚Äôre you feel like this is the place you should be, it is worth the penny you spend. The staff is always there to help you and the services are excellent. The room is spacious and comfortable.

title: External facilities are unavailable but room was wonderful
desc: Although we were disappointed by the lack of external facilities due to the hotels' renovations, the room was wonderful and cozy! Hotel staff were really helpful to provide the spare bed for my daughter. The teeny downside to the room: selection and quality of channels on the tv could be better.

title: Wonderful stay at Grand Hyatt as always
desc: Our 3rd time staying at Grand Hyatt, customer service was fantastic as usual from the moment you walk in, reception and janitors. everything was excellent except that the room which my parents occupied we found a rusty safety pin on the carpet which could possibly cause injury.

title: Staycation
desc: Guest services wasn‚Äôt flexible with my request compared to my stay at 3 star hotel. I requested for a late checkout, for at least one of the room i‚Äôve booked, but they weren‚Äôt flexible enough. For checkin, they gave one room late by one hour, even after accomplices to the pre-booked checkin.

title: Staycation
desc: A very good hotel with great location.Service was excellent and we will definitely book again.Waiting for the reno to complete so we are able to enjoy other hotel facilities but other than that you can enjoyed shopping and walking around Orchard Road.

title: Everything was good except one issue.
desc: Check in was a nightmare. Gave us an online slot (1-3pm). Came down at 1.30pm room was not ready. Came back at 3.15pm still was not ready. Staff said will call but did not. I went back recep at 4.15pm & they said room is ready. If I did not go over & just wait for their calls, i would have waited longer.

title: The best hotel, as always.
desc: Providing Halal food options is our number 1 priority. Straits Kitchen offer delicious wide range of food that we could choose from. Thus staying in Grand Hyatt is the obvious choice for us. The clean room, great bed and friendly staff always made our stay remarkable. Looking forward to stay in Grand Hyatt again. Thanks Grand Hyatt Singapore.

title: Grand Hyatt Staycation
desc: Hotel was busy over the lunar new year weekend but check in still went rather smoothly, although we did not get any information on when the room would be ready. Room itself was comfortable and clean. Loved the huge bed and toilet.

title: Long waiting time for a room
desc: This is not my first time staying in this hotel and I‚Äôm a repeated customer as I thoroughly enjoyed my previous stays here. However, I‚Äôm very disappointed in their service today. I have been waiting for a room for about 3 hours. In fact, I went to the concierge and front desk counter a few times to ask for my room but I was told that I have to keep waiting for my room because the Housekeeping Manager simply have not checked the clean status of the room that they have assigned to me. Honestly, if I‚Äôm going to have this kind of service again, I‚Äôd rather spent my money on another hotel.

title: Excellent Stay
desc: I enjoyed my recent stay, the room was spacious and clean and the staff were very friendly and helpful. The room service was also excellent. Would recommend and I definitely look forward to staying again.

title: A Most Delightful Stay
desc: The Grand Hyatt Hotel provided me with a most beautiful room. Friends dined with me in the room and all of us were most impressed with the service and the cuisine! This was the highlight of my 81st Birthday! Thank you everyone at the Hyatt!

title: Enjoyable staycation.
desc: Friendly staffs, awesome services, clean & spacious room, good housekeeping, nice halal food at Straits Kitchen, conveniently located near amenities with many dining & shopping areas. It was an enjoyable great staycation.

title: One of the best staycation experience I've had in a long while
desc: The room was super-spacious and clean, well-furnished with a king-sized bed and bathtub. Very convenient location in the heart of town, with many shopping and food options within walking distance. Very friendly and efficient customer service. Highly recommended!

title: Staycay
desc: Overall we had an Excellent Staycay Experience with splendid breakfast buffet spread Due to covid situation, with a pre-selected check in time and breakfast time to avoid overcrowding in the lobby and restaurant area, and that kept the waiting time to very minimal.

title: One of the best hotel in Singapore.
desc: This is one of the best hotel that I have stayed in. Great location, great food, great room and really friendly as well as helpful hotel staff. Will definitely stay again.Keep up the wonderful job guys....!!! Thank you so much.

title: Lived up to my childhood memory of it :)
desc: I have stayed in multiple Hyatt hotels around the world when travelling overseas pre-Covid as my dad travelled a lot for work (& would accumulate a lot of points). Hence, when I saw that the rooms at Grand Hyatt Singapore were priced at $200/night, I picked it as the place for my bday staycay. The Deluxe room & bathroom were both spacious & clean- the room was well-maintained & comfortable :) Overall, I really enjoyed my stay and + points for the nostalgic factor hehe

title: Old hotel needing major uplift to it's rooms.
desc: Room is tired looking and old. Ventilation is not great with occasional slight smoke from the smoking rooms. Wide space for each room though. TV channels are limited. Overall, the rooms require a major uplift. Pricely considering the quality of the rooms but I suppose I am paying for location. Will not be staying again unless rooms are renovated.

title: Average stay
desc: Hotel way finding and signage is poor. Suggest to have visible signages leading to reception counter. Staff was very clinical and did service guests with passion. Overall, hotel and room is clean. BUT, there‚Äôre cockroaches in the carpark. Hotel breakfast so so. Sadly, amenities was under renovation.

title: Staycation
desc: Went there to celebrate my anniversary with my girlfriend. They prepared a small special treat for us upon arrival, upon request. Staff were friendly and very accommodating. Would definitely revisit. However I used SRV voucher.

title: Staycations
desc: When we arrive Grand Hyatt Singapore, the staffs greet us at the entrance and help us with our luggage. We went over to check in area at the hotel lobby, there were some queues but the hotel manager immediately break the crowd and invited us to go level 3 for check in. Thumb up for that. After checked in. The bell man immediately brought our luggage up without any delays. The suite were spacious and the city view was beautiful. Clean, good location and friendly services provided by grand Hyatt Singapore. We will come and do staycation again with Grand Hyatt Singapore. Once again, thank you very much for the great hospitality provided by Grand Hyatt and Staffs. Cya soon. Cheers!

title: More than just a memorable experience.
desc: I have my own fav 5 star hotel prior to my stay at Grand Hyatt, but all that has definitely change for us. Love the spaciousness of the room. The bathtub comes with a full size side mirror instead of the usual see through glass. Food is delicious even the in room service. Can't wait for another staycay at Grand Hyatt!

title: Great service, comfortable room, delicious food.
desc: Had a great staycation here. Excellent service rendered by Straits Kitchen staff especially Ivy, Shirl nie ,Chef Ramlah and Mr Othman. Good selection of the buffet spread for breakfast and dinner. Looking forward to come back again soon.

title: Hotel location is good and staffs are all very friendly and helpful.
desc: Overall experience is very satisfied. Staffs are all very friendly and helpful. Most probably will choose same hotel for staycation if promotion price is competitive. Highly recommended for those who not yet stay here before.

title: Thank you Hyatt
desc: Very grateful for Hyatt for giving us a once in a lifetime experience by giving us a complimentary upgrade for our special day. Overall experience is awesome despite a few setbacks. However was eventually handled well.

title: Thank you Fiqah & Ryan
desc: Thank you for Ryan & Fiqah for a wonderful smooth Check-in experience. Both of them are very professional upon check-in with warm greetings. Room will very clean and comes with complimentary mini bar and snacks. Definitely will be back again !

title: Grand hotel with warm service
desc: The hotel's room is very spacious and well equipped! There's a separate bedroom with a King sized bed. The bathroom is very big and spacious, has a rain shower and has a big bathtub! i recommend this hotel! All the staffs are very nice and kind and have very good memory.

title: First Staycation for 2022
desc: This was our first staycation at Grand Hyatt. Check-in was smooth and fast. Huge shoutout to Charisce for accommodating with our request especially since it was our anniversary on 1st Jan :). Her bubbly personality was a signal to a start of an awesome stay and 2022! The room was HUGE! Simply awesome and the housekeeping staff ensure everything was slick and span and they always had a friendly smile when we meet with them. Also compliments to Yen Peng at Straits Kitchen for helping us get seats when we missed our breakfast reservation slot. It was so good being back at SK after all these years! All in all - it was a fantastic experience. We‚Äôll be back!!

title: staycation
desc: Excellent stay. Everything is functioning. The rain shower gave the most enjoyable & luxurious shower because of the good flow of water. The room is spacious. The aircon is quite and does not dries up the air for our comfort.

title: Average for a 5 star hotel, disappointed.
desc: Toilet spray was mouldy, sink was choke, and tea pot provided in the room was not cleaned from the previous guests‚Äô check out, their tea bag was left in the tea pot‚Ä¶ Carpark parking was also not convenient, carpark was stated as full but there was an empty lot in the car park. Called the GHS Gantry carpark service hotline and they were very rude, shouted at us over the intercom. During breakfast, one of the breakfast chef was also very unprofessional and showed a bit of attitude when asked further about the dish. Also note that even though is breakfast slot is at 9.15am, only got in around 9.35am, last order was at 10.15am. Pros is that room is relatively big, front desk was quite friendly. Suggest that Grand Hyatt could re-train their housekeeping staff/kitchen staff

title: It is 5 star, but I have to give it a 4 at this time.
desc: I had high expectations of the Grand Hyatt as the quality in Australia is very high. We were disappointed upon arrival as apparently we didn't read the fine print on the Booking.com website that said the pool and the gym were not available due to renovations. Given the lack of other options we decided to stay. The staff were amazing and did allow us to cancel without penalty. They gave us an enormous room and to be honest in the end it rained so much we would never have used the pool. The hotel is in the perfect position, right next to 4 of the biggest and most popular shopping centres in Singapore Orchard. Close to Imax, close to Far East Plaza, close to MRT, bus, you name it, it is all at this location. The hotel is super busy, but the staff are all friendly, 5 star

title: Couple retreat
desc: Room very clean. Bed superb. Bathroom very clean. Staffs very friendly. Buffett fantastic. City area. A lot of shopping can go. So many malls to shop. Transportation easy to acess. Will recommend to others.

title: Live Up to its Reputation
desc: It has been a while since I see complimentary mini bar with drinks and snacks. Hyatt has been there for a while. I got a big bedroom comes with a living room and a bathtub. King size bed and a window view to Scotts Road. Aircon, Bed and Toiletries all met our expectation. Location is fantastic

title: My Home Away from Home
desc: It's no secret among my family and friends that Grand Hyatt Singapore, with its location and charm, has been my go-to Hotel whenever I catch up with friends in the city. Service always is top-notch at the Grand Hyatt Singapore with the staff willing to go above and beyond. Despite various flaws and imperfections in the rooms, I'm always appreciative of the space in the Deluxe rooms, enough to host friends and work from the hotel. Thank you to the various teams from Front Office and Grand Club to Straits Kitchen for making my birthday staycation a memorable and comfortable one. To Azizah Sulaiman and Jeffrey Janolino, thank you for organising my birthday cake, to Norman, Careen, Thinis, Izzul for your dedicated service every evening in the Grand Club Lounge and to Yan Peng and

title: Perfect stay
desc: Check in took about 20 mins to queue etc but overall was great! Nice room and location is great too! Bathtub was clean, with a shower room. Items in the room are all in working condition. For example, weighing machine, hair dryer and boiler. The hotel is located at orchard, making it very convenient for shopping. Bought a bathbomb at LUSH and do try the sandwiches from Eggslut located near Grand Hyatt.

title: Staycation
desc: A bit dusty at pantry area and small files in the bathroom. Overall room is very spacious. Room is also clean and tidy as daily room cleaning is performed. Breakfast is great as variety of food is available. Great choices of juices to choose

title: Old but Gold
desc: Thanks for Singapore Rediscovery Voucher, I was able to experience this clean and very spacious room! Professional Staff. Smooth check in and out process. Highly recommended. Ideal location with lots of food options as well.

title: Staycation
desc: 2nd time choosing Hyatt for our Staycation. We had a great time n fell in love with the Hotel when we stayed here the 1st time. So we decided to choose Hyatt again for our Staycation this time. Thanks

title: anniversary
desc: super happy with their services! Front office & housekeeping was friendly! in room dining & call centre was fast by picking up the phone calls. Coming from hospitality line i understand how they feel so thank you for your services & stay safe :-)

title: Staycation - Jan 2022
desc: Had an early check in , like around 12noon, with the help of Staff Charise. Very nice of her to allocate my room on the highest level, 21st floor. Very courteous as well Had nice evening cocktails and breakfast as well Though the hotel is old, but the room is super huge - I booked the club access king room. I almost thought it was a suite. Had a good deal by booking directly on grand hyatt website. Friendly staffs especially during breakfast time. Variety of tasty food at Straits Kitchen Club Lounge was super big as well - Had pleasant evening cocktails with canapes. Thank You Grand Hyatt. Good job

title: Best staycation ever!
desc: Stay in grand hyatt for few times and they never disappoint me with their service! Celebrating my nephew 3rd birthday with my family on 1st Jan 2022. I would like say a BIG thank you to these following staffs and managers who make my stay a memorable ones! Azizah, Katherine, Shafiqah, Charise, Jeffrey, Ireen, Tiara, Jamal and Azlina! Kudos to all of you! Surely will be back again in March!

title: Luxurious and comfortable room, but disappointing breakfast.
desc: We booked a King Deluxe with breakfast for 1 night stay on a weekday. More than glad that we were upgraded to a junior suite. The attached living area added comfort to me working from home. However, the room WiFi cannot be connected to my office VPN. Great feeling of luxurious and spacious interior including bathroom, but somehow I sensed a little lack of freshness from bed sheet and pillows. Label reminder to charge smokers for cleaning fee is good testimonial for maintaining its standard on Non-smoking Room policy. Water flow of rainshower was excellent. Toiletries would be more complete with disposable shaver. No significant noises or inconvenience from its ongoing renovation works. Breakfast spread was below expectation. Dim sum, prata and laksa dishes were tasteless. We

title: Quite Average
desc: Quite average would be the word to describe this visit, considering we've been there plenty of times before. Possibly all due to Covid. Check in took too long (til abt 5pm ish?). Should try stagger the check-in & check-out timings. Buffet spread had less options though food quality maintains as best reason to stay there! And they had a mix up with regards to meal and visit confirmation til their sister hotel even started emailing me +_+

title: Perfect Getaway Staycation
desc: I booked this with my SRV and this is on my bucket list to stay for quite sometime now! The stay is perfect and top tier than what I have expected. The staff is really helpful! Would like to stay there again in future sometimes!

title: Excellent Stay and Big Room
desc: The reception staff was very helpful and explained very clearly . Room was big with separate living room. Very comfortable stay. Food at the Straits Kitchen was great. The Asian Buffet spread was with good variety of food and Free flow of juices.

title: Excellent Experience
desc: This hotel has historically offered great rooms, excellent food and beverage, and super service. It is just a bit tired now, but is undergoing a very major renovation, with some facilities and outlets closed, and one room tower unavailable. Still I had no hiccups and enjoyed my stay thoroughly. When the renovation is complete at the end of 2022, this hotel undoubtedly will be the best in Singapore.

title: Good visit
desc: I was greeted with automated greeting to book breakfast time and dinner time but when ask at check in wat time does dinner start at restaurant, staff seems not to know when dinner at straits kitchen starts. Came 1hr early to check in at 2pm but room was ready past 3:30pm although check in was 3pm. I think what‚Äôs the point of automating check in via sms when u still have to register at reception and wait for a sms. My suggestion would be that hotel can allow check in via sms once room is ready, pick up keys at concierge and proceed to room. At the beginning of transaction, hotel was already fully paid. Apart from check in room conditions was good and hope to come back and enjoy the room facilities.

title: Love love
desc: Love Grandhyatt, always come back to the same hotel for staycation! And will still return back. Book again in February for my parents! And a great check in by Jeffrey (if i gt his name right) and another lady, sorry didnt get her name‚Ä¶ swimming pool is under reno but its ok for us cause bathtub always make my toddlers happy! :)

title: Excellent
desc: Awesome stay over there. Service was great and comfortable bed. Had a birthday celebration and proposal there so it was a blast with the room size so spacious for 5 pax due to covid restrictions. Very memorable

title: Staycaytion
desc: I was lucky as my room upgraded to a the two floor one which made my staycaytion wven more worthy. But it was relaxing and me n my friend really enjoyed ourselve . when they finish renovating the hotel i will come back again

title: Delicious breakfast & Spacious room
desc: A warm welcome and friendly hotel staffs at the concierge and check-in counter. Indeed beautiful & elegant hotel lobby. The deluxe room which I stay was very comfy and spacious. The buffet breakfast spread at Straits Kitchen was fantastic too. It was beyond my expectations stay although just for a night. Will stay at this hotel again if there's great deals in future üëç

title: Birthday celebration
desc: Birthday staycation with Grand hyatt is a nicer and wonderful experiences.. Check-in done early as 11am, left my bag at the conceign, go for our lunch.. by 1pm i got my room reminder to collect the keys..

title: Lousy service and words not honored by counter staff
desc: Words not honored by registration staff (1) Check in time was 3pm, yet claimed it was registration time when it was clearly stated in the email receipt (2) promise to call by 3pm to confirm if room was ready, yet never called (3) Have to wait for more than 2 hours yet never offered as lounge to rest rather than standing all the time at the lobby until i raised it up to the other check in officer (4) promise to compensate for movie voucher for the late check in and late offer for lounge to get some rest while waiting, yet never gave anything.

title: Bad staying experience
desc: An unpleasant stay at the hotel with late check-in at 5+pm and limited breakfast time slot for booking. There was a false fire alarm in the middle of the night which disrupted our sleep and affected our breakfast dinning experience.

title: Almost perfect
desc: We stayed for 2 nights to celebrate a birthday. The staff were lovely - we received a room upgrade and also a small cake for the occasion :) The room was really spacious. It was a shame that the TV wasn't a smart TV, but we managed to work with it. Flushing the toilet was also... really loud for some reason (quite unfortunate because we were both very light sleepers). But we really enjoyed our stay, the proximity to Orchard road was great, and the bed was very comfortable. Would definitely stay again!

title: Awesome as always
desc: Always love my stay here. Highly recommended as it's centralised. Space is clean and room is big. I have brought over friends and family on seperate occasions and they all love it too. Great service as well.

title: well deserved recharged stay
desc: happy with the hotel stay and all staffs are friendly, nice and patient the room clean and spacious and good location and easy to travel with mrt and buses. nearby shopping malls and easy to find food.

title: Excellent Location
desc: The Grand Hyatt on Scotts Road has an excellent location with easy access to shopping and good food. Although the immigration staff at Changi Airport gave me a white E sticker and told me that I did not have to serve any quarantine, the Hyatt staff member who checked me in told me that I had no choice but to do a chargeable early check-in as I was not permitted to leave the hotel. This conflicted with the information given to me by the immigration authorities. Fortunately, I spoke to a capable manager later in the day who apologised and waived the half-day charge for early check-in.

title: Grant Hyatt Stay
desc: Did not have a good experience. Was given a smoking room despite being a non smoker. Requested for a non smoking room but staff had said that there were no more rooms. Had to ask another staff to be shifted to another room, and staff said there was only a downgraded non smoking room available. Fire alarm also rang at 3am disrupting sleep. Had an unpleasant experience and hope that other customers won‚Äôt experience the same thing.

title:
Good room and super nice food
Service awesome ü§©
desc: First time come to stay at this Grand Hyatt . And I must stay the service is good by Lucia was tip-top at the grand club lounge. She is helpful and friendly to all the guests. The food was so delicious and the same goes for Straits Kitchen staff are polite. Breakfast and dinner are super nice!

title: Exceptional, WORLD CLASS service
desc: From check in to dinner to attending to our requests in room, all the staff were super attentive and patient and served us so so well. Always polite and going the extra mile with check ins and staff at straits kitchen really made use feel at home and helped my dad throughout the night. The room itself was comfortable and huge and aircon was strong and cold. Lovely stay, mostly thanks to the superb staff.

title: When you think of Singapore, think of Grand Hyatt!
desc: Great hotel, super service and friendly staffs. A friend forgot to wear a mask, they quickly provided her with one. The location of the hotel is strategic and convenient for shopaholics like me! Would come back in future! Congratulations Hyatt!

title: Great Hotel, Great Location
desc: Perfectly located in the Orchard Rd district surrounded by great shopping, multiple restaurant and food experiences with handy amenities such as grocery, convienience and specialty stores all within a short walk.

title: Good size room and awesome food
desc: Second time staying at Grand Hyatt Singapore. Love the Deluxe King Size Room as it comes with separate living room and bed room. The bathroom was spacious, too. Food at Straits Kitchen were awesome, we had dinner and breakfast there!

title: Staycation
desc: To spend some quality time with my wife and decided to try our the Grand Hyatt Hotel. Location of hotel was excellent with many shopping malls, restaurants and cinema around the hotel. We enjoyed the clean spacious room, attentive friendly service personnel and good selection of dishes offered for breakfast, Good parking facility - spacious parking lots and easy access from car park into hotel. Excellent service personnel at the reception counter, check in was smooth and very efficient. Service on duty speak very well and provided all the necessary information.

title: Awful stay at Hyatt
desc: I brought my mother to her first staycation thinking we could have a good time in the end it was underwhelming. The room had some skin of some fruit or flower and pillows werw dirty although it is indicated no smoking room, the smell of smoke and dust was in the air. We requested for a change of room and only we got a room that did not have any view but was much better. The food was delicious but our troubles started after the food, kids were running on the floor above us. I have been to many hotels in malaysia but never have I encountered the walls being so thin. My mother got a terrible headache and we were so angry. Although the staff did deal with the culprit, it happen again the next morning. Air conditioning was not consistent although at 22 degrees, there was not much

title: Wonderful service and stay experience
desc: A must to visit as it‚Äôs at the town, service is great, food is wonderful and transportation is easy! Staff were very efficient and also friendly. Great place to host events as well as the planners are experienced and often offer alternatives!

title: Staycation at Grand Hyatt Hotel
desc: Love the convenience of the hotel that is situated in a prime location and relatively near the MRT. The room is more spacious than I had expected, really clean and comfortable to stay in :). Breakfast was not bad too! A pity the gym and swimming pool were under renovation when I went and the temporary fitness centre felt more like a function room instead :(

title: Excellence Service and clean
desc: Despite its long history, the service rendered was still excellence. The room was clean too. The staff were well-mannered and served with smile too. The hotel adhered strictly to the national guidance in social management measure, thus give me a confidence in staying the hotel.

title: Enjoyable stay
desc: Happy that I booked this hotel. Nice room with facilities as expected. I wished the toilet have drainage for the water to run. There was no note pad or pen at the working table. Other than that, the bed is of suitable height. The mattress and pillows is very comfortable for a good night sleep.

title: Awesome stay at Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: Thanks Grand Hyatt Singapore for appreciating the healthcare workers by offering a discounted stay at Grand Hyatt Singapore. Great location in the heart of Orchard road. Accessible to halal food places. The breakfast was awesome. The room was cosy.

title: Amazing stay at Grand Hyatt
desc: Went to Grand Hyatt for the first time for a staycay for my anniversary. Was blown away by the size of the room and bathroom. Had a really lovely time with my partner and we highly recommend this place.

title: The service are overall below standard, disappointed!
desc: 5I was disturbed by unwanted housekeeping staff members for two mornings. Also another housekeeping staff question me why I stay at room at 2pm even though I enjoy late check out at 4pm (as promised by front desk long before). The check-in process for Hyatt members are not distinguished and members will not enjoy Priority check-in. The Do Not Disturb signal light near the door is very dim and please be prepared that housekeeping staff will rush in WITHOUT ringing the bell. I was on toilet and someone came in seeing me half naked. The worst experience in Hyatt hotel. The room service is rather slow in responding maybe due to TOO many customers. Both breakfast place and lounge were crowded and kind of under-staffing.

title: Good experience
desc: It was a great staycation, the staffs were very welcoming. The room is spacious , I got the king size bed room with bathtub. Worth the staycation to celebrate my birthday Honestly, it was a very quiet and great stay. The only issue I face was the aircon in the main room was not as cold as the living room area. As the fan blowing was rather weak which you can hear and feel the difference as compared to the living room(sofa)area. Other than this small little problem I am very satisfied with the room and the service. Oh yes all the things in the room from minibar to potato chips is complementary, I even received a mini birthday cake for my birthday.

title: Great Stay at Grand Hyatt!
desc: Booked Grand Hyatt for my wedding anniversary. Complimentary cake and card was given. Staffs are all very helpful. Room was really spacious and clean. We went to Straits Kitchen for both dinner and breakfast, food was great. My husband are so satisfied that he say he wanna go back again. Hehe would definitely be back..

title: Nice stay at Grand Hyatt
desc: First time trying out staycation. Nice and spacious room, staff were friendly, especially Charlace, who assisted us with check in. Convenient location in Orchard. Compliment parking and cute tiny birthday cake given. However, we had to take the 7 am slot due to lack of 9 am slots and we did not sleep too well the previous night as the pillows were too flat (down feather pillows). Would be good to provide other firm pillows as option.

title: One Of The Go-to Hotels In Singapore
desc: It‚Äôs one of my favourite hotels to do a staycation. I have been here numerous times throughout the COVID period. So much so that the front desk has noted my particular room preference. Service is always efficient and polite. Room service food quality is something they need to work on but it‚Äôs an acceptable option when you are just too lazy to head out. Location is undoubtedly fantastic. And is one of the hotels you still can get a smoking room, I prefer the cabana rooms so the smoke does not permeate the room itself. The deluxe rooms are spacious and clean with their own living rooms. Separate shower space, toilet area and bathtub. Every little detail is catered for and options are aplenty just right outside the hotel. I love that they don‚Äôt begrudge you for asking for a ice

title: Wonderful staycay at Grand Hyatt
desc: Hotel staff were wonderful, cheerful and helpful. Family had an enjoyable 3D/2N stay. Junior suite has nice layout and hotel staff loan us Chromecast so that we can cast Netflix shows. Will recommend friends to stay in Grand Hyatt. Thanks.

title: Weekend Staycation
desc: warm greeted by the concierge team, fadzrul and hartini. also to the bellman, dan for helping us with the wheelchair for being so accommodating to our needs during our stay. short weekend gateway for my family to be away and soak in the large bathtub. a great location located right in town. just perfect! will definitely come back.

title: Not the standard of a Grant Hyatt
desc: We booked a staycation at the Grand Hyatt after buying some vouchers a couple months ago. We stayed in one of their largest suites, the Grand Copthorne Suite with a connecting Club Room which was indeed very large but that was the only positive about it. It was very dusty, smelled of smoke (even though we requested non smoking) and was in very poor condition with cracked lampshades, stained carpet and dated decor from the early 90s. The hotel was under renovation so we couldn‚Äôt use the pool, spa or gym (they had set up a temporary one in a conference room). Basically the only amenity we had was the use of our room and access to the Club Lounge and restaurants. The room felt very unloved and sparse. We never received and turndown service and when I enquirer through their

title: Enjoyable staycay
desc: It is my second time coming here with my partner! I had wonderful experience. Staff was incredibly helpful, friendly and consistently making sure we comfortable. Thank you for giving us call we are not sure which one gave us a call from the front desk and also from the concierge; Fadzrul and Yunus! The amenities are great! How can we not love the room at Grand Hyatt? Love our first one and the second one too! We will definitely come back again!‚ô•Ô∏è

title: Worth the money
desc: Everything was good except for the tv channels. Can have more varieties. Bathroom was spacious and I don't have to wait for very long for the water to turn lukewarm. Love how spacious it is. Friendly staff.

title: Great service and facilities
desc: Room was really comfortable and the reception staff were really helpful and friendly. Check in and out was quick and fuss free. Oddly enough their pillows were too soft but everything else was amazing

title: Lovely staycation
desc: We booked a deluxe room via Klook to use the Rediscover vouchers. Front desk staff was friendly. We were surprised at the size of the room, it felt more like a suite and we thought we got an upgrade but it was actually the room type that we booked. There is a living area, a bedroom and en-suite with shower and bathtub. It is like a mini apartment and there is the sense of spaciousness. Quite uncommon to find rooms of this size for that price on prime land in Singapore. The room is clean, aircon is good, TV is good - one in the living room and another in the bedroom, everyone can watch their own shows. Overall very comfortable. No renovation noise or noise from nearby rooms. No swimming pool but we were aware of this before booking. We would like to thank the hotel for

title: Staycation at Grand Hyatt Hotel
desc: I like the room, it is luxurious deluxe room, king size bed, Pantry size is reasonable. There is office glass table for working. THe breakfast spread is reasonable. International cuisine. The staff are attentive and professional .

title: Very satisfied
desc: 1. Staff at register counter is very polite and helpful, he also allowed me to review smoking room and non smoking room. 2.Room is clean and spacious 3. Food at STKichen were superb especially the diiner 4. ST Ktchen staff - MrOthman was very friendly and helpful, Mr Hafiz was helpful and hardworking through my obsevation, he was very obliged

title: Smiley and friendly staff everywhere!
desc: From check in we experience friendly service, which was a really pleasant start to the stay. Restaurant service crew were friendly and attentive too. Variety of food was adequate for us, and mostly tasty.

title: First family staycation
desc: We have our first family staycation to Grand Hyatt. The room was spacious enough for our little toddler to roam around and play. The hotel has ongoing renovation so we could not go to the pool or walk around the hotel but we enjoyed our quality time in the room.

title: Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: Superb customer service. Called their customer service and one of the staff accommodated to my need. Room was top notch. Breakfast was also awesome as they have different varieties of food. Will definitely come back again.

title: Pleasant staff
desc: Hotel situated in city centre. Lots of shopping mall & very convenient to get anything you want. Breakfast spread was excellent. Staff all were pleasant, helpful & polite. Room were very spacious and clean. Recommend this hotel especially for travellers with young children as the room was spacious.

title: First Business Trip of Y2022 (in Feb)
desc: Excellence in Services, Check in and Check out, Cleanliness, Food and Drink, including Breakfast. Especially, this hotel is located in very good location for traveling to many places and vey convenient to call grab taxi.

title: Food was good
desc: The hotel is under renovation so some restaurants and facilities were closed. Room was comfortable despite a lack of modernisation but there was not much of a view. The breakfast at straits kitchen was quite extensive and it was really good. I want to thank Ms. Julie at the club lounge for her good service and friendliness. She made us feel welcome and at home.

title: Room
desc: Nice & clean room, Great hotel with awesome hospitality. We have smooth check in and check out during our stay. the amenities in the room were good. we are given upgraded room with attached living hall.

title: Wonderful experience
desc: Location is superb, hotel and clean. Warm welcomes were given by the staffs.. the breakfast and dinner we excellent. I had mine twice and the same experience were given. Consistent. Me and family had a wonderful experience.

title: Above and beyond expectations
desc: Worthy of 5 star rating. Excellent service overall. Complimentary snacks and canned drinks in the fridge. Spacious room. Large comfy bed with extra pillows. Separate living room. Two large tvs with cable channels in each room. Super strong shower with heater. And XXXL size bath towel!!! 24 hour room service from the hotel kitchen. Superb and plenty of choice at buffet breakfast. And the hotel even has smoking room as an option for guests. Such a memorable staycation.

title: Food Experience
desc: 1) Not sure if food is complimentary but I found munchies in random parts of the drawers. Was wondering if we could eat it or it's not provided by them or it's chargable üòÖ 2) Room service eta was 45 mins, we waited for an hour. Said will get back to us and when they did, our order just started to process + another 35 mins wait. Also not sure if it's true or they forgot out order. Will give benefit of doubt.

title: Enjoyable stay
desc: Very good facilities and bedroom was clean and spacious. Have not stayed here for a long time and good to know the standard has not dropped. We had our wedding here more than 20 years ago and it brought back a lot of good memories.

title: Clean and Neat Room
desc: The room was very clean and neat and perfectly for family to relax. Everything we need is inside the room. However, the room only provide chiller, somewhat like wine chiller instead of a fridge. Peaceful living and user-friendly too. And in the midst of all the major and popular malls and shopping centres and most amenities, and next to the MRT and easily accessible to all transports.

title: Check out timing
desc: Must 12pm check out the hotel on time ,else the room card is disactive, have to carry all the shopping bags down to the reception, ask for reactivate the room card, and carry all the shopping bags again back to the room ,and fast fast bag all the belonging and out the room ASAP.

title: 1 night stay in Hyatt
desc: Service was great, breakfast food was great as well. The rooms are big and spacious, bathtub is big too! Rooms should be updated. Realise there is a CD player, should upgrade to have Chromecast. Other than that, pleasant and had a wonderful time

title: Stayed on 2 Feb 2022
desc: The only unsatisfying is itchy at bed and sofa. This is important as we can‚Äôt sleep well during our stay. Hope management do take it seriously especially during this covid period. Cleanliness for bedsheets and sofa are crucial for the stay.

title: Pleasant Experience
desc: It is a pleasant experience since it is my first time trying this hotel and I am not dissapointed by the service and cleanliness of the hotel. Will definitely recommend my parents and friends to try this hotel

title: My splendid birthday staycation
desc: The rooms were cleaned thoroughly, everything was in perfect condition. Although I didn't get the room with the view that I was hoping for, it didn't matter as the room itself was the view. The gym was thoroughly sanitised (even while i was working out) the hotel staff were cleaning and ensuring a safe and pleasant experience at the gym. Last but not least, not to mention the freakin amazing breakfast at StraitsKitchen. Blew my mind. Although the booking process was a little messy but it all worked out due to helpful concierge.

title: Holiday
desc: Good to stay at and very big room and clean and smell nice and food was delicious , asian cuisine is very tasty and nice but only free flow of drink do not have. Staff is helpful and the kichen staff are friendly

title: Just an average hotel
desc: I went there expecting a lot from this hotel, but only to find out that there is nothing spectacular about this place despite being a 5* hotel. Found strands of hair in the bath tub yet we have to wait for a room. Quite a disappointing stay.

title: Luxury Stay At Grand Hyatt
desc: We booked a King Deluxe for 3D2N. Best stay ever! Huge room and importantly there's a hand spray bidet. Haha! Super useful for us. Clean rooms. Alot TV channels. Very comfortable stay. Love it and stay safe everyone!

title: Staycation at Grand Hyatt
desc: Hotel is currently under renovation so limited amenities to enjoy. Room is big with a living hall and bedroom. Furnishing is a bit outdated. No light dimmer so the room is either too bright or dark. Towel is very big and heavy to use. Toothbrushes are kept inside a metal box so not easy to locate it. TV was programmed to greet the guests upon entering the room. Overall experience is good.

title: Not the standard of a Grand Hyatt. Dissapointing
desc: Very disappointing. I was expecting a grand Hyatt experience but despite the grand entrance the rooms leave a lot to be desired. They are very tired, this place is long overdue for room renovation. Chipped woodwork, cables dangling out of the back of the TV, and just and just an old feel. Nothing that impresses The room Servixe breakfast was disgusting. I know we are in Covid times and everyone is trying bla bla. But this was really sub-standard.. rubbery cold cuts, really bad eggs, just not a hotel at the top of its game. Club lounge rules I also found draconian.. not a friendly customer focused set of rules compared to other grand hyatts I have stayed at. I was in a club room, and I had a call to take and wanted to take my wine to the room but was literally jumped on

title: excellent room and great stay
desc: Stayed over for a night and the junior suite was very comfortable and the amenities were good too. I got the room with a separate bathtub and shower and a king size bed. Although the water was hard to adjust to a comfortable heat level but that is expected of most hotel showers and baths. Room service was also fast and convenient. 10/10 will stay again!

title: Grand Hyatt Staycation
desc: Everything was amazing. The service was great. Everyone was so kind and helpful and I love the room and food at the establishment. The check in and check out process was fast and hassle-free. Would definitely come by again and recommend this to everyone especially families

title: Not comfortable
desc: Reservation was not based on sg. Having trouble communicating with reservations team. Bed was not comfortable at all. TV remote not working. Room was haunted or not sound proof as i can hear loud noise coming from above room the whole night.

title: Tip top
desc: I love everything about grand hyatt, think its gonna be my go to hotel for any special occasion. Honestly i regret for not booking the stay longer. If i have known it would be this fab, i would definitely have booked longer to enjoy other amenities in grand hyatt!

title: Staycation
desc: The room is spacious and comfortable,very clean and suitable for family All the soft drink in the room's fridge are free of charge.The location is very convenient, there are many shopping centers nearby

title: Memorable staycation
desc: Perfect location.. Staff at the entrance of the hotel was super friendly and welcoming. Check in was a breeze by Fitri all information was clearly advised. Room is spacious with beautiful toilet i especially love the water pressure. Their staff Fadzrul was really helpful and he also help us with baby cot, baby‚Äôs amenities and breakfast. They got a bunch of beautiful staff i should say. So friendly and helpful, not forgetting Yunus for helping us out with our things all the way to our room. Overall it was a nice experience. Would definitively recommend this hotel for travellers travelling to Singapore and for those with young children, this place is definitely the one! üëçüëç

title: Not Recommended
desc: It's my first time stay in Grand Hyatt Singapore but the room condition is absolutely horrendous. I've stayed at other Grand Hyatt overseas and this standard is not even close. The room was dusty and I end up sneezing the whole night. The air from the aircon is stale and uncomfortable. Worst still the dinner buffet at Straits Kitchen was a total let down. Will definitely not recommend this stay.

title: My Stay in Grand Hyatt
desc: overall very gd experience. large room space. gd customer service only 2 points: check in slow, we arrive at 3pm but only can check in at 530pm. waited 2 hours. another thing, carparking too expensive, only given 1 complimentary parking per day per exit to use. if u exit the carpark 2 times or more, prepare to pay alot on parking.

title: Short Staycation
desc: Overall a good stay, room was neat and clean, staff was friendly and courteous, breakfast was good, conviently located with walking distance to food, shopping and transportation if you don't drive.I got a surprise bday cake from the hotel for my birthday. Thank you Grand Hyatt!

title: Room is very nice, worth the price
desc: The bedroom has 2 sliding doors which was my first, bathroom was huge and have different cubicles for toilet, shower and bathtub. Though need to hide and seek with things in drawers as almost everything is kept in drawers which may be a little confusing to people if they do not open the drawers to find things. Unique lighting system as well and had 2 TVs!

title: Grand hyatt cabana room
desc: Staff charisee was amazing. I requested for smoking room and was able to get it. There was upgrade as well. Very pleased with the service. As usual grand hyatt service and rooms are excellent. Would definitely return

title: amazing experience
desc: first hotel stay with my boyfriend and it was the best place we could have gone to, beyond amazed by their customer service, and thankful for their help when we left a charger there, thank you Grand Hyatt!

title: Disappointing
desc: Master bedroom‚Äôs air condition was on and off, most of the time feeling very warm and had to go to study room to cool down Had to call room service several times to try to resolve the air condition issue but was not resolved in the end, I just gave up Tv was not smart tv, and only able to watch old channels (Had to watch on laptop)

title: Excellent service and room.
desc: Excellent room service. Even send up to my room the baby crib and baby bathtub. Request room with bathtub too and it was fulfilled. My 6m baby love playing in the adult big bathtub. The bed is very big enough for my baby to roll all over... room is like Junior suite. Separate living room with business desk n chair too. Bathroom also very big with separate standing shower , toilet bowl and bathtub.

title: Staycation at Hyatt
desc: Friend and I were suprised with such big room offered to us. Spacious and comfortable! Clean and cozy. Love the washroom as well! Location is central of orchard Value for money Will definitely return again.

title: Great Room
desc: Use the Rediscover voucher. Room was huge and clean. Quiet even though the window was facing the main road. Like it that there were two TV. Table clock not accurate, this were 5mins late for appointment.

title: Pleasant stay
desc: From the booking to our stay, it was a smooth transaction. My daughter loved the bathtub so much that she didn't want to leave the bathtub. Thank you Grand Hyatt for making it an awesome experience for my family!

title: Ok not bad. Just the bed was hard. I prefer a soft one.
desc: Be nice if there was a option for me. I am not used to hard bed. The food wise is not bad. Room service stop at 1030pm. Be nice if it 24 hours service. Room is clean and with complimentary mineral water. Would be great if there is a coffee machine for it. I m a coffee lover for morning is a must.

title: 5 Star Customer Service
desc: The main highlight of my stay was the customer service displayed by Mr. Ken. He was very welcoming and friendly, top notch in grooming and very approachable. Would consider to be back for staycation once the pool is functioning.

title: Best Club Lounge Experience
desc: I was like a kid in a Candy Store when it came to selecting a 5 star hotel in Singapore. Since I have status with Marriott, Hilton, and Hyatt, it was difficult to decide. Finally I decided to go hotel-hopping and it was so much fun. We stayed at the Grand Hyatt only for one night on Chinese New Year. It was my first time back in Asia to celebrate CNY in 3 decades. First off, the location is smack in the middle of the famed Orchard Road. It is indeed a shopper's paradise. Even thought the shops are supposed to be closed for CNY, there were still plenty open to keep us busy. On the positive side, the traffic on Orchard Road was unusually light on those two days. Check-in was a breeze since there was a separate line for Globalist and Hyatt Members. Charisce and Fateha were both

title: Grand Hyatt hotel
desc: Breakfast was great and room was very neat and tidy. Requested for make up room and got done in less than 30mins. Satisfied with their care for customers and prompt service. Professional staffs and very efficient.

title: Staycation
desc: Our first time doing a staycation and we (my family) chose Grand Hyatt Hotel. Hotel reservation (Syafiqah) adhered to our request for connecting rooms for at least 2 of the rooms (we booked 3 rooms). Love the rooms, super big and spacious, the connecting rooms have good view and most importantly they have standing showers (my mum has knee issues so she cant get in n out of the tub). Super breakfast spread too! Having said that, hope the hotel will look into the waiting time for the rooms to be cleaned and ready for check-in and also the air-condition was somehow switched off middle of the night, prolly around 2am..coz i woke up sweating...but it was back on again after that..On the whole, there is no reason not to love to stay at Grand Hyatt :)

title: Local staycation in a location in Orchard
desc: Room was relatively huge. There was renovation works during our stay which was disappointing as a visit to the pool would have been very appreciated for a short getaway stay. The wait for the room was extremely long, had to call the hotel while waiting somewhere in Orchard after about 3hours and it was still not ready. By the time we got to the room, it was just an hour close to dinner time. Hence the time spent in the actual check-in day was mainly just waiting for the room. Did not expect that

title: Grand Hyatt 1N with Breakfast
desc: Spacious room, clean bathroom, has bidet which i really appreciate. Clean linens. Except the room smells like cig smoke n seems like lack of air purifier/scents. The temperature in e room was quite warm, despite us putting it at 18¬∞c. thus disturbing our sleep. Woke up a couple of times at night due to the warmth. Breakfast was a wide spread from indian to local or western. Enjoyed it very much especially theres salmon cold cuts!

title: Anniversary Staycation
desc: Booked this ( 2 ) Nights *separate booking for Our Wedding Anniversary. Check-in was stated 1500, but we only manage to get it by 1630. Overall very happy with Grand Hyatt Hotel Singapore. Room was very massive had also requested for Baby Crib. Concierge (Fadzrul & Jeffrey) was very fun & helpful surprising us with some Welcome Gift. Looking to book again for this June / July, Hope the service standard will be consistent for our next visit. Package included breakfast, was very happy with the variety of food offered although for dinner there wasn‚Äôt as much.

title: Modern hotel in heart of Orchard Road
desc: We have check in to eleven floor suite. Pool and spa under service, otherwise parking is available and within short walk to Ion and Tangs and Takashimaya. If you wake up early enough, can go to botanical gardens and be back for checkout.

title: Staycay on a weekday
desc: If you need a hotel to unwind and relax, this is the place. The bathtub and fluffy bedsheets were great. The bed was a little itchy though and suspected it had bed bugs. The TV channels were poor...we were watching news throughout the day but overall we love the stay. The mrt is easily accessible, halal food nearby and Orchard is at your fingertips.

title: Great stay
desc: Booked a 6pm check in and 3pm check out package. While breakfast wasn't included, there was a fast food restaurant nearby the hotel. The room was spacious and grand, bathroom was clean and slept well. Hotel staff called me shortly after I went into the room to check if everything was okay. Truly a pleasant experience!

title: Nightmare
