desc: Room was big but old and dated hotel room interior fixtures and such. Was locked out of my room and had to ask an in charged to open it. The reason was that the door system auto locks it due to 12 noon check out time where my official check out time is 3pm.

title: The place for a staycay
desc: Had more than a 5 star stay with Grand Hyatt, loved the in room dining and breakfast, it‚Äôs fantastic even for a local. Location was perfect and staff was extremely helpful, what more can you ask for ?

title: Overall experience
desc: My first staycation in Singapore. The reason I choose to stay in Grand Hyatt is because I have been receiving very good feedback from one of our company Business Associate. The room is spacious, service is good, good location to shop , dine as it is within walking distance to Paragon. Takashimaya and Ion Orchard

title: Smelly carpet and dirty room
desc: I had always been a loyal guests for Hyatt, had planned all my business trip stay with Hyatt. In March, i was able to book a room and intend to have a nice staycation with the family. But upon entering the room, we were greeted with a strong stench of cigarettes smell. My wife commented that it's only for a night stay and jus bear with it. But at night when we were about to sleep, the pillow, the blanket, the curtain, all smell of cigarettes. Shower head in the bath room is broken too as water is not concentrated and plash all over the place. We also find that the room is extremely dusty given the current sanitize expectation during the pandemic. Very disappointed. The staycation is spoiled for the kids as well.

title: Excellent and comfortable stay
desc: I stayed in the spacious king deluxe room and it was a luxuriously comfortable stay. Desk lamp and work chair served its purpose for work calls. The sheets and bed was comfortable as well as the amenities. The room was nicely thought out with sufficient water bottles and air conditioning was working well. Will definitely recommend this room to small families looking to spend quality time together.

title: 10/10 no doubt
desc: i'll be very frank and say i had a lot of doubts picking this hotel for my wedding anniversary staycation because i usually pick hotels with views in the CBD area. i decided to give it a try because its one of the few hotels that offers halal breakfast. I AM SO GLAD I PICKED GRAND HYATT :) let's begin with check-in process. we drove in as we knew they offer free parking for in-house guests. we checked-in during the lunch hour and had to wait a bit for a parking lot (probably most of the cars were diners of their buffet lunches). we were greeted by Charisce at the counter and she was really a nice lady who was very polite,professional and smiley ! as we were early,our room of choice wasn't ready and she offered a free upgrade for us. what an awesome start to our anniversary

title: Love staying at Grand Hyatt Singapore.
desc: Very great for your hotel staff to communicate with me through writing because of my deafness well. We are so happy as we can able to sleep well and rest more. We like quiet, peace and cool room very much. We also enjoyed watching the programme on TV. We went out for dinner for a while.

title: Overall good trip
desc: Staff very helpful but will ignore any request of emailing before the stay and even though had accommodate and state very nicely on the chat but did not accommodate and had to check and request on the day itself again. No pool facilities or any facilities because still under renovation :(

title: Better than Expected Personal Staycation
desc: I was traveling alone for my own personal trip. The room is very spacious with a hall and the bathtub is very clean unlike other properties. A wee bit regret is the straits kitchen. They have 2 Timing and The timing is too short for me, 90 minutes. The variety could be more.

title: pleasant stay
desc: crib was provided free of charge spacious room and good location in orchard road area for shopping and dinning recommended for staycation in town area free cans of coke and sprite from the mini bar too you can get umbrella from the concierge and baggage despoit

title: Asked to check in late. No apology given.
desc: Went to check in at 3pm only to find out that no rooms are available. No explanation or apology was offered. I had to personally ask guest services for late check out. Even after doing so, I was rejected. In the end, after explaining to the staff what happened, she managed to provide late checkout. Nothing of the ‚Äúgrand experience‚Äù that Grand Hyatt promises.

title: Good location hotel
desc: Friendly check in reception. Comfortable bed and free in-room snacks with fill up fridge. Bed is very comfortable and welcoming and the bathroom is very clean. Sadly the pool and other amnesties except for the restaurant are currently closed for upgrading renovations.

title: Impeccable Experien
desc: Stayed 2 nights in their King Deluxe to celebrate my birthday and it was handled smoothly. Gotten the highest floor, overlooking Scotts Road, accompanied with a bathtub. Guest Service were very prompt in providing their service when being called. Requested for a memory foam pillow and it was delivered in less than 8 mins after I hung up the phone. Since level 21 required additional flights of stairs, we had to engage a bell boy to bring the luggage down to the concierge to have it stored for a couple more hours. Again, he arrived shortly after the call was made. Breakfast Buffet from Straits Kitchen was nothing short but amazing. A well balanced spread of Asian delicacies as well as Western‚Äôs. My favourite was the congee. My stay was as pleasant as it could be. The room

title: Great stay!
desc: This is my 4th times staying at Grand Hyatt Singapore. Had a wonderful stay again and again! Room is spacious and we got a high floor with corner room as requested upon check-in. Unfortunately the swimming pool is closed for renovation.

title: Service staff have no compassion
desc: Hotel customer hotline personnel was rude and unfriendly right from the start of the telecon. She was impatient in explaining that the gym and pool were unavailable and she was neither friendly nor apologetic. Closer to my initial staycation dates, i Emailed the customer service team to postpone my stay (school holiday week) as my family and I were all down with Covid19+. I got a negative response from the personnel who threatened to forfeit my booking fees if I could not claim the stay by end of 31 March. Not sure i was being discriminated and treated badly because i paid partially using SG Rediscover Vouchers or the staff were utterly lack of compassion, not a word to ask how my family had coped with the recovery etc. Never mind, so I asked if I could stay in any of the March

title: Staycation vacation
desc: Our staycation at the Grand Hyatt was well and good with excellent service and polite staff attention. The room was clean and comfortable with adequate space for our family of three. It is definitely a commendable experience.

title: My most unpleasant travel experience
desc: I booked an express PCR test with the hotel. Test result delivered late but no help and zero consideration for my travel schedule. Had to rebook flight, meeting schedule but the hotel doesn‚Äôt. Please pay and leave policy is fully enforced

title: Amazing Experience
desc: It was a memorable experience. It was school holiday but check in was smooth despite the waiting time for a turnover. My kids loved every single minute and kept saying, the best hotel ever! Room was big enough to fit in an additional 2 extra bed with LOTS of walking space available..

title: Customer Services / Location
desc: Check in was smooth. Appreciated that we were given additional bed when connecting rooms were not available. Location was so accessible with good foods, cinema, mrt, shopping malls, and clubs. Value was well spent!

title: One Night Deluxe Room with Breakfast & Afternoon Tea
desc: Greeted with a cheerful and helpful lady who checked us in. The room is 584 sq ft. It is a Junior Suite which separates the bedroom & living area. A huge and comfortable King size bed. The bathtub was a good size to fit my 1.85m tall son. Buffet breakfast was delicious with different cuisine options. High tea buffet was a local cuisine. Although the room looks abit dated, we still had an enjoyable staycation!

title: Will not be back again!
desc: Hotel staffs not helpful and accommodating to reschedule my booking date despite being a 5-stars hotel. Room was big but run-down with outdated renovation and charged with high price. Not worth and will not return again to this hotel.

title: Excellent staycation
desc: My husband and I loved our birthdays staycation in Grand Hyatt Singapore. We had a great spending time together throughout the stay. Would like to recommend to family and friends for a staycation. I will bring my children for our next staycation in future.

title: Quick family staycation
desc: Bought a package with hi-tea on klook. Overall, the experience was wonderful. The staffs were friendly and accommodating. The room we got was spacious, more than enough for the 4 of us. The food at the Stairs Kitchen, however, was below expectations.

title: Review of Grand Hyatt
desc: Surprised to be charged for 2 local calls made. Overall, good experience at the hotel. Special thanks to housekeeping staff who ensure we our essentials are sufficient. Also a big thank you to the floor manager of Straits Kitchen, sorry didnt take his name. He was attentive to all patrons while we were having dinner. Helping us bring our food to the table, taking drinks order manually, refill our drinks etc. Give us great pleasure to dine there. One downside is that the cakes are a bit dry. Probably been cut and placed in the chiller for more than a day.

title: Outstanding
desc: Location was in midst of shopping malls and lots of eating places. The hotel staff were efficient and welcoming. The buffet breakfast had such great varieties Chinese, Western, Malay and Indian and we had no lack of choice. Pleasantly surprised that we could even have teh halia something not found in other hotels. The room was a junior suite and my husband got his bathtub a must for him. So overall experience had been so outstanding and we had a relaxing comfortable vacation. We plan to return and for sure recommend to others. Thank you!

title: Birthday Celebration
desc: Celebrating my birthday at the hotel. Upon check in, they told me they have me a high floor with bathtub but no view. Thinking want a better view so go with the garden view. Regretted it the moment I saw the garden. So went to ask for a change back to bathtub but left a low floor. No choice but to go for the bathtub. Room is spacious. Bathtub is small but comfy. The aircon is very noisy. Whole night cannot sleep. Keep hearing dripping sound.

title: Staycation at Hyatt
desc: We celebrated my wife's birthday at the Hyatt last week so we tried a staycation at Hyatt Scotts road. Check-in was great and the room was exactly as advertised, lots of room for all. Unfortunately the first room was smoky so they had to reassign us another room that was great. While waiting we got to go their club room for some tea and light refreshments.

title: Disappointment
desc: Chose Grand Hyatt for honeymoon stay. - check-in was longer/later than expected - late check-out request was not obliged - when enter room, the toilet accessories were not replenished (toothbrush, shaver etc) - only snacks available were 1 bag of chips + 1 alpen bar, that's all (not sure if not replenished or this is default) - cannot connect our devices to the TV, no cables or screen mirroring functions - hotel gave complimentary celebratory chocolate cake but it came late, and was tough and dry. - hotel under renovations, no access to spa, gym and swimming pool. expected them to at least do well in other service areas but nope - only location & size of the room was satisfactory - will NOT recommend this to others, especially for special occasions like birthdays or honeymoon.

title: Not coming back again
desc: disappointed with this stay. firstly, we tried to make breakfast reservation since 1 week before our check in but unable to do so. sent an email and was told will provide a link for us 72hours before our check in. waited till a day before. nothing. sent an email to them and no reply. after checking in, tried to make reservation at the restaurant and was told 9am slot was full(same as a week ago) we requested for in-room breakfast instead as we wouldn't want to wake up at 7am for breakfast and having to rush through. however, we can only order 1 set per person. next, I read some reviews before this review to find out that the mini bar was free but nothing has been told to us that it was a complimentary. is the hotel saving cost that these were not mentioned at all? sound proof

title: Very friendly staff, clean and well-furnished hotel
desc: Staff was incredibly friendly, from the doorman all the way to the managers and receptionists. Receptionist was very helpful and nice, and they even have a robot online (Scott) to help with common enquiries or housekeeping items request. You can tell that the staff was happy working there, I can feel that as a guest and it's wonderful. Hotel room was clean and well-facilitated (there's even a footwear thing which was so useful for wearing your shoes w/o bending down, impressed at their thoughtfulness). Some amenities were closed for renovations during my stay, but the room was not affected at all in terms of noise and accessibility. Bathroom was huge and incredibly pretty (King deluxe). Didn't try the food at the hotel, but the location is pretty prime in Orchard Road, but

title: excellent choice of staycation
desc: decided to try out grand hyatt using my srv, paid 100$ for an amazing stay! only regret is that i only booked 1 night stay. room was clean as expected. love the welcome note on the television! location-wise was super accessible, sheltered from orchard mrt. great food around the area. love it!

title: Awesome spacious room and excellent food
desc: Loved the size of the room and the spread of food. Hotel went out of way to provide valet when car park was full and room had soft drinks and snacks. Dinner and breakfast had a large spread. The Manager at Straits Kitchen dinner was helpful and friendly. HIs service was excellent

title: Staycation visit.
desc: Enjoyable, spacious, and clean big room with amenities. Generally very friendly staff and good service at breakfast area. Only gripe is that the long check-in queue could be made shorter by better staggering the check-in timings and with more staff to handle. The complimentary refreshments at the room's fridge and drinks counter are very welcoming!

title: Awesome Staycation
desc: A night stay with my family was really great with friendly and polite staff, Ms Jennifer who helped with the check in, Mr Faizal who upgraded the room for us, Mr Dino & Mr Shaun who helped us at the driveway when we reached & check out from the hotel. Thank you so much. We are truly happy with our stay. Will come back once the swimming pool is renovated.

title: Good location, Great room & facilities
desc: Did a staycation from 8th to 10th March and was happy with the room & facilities with Grand Hyatt. Orchard MRT station is just around the corner and food options are aplenty with Far East Square, Scotts Square & Lucky Plaza. Housekeeper gave us 4 bottles of distilled water everyday, even though there's a kettle for boiling hot water.

title: Birthday Staycations
desc: Fast check-in and out service. Friendly and efficient hotel staff. Great location in town Clean room except personally I don‚Äôt like carpet flooring especially with pandemic situation. Best and wide choices of buffet breakfast

title: 1st time staycation
desc: This is our 1st time staying at Hyatt and we had lots of fun. Our room had bathtub and the kids have a fun time playing in it. The dinner & breakfast buffet was amazing. Would definitely come with with the family for another staycation trip.

title: Staycation Mar 2022
desc: Grand Hyatt is located in shopping district of Orchard. Hotel was surrounded with large variations of Food & Malls. Room was neat & clean but should extra variations of snacks in the room. House keeper was very attentive to my needs too. Its simply great üëç

title: 6pm Check-in & 3pm Check-out (Klook SRV Exclusive)
desc: Pros: Large Room Size (theres a living room, study table, on top of the bedroom and bath room) comfortable for family of 4, 2 adults with 2 kids. Bathtub S$200/night (Klook SRV exclusive) Great Location (theres a 7-11 at Far East Plaza, 3mins walk, in case you need a late night munch/drinks) Free roller child bed (comfortably fits an adult) Friendly and observant staff (an eagle-eyed staff gave complimentary Kids Activity Books for our kids, even though we didnt ask for it) * *u can redeem a special gift if ure able to complete the activities in the book (unfortunately we didnt manage to, so not sure what the gift is) Cons: A. Limited Parking due to renovation (we arrived ard 5pm, and unfortunately, had to wait at the gantry because the carpark was full. Had to wait abt

title: Hyatt
desc: I just want to tell everyone what an awesome hotel the Hyatt is to stay in. We have staycayed there 8 times since the curtailment of travel. The staff are awesome, friendly and helpful. Sadly, all singapore rediscovers vouchers have to be used by march, so I don't think we can get such a value for $ staycay anymore. The room is huge - 52 square meters and the staff are wonderful.

title: Convenient & Excellent
desc: This hotel is located at a very convenient place where you can find transport(MRT), food(local and international) and shopping(big brands(LV,Hermes) and small brands) area easily. The room is big and clean and my kids love it so much.

title: Excellent location
desc: Fantastic location with very friendly staff. The rooms are big and we had a free upgrade to junior suite! Famous eggslut just a stone throw away. Shopping area is all within walking distance. Hope to be back soon

title: My first staycation at Grand Hyatt
desc: My first staycation at the Grand Hyatt was a wonderful one. The front desk was very friendly, cheerful and helpful. That was a good start to our stay. Subsequent requests for toiletries were seen to quite immediately. The rooms were clean and well spaced. It was a really good stay for my sisters and I. Thank you Hyatt..

title: Hyatt was overall satisfactory :)
desc: Thank you for having us and we had a pleasant stay with Hyatt in Singapore. We would like to have another staycation with you guys with my son for an extended period. This time round we would like to dine in at your restaurant and also go to the lounge. Thank you once again.

title: Excellent
desc: Excellent especially your straits kitchen manager sharil bohari. He a very friendly and courteous guy. he should be promoted to CEO of the Hotel. He is the best of the best. Your chili crab is the best in the universe.

title: Would Return!
desc: First stay was in Nov 2021, which led to us booking another stay in Mar 2022. Great and friendly service by hotel staff, and the check-in process was very smooth. The whole check-in process took no more than 5 min. We went for dinner at Straits Kitchen on the second night of our stay and got surprised with a birthday cake for my wife. Overall experience was good, especially the food. Would return!

title: Enjoyable stay
desc: Great service from the time we walked through the door till we check-out the next day. Check-in was a breeze maybe due to the fact we book on a weekday. Reminder send to you through email about your bookings. Very prompt when enquire about some request. Will definitely book this hotel again when there‚Äôs great deal for another staycation.

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: Nice junior suite room. Lots of space for a family of 5 to relax over tea and bond over a game of poker. Bathroom is also spacious, hard to find in hotels. Breakfast buffet has a good spread of food. Room service is also good.

title: Excellent stay
desc: I jave stayed for a week in this hotel together with my wife & daughter. We are very happy with the service & its great location. It located very near to shops and subway stations. The room is good size & clean.

title: Great location
desc: Great location, very clean hotel. But, limited sitting public areas to meet and greet visitors. Next to major shopping malls around Orchard Road. Tired of hotel food? Next door is Far East Shopping center with local foods.

title: Great place for staycation
desc: Was here for a staycation. Probably one of the best location to stay for a 5 Star Hotel that was within walking 5 major shopping Centers. Hotel room is great and clean. The staff were friendly and helpful too. So will the chambermaid. Awesome

title: Good experience
desc: Well trained team, good service during my stay. Room is a bit dated but well maintained. The bed is comfortable and I slept well. Room dinner service was superb, especially the laksa. Very delicious. The location of the hotel is extremely strategic, very convenient to reach orchard shopping area.

title: Fantastic!
desc: Enjoyed and excellent service. Slept well and spacious room for staycation. A good promotion for healthcare workers and is really worth staying. Will stay in again or this is a must list when staycation time!

title: Excellent stay
desc: Good location, comfortable bed, clean room, good amenities, great staff, good room size, easy check in/out, attentive staff, amazing stay, will definitely stay in this hotel whenever I will be back to Singapore.

title: Grand Hyatt Singapore - Great Staycation Choice
desc: Stayed regularly in Grand Hyatt Singapore and the executive club lounge is one of the best highlights in the hotel. Careen, the team lead is always very friendly and attentive to each and every guest. She always take good care of every guest's needs. Will also like to thank her for selecting me as one of the guests to receive the special easter gift. Food served at the lounge are remarkable. The Front office managers, Jennie, Katherine and Jeffrey are very helpful as well and often accommodating to requests. Definitely will continue to select Gtand Hyatt as one of my Staycation choice.

title: No Wonder I love Hyatt Hotels
desc: No wonder I love Hyatt Hotels. On my first international trip to Singapore after 2 years of no international travel I caught Covid on day 1 and had to isolate for 7 Days. Grand Hyatt Singapore showed compassion and concern and really made sure I was ok during my isolation. Nothing was a problem for them as I called for room service or operator. Room Service Food was great and the staff were accomodating and sincerely caring.

title: At a very nice location with a nice room
desc: Would like to highly recommend this hotel for travellers to Singapore - let it be for business or for leisure purpose. It is convenient for transportation, with many good restaurants and shopping malls.

title: An awesome Hyatt hiatus in Singapore!
desc: We had an extended month-long stay at the Grand Hyatt Singapore and even though it was running a full house and undergoing extensive renovations during our stay, we enjoyed some of the finest hospitality. One of the defining features of the GH Singapore is the longevity of the staff - we had not visited for almost 3 years due to the pandemic and yet we continued to see familiar faces who also recognised us despite the prolonged absence. Associates were extremely responsive and always obliging which made the extended stay feel like we were in our second home. Special mention to Jeffrey at the front desk, and Yen Peng and Vina at Straits Kitchen who were never without a smile and a kind word, and were the embodiment of hospitality with their patient and accommodating attitude.

title: Weekend getaway staycation
desc: Everything was quite pleasant. No complains for the location. We had a bathtub in our room. But showering experience was awful as the water temperature will become super hot out of a sudden not once but repetitive when showering. It was quite bad as we have an a year old baby with us. Very dangerous for a baby. Tea pot set wasnt well cleaned. Upon checking in we saw some leftover water in the cup from the previous guest.

title: 5 stars hotel service as they stated
desc: Since last year 2021 June until April 2022; I check in the Grand Hyatt hotel Singapore as long term staying guest ; as an female vegan person , hotel from room service to breakfast until night time lounge all give me the best help which always provide me all kinds of fresh organic vegetable, fruits and nuts , and special soy milk , ext ‚Ä¶ ; especially at night time , on 20 th floor chef Jimmy Goh and Chef Yoy Vin Huey both help me cook daily special vegan foods that as I request ; the mild spices ingredients are taste good and healthy ; am very happy with their presenting , also all rester-aunt staffs are very polite ; and along this long staying , from front desk , concierge , house keeping , they all try best to help customers have most comfortable experience during their time

title: Great Hotel, Convenient Location
desc: Haven't been back to SG in over 10 years and I am not disappointed with my stay in Grand Hyatt. Very helpful and courteous staff. Hotel amenities are complete and it was a very comfortable stay. Location is perfect being less than 5 minutes away from Orchard MRT station, and right along the Orchard Rd. Only concern is the gym which had limited equipment and the pool which was under renovation during our visit. But it was great overall!

title: Excellent Customer Serviice
desc: The Singapore Grand Hyatt allowed me to change my visit dates with no penalty on the day of arrival after my wife had an accident and we were unable to continue with our trip. They were very understanding and helpful. Great customer service!

title: Very Disappointing. More a wedding venue which explains the local one time reviews
desc: Check in OK with big groups of locals getting ready for a big day of some sort. Wait longer than usual. 2 bedroom deluxe room is small and met with groans from family. The only reason we stayed here / apart from misplaced loyalty to Hyatt/ is its close to orchard rd. We now know that the MRT is so fast your hotel location doesn‚Äôt matter. Explorist level means ‚Ä¶ free water. Wow! Bed hard and u comfortable Gym - fine but guarded by a rude incompetent old woman who didn‚Äôt know their own rules and so turned my son away despite the manager confirming later his age was allowed with an adult present. I almost gave a 3 due to a great concierge but I‚Äôve been to generous to inadequate places recently and the prices these places charge demands better service

title: Do not recommend
desc: This hotel is old and in dire need of remodeling. The rooms are not cleaned properly and then customer service is horrible. The location is the only plus. My laundry was taken without me asking and laundered. I had to hide my laundry for housekeeping.

title: Great Place To Stay In Singapore
desc: If you need a great place to stay in Singapore you could do a lot worse than the Grand Hyatt on Scotts Road. The location makes the entire city easily accessible. In addition, the staff went out of their way to take care of me during my stay. The rooms are comfortable and clean. I was confined to my room during the first seven days due to Covid quarantine rules and it was never a problem due to the diligence of the staff and their great room service. Once the quarantine period was finished access to everything in Singapore was easy due to the MRT, bus stops, and the hotel taxi stand. Bus and MRT are very close to the hotel. I have been coming to Singapore off and on since 1988 and this, by far was the best experience yet. I can't say enough good things about the Hyatt.

title: Poor reception service
desc: Arrived at hotel after a long and delayed flight and was served by 1 of 3 reception staff. I was the only guest checking in at about 7am and yet service was not quite expected from a Hyatt hotel. Staff was not warm nor welcoming and "processed" my check in mechanically. Could have been a robot. üôÑ

title: Idea location
desc: The hotel is really clean and the lobby is so immaculate. I stayed in a King room overlooking the main road. The staff was amazing and the room was great. But I just love the location. Walking distance to Newton Hawker center (15 min in heat, you can make this call on your own), 2 food courts, 2 movie theatres, and the Orchard MRT.

title: Racist, Poor & terrible Services
desc: Was staying in Jr.Suite room no 936 at Grand Hyatt singapore from 18th May to 20th May-22. Experience was terrible to stay in Grand Hyatt. one of their employee (Surya) has passed a racial comment while i was having breakfast and the top management admitted the same. The hotel management is full of ego & attitude and they will try to avoid meeting guests staying in hotel. I requested to meet Mr. Praveen (Manager) at Grand Hyatt Singapore but after making several request, he continued to make excuses for 3 days to avoid hearing the problem. room was ok, services was ok but there are many hotels at this range with much good services guests friendly than grand Hyatt. I am sure, if you will stay at Grand Hyatt Singapore then be ready to hear racist comment & terrible behavior from

title: Great Grand Hyatt
desc: Great service at Grand Hyatt Singapore. The team at the club floor were so friendly and hospitable. Thanks to Careen, Charles, Robert, Norman and Thanis. The breakfast was fantastic! Kudos to Yan Peng, Ivy, Githa, Siva. The team made this stay a delight !

title: Two Bedrooms Grand Deluxe highly recommended for family!
desc: Stay here on May 25-27, 2022 room 822. Book for Two Bedrooms Grand Deluxe, a great choice for me who travel with my husband, mom and mom in law. Super spacious 2 bedrooms with living room and working desk and small 'pantry' area. 1 bathroom inside master bedroom. And 1 closet with washtafel provided near the living room.. Balmain amenities are nice. Superb location. MRT is only walking distance ( 3 minutes walk ). Very convenient area too for my 78 yo Mom in law and 65 yo Mom to go shopping around. Will definitely comeback. My last stay was in March 2018 and all the great service are still the same. Homey home !

title: Not what it used to be
desc: Asked someone to help me open my $300 bottle of wine, they sent someone who is not trained I suppose? Broke the cork all inside my bottle! My room was extremely hot! We called someone and he fixed it and later at 2 am the same thing happened. Very disappointed. On my last stay I was locked outside my room, went up and down 3X they changed my key and still didn‚Äôt work, they kept saying someone is on the way (for 40 min) l. Not expected out of Hyatt. Hyatt singapore is not what it used to be. We have been Hyatt guests in singapore for more then 20 years and always felt like home, but now we don‚Äôt.

title: Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: Hotel with great location, exactly few steps away from ion, takashimaya breakfast has lot of choices, and nice local taste as well The problem was the bed, it is just like an old bed that becomes too soft

title: Wonderful stay eat Grand Hyatt
desc: Lovely hotel with excellent and caring staff. They even remember our pillow choice nd other special needs to be placed in the room.The local food at the Straits Kitchen is amazing. There spread for breakfast, lunch and dinner is very good. Great location, less than 2 mins walk to Orchard Road. Will miss staying in the hotel till it opens up after renovation and refurbishment.

title: Fantastic customer service
desc: Visit this hotel especially after the renovations are finished ( currently a little tired but still good) the cleanliness is top quality and the rooms large with good air con ( you need it) but it‚Äôs the service from the concierge and reception staff that sets this apart led by the Manager Parveen the team were so courteous and helpful it made the holiday run like a well oiled machine especially the taxis where all our bookings were less than 5 mins and cheap ( less than 20 dollars to city)

title: Anniversary Staycation
desc: My husband and I decided on an impromptu stay and settled for a city hotel in Orchard area for convenience. Even before our stay begin, we experienced issues with the reservation hotline. 1) Our call were not answered the first few times we called in and even emails were left not replied. 2) Reservation was not very helpful when we requested for simple cake for our anniversary,we were told that they need to check on availabilty and that we should ask on the day of arrival? Thankfully, the stay itself was good. The room was nice and comfortable however we kept having issues with the TV. Service by the staff we met was good and efficient.

title: Still and excellent hotel
desc: Despite some people saying the hotel looks outdated, I found the Grand Hyatt still a good vacation place I can call home. The deluxe king room I stayed in was specious. Everyone I conversed with were friendly

title: Best Room in Singapore
desc: We stayed for 2night 16-18 May short trip with 3 family member. We came for check in a little bit early around 12:00noon but the lady during our arrival said the room is ready and has been prepare for us. Once we enter the room it was clean, very comfortable and big! They also put our name on the TV screen (how sweet!) amenities was superb. Breakfast was also amazing and check out process was smooth!

title: Sunday brunch is a waist of money and time as a vegetarian
desc: As a family of 5 we had a Sunday brunch at Mezze9. For a ticket price of S$ 186/pax we at least expected ample buffet choice for a vegetarian. The drinks were OK, but a cheese platter with crackers, some stir fried veggies and fried rice didn‚Äôt balance the bill. To claim a 1st class brunch, you might expect the chef to cater for vegetarians. You could complement it with some macaroons, ice and a crumble cake, but that‚Äôs it. Very, very poor menu and discriminating vegetarians. So forget and skip this brunch if you are a vegetarian.

title: The food is excellent but the room is old model
desc: The breakfast is excellent and the food is tasty. We stay in 2 king deluxe room for 3 days. The rooms are big but are old fashion . Room 709 is smell with ciggarete smoke. I asked to change the room but it full booked for that day so we got it in the next day. Overall is okay except the 709 room .

title: Grand Hyatt - back on its feet
desc: Continue to maintain the high standards of safety, cleanliness and servie. Missed some of its well known facilities like swimming pool. We hope the renovation and upgading proess is completed in time and hotel gets a new look

title: Under renovation - avoid until completed
desc: Grand Hyatt Singapore is a fine hotel and I am a long term user. Due to restauration, early morning European arrival means no waiting at pool, gym or SPA. Also Club Room pointless, club is largely closed.

title: Hyatt under renovation
desc: The hotel is being renovated and so no pool, temporary airless carpeted ex- meeting room gym, no bar. My deluxe King room was very tired smelt of smoke, with no coffee machine and wonky light switches. I could have moved room but on a short stay its not worth the repacking and hassle When u complain the staff will point out that the website says the renovation is underway. The room prices are to same as the Four Seasons and similar. But the facilities at the competition are much better As a returning and once frequent guest and a rewards member they have lost a regular customer‚Ä¶will stay elsewhere in the future When i told them all i got was a promise it will be better after the renovation, and a feeling that they really dont care Very poor, take my advice and stay

title: Great Stay at Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: Feels like I'm home. Great tiptop service from Concierge: Faisal, Hartini, Tiara, Rezal, Faris, Yunus, Hairul. Front Office: Shafiqah & Fadillah. Rooms are spacious and big! Awesome breakfast at Straits Kitchen. Amenities was good! Small gesture at its best. Valet was good and seemless.

title: Great straits kitchen team.
desc: Housekeeping needs improvement. Dust everywhere- sofa, pillow, corner of the room, hair dryer. (Was not switch off). Straits kitchen team (esp chef thiruna, Mr Othman Said) made me rate 5 stars. üëçüëç Both gentlemen often checking on our food.(with my elderly parents)

title: Staycation
desc: Room was excellent as always just that TV keep having no signal. Service always up to expectation except for reservation hotline. Overall it was a great stay and will definitely come back again. Good location as well.

title: Usual very high standard
desc: I've stayed at the Grand Hyatt many times It's in a great location, very high quality staff from Reception to House Keeping (this was so unintrusive) I always eat out so no comment there BRIX was BRIX - good but very loud band

title: Under Renovation
desc: Staff very professional and friendly. Food very good. Pool, Spa, Gym, Oasis and Pete's Place restuarants, & Martini Bar all closed for renovation. Overall the property felt like a Hyatt Regency service level at Grand Hyatt pricing. Good location for shopping, transportation, and nearby restuarants.

title: Very good service & friendly staff
desc: I stayed with 2 toddlers and the staff is very helpful to prepare activities for kids. Eventhough hotel was under renovation, no pool & no kids club, but a little books & crayon in our room is very thoughtful.

title: As Accomodating As It Gets
desc: Covid or no Covid, Grand Hyatt Singapore always manages to do better than one's last trip. How wonderful the hotel is I have said in great lengths before in my previous reviews, so will keep it short and simple here. Our Grand Hyatt Singapore experience was special in two aspects: one, the Lounge/Club staff and two, their handling of our stay during us catching covid. The latter was exceptionally handled, led by one of the Duty Managers Jennifer Asuncion. The former was made very welcoming by Careen Gan and her staff including Thinis. And of course Chef Man whose cooking was simply a welcome overdose of flavours. My wife and I have some specific dietary ‚Äî gluten-free, lactose-free, alcohol-free ‚Äî requirements, and finding food was a bit hard for us this time in Singapore.

title: Home Away From Home
desc: Luxurious and comfortable. Friendly customer service. Excellent varieties of buffet breakfast but would be nice to change the varieties every once a week. Gran Club Lounge is a pleasure to behold but would be even better if happy hour is extended longer (currently 6 to 8 pm).

title: Dated, Noisy and a bit Skanky....Renovations Can't come soon enough
desc: Stayed here for 3 nights as part of a business trip. Was not aware that the hotel was undergoing partial rennovation whilst we were staying there, and would have booked elsewhere had I known. The Good -Rooms are clean (but very dated), very spacious, almost like a junior suite with separate living room and bedroom -Location is smack in the middle of Orchard so all the best shopping is within walking distance The Bad -Construction at the lobby not the nicest welcome -Restaurant is famous for local Singaporean food and is very popular with non-hotel guests, at the detriment of hotel guests....you have to book your time for breakfast, didn't bother -There is a VERY trashy nightclub underneath the hotel (hotel guest get in for free) that really isn't on brand for a Grand Hyatt to

title: Recommend staying here
desc: Recommend staying here - The location of the hotel is absolutely perfect and staying here is never a disappointment ‚Äì from the friendly staff to the gorgeous rooms ‚Äì one of the best locations in Singapore!

title: Layover
desc: We had a 22 hrs layover in Singapore and was so glad to have chosen to stay at the grand Hyatt. We initially looked at the Andaz in Singapore but they were out of the rooms that we needed. Luckily the grand Hyatt had rooms that accommodated our party. The complimentary breakfast and tea time was over the top. The staffs were so nice to help us book our ride to the airport and we managed to sneak in some sight seeing before we left Singapore. It made the long layover planned...

title: Excellent stay at the Grand hyatt
desc: Staffs are very nice and very helpful. Their rooms are bigger than regular room size and housekeeping staffs clean the room properly. Rooms are very clean and enough lighting. Food is sumptuous and delicious. Their buffet breakfast is just too good. I will come back again whenever in Singapore and would recommend this hotel to anyone. This is my own personal opinion. title: excellent service
desc: Perfect for family vacation as well as business. Got complimentary on wifi, water bottle and specially suit upgrade. Could have been much better if all the remodel is done. Definitely will come back in the near future.

title: Mr Johan S
desc: nice location & breakfast , but I was surprised you dont have Pork Beacon & Sausages diffrent than usually Grand Hyatt's other places. Lift security to going Up to the room, you dont have it but overall is Good

title: Not as expected
desc: This is my first stay in Grand Hyatt due to business trip, and i have to say this first stay had highly disappoint me. The hotel is highly overrated with the price its charge. 1) The room condition is very old. The cleanliness wasn't expected, wasn't really the cleaner fault, but truly the hotel itself are already fairly old. There is even some unpleasant smell in the hotel, corridor. The lighting and furniture doesn't seem to be under well-maintenance. The details wasn't being well taken care of. ( PS: The cleaner herself is very friendly) 2. Construction happening during the stay, most the facilities are still not open. Understand they are imperfection on the details sometimes, but with the price it pay, the standard is definitely not there. Its a real disappointed stay.

title: It‚Äôs in need a major modernization.
desc: The hotel is very dated. Instead of first starting with the rooms, the hotel owners are upgrading areas such as the spa, pool and conference rooms. Profit focused over customer focus. The breakfast buffet is nothing spectacular 100% self service, and also needs a vast improvement to be up to the level of other Grand Hyatt hotels world wide. Care is not taken and it‚Äôs not a customer centric experience.

title: GRAND HYATT SINGAPORE
desc: Grand Hyatt Singapore is a fantastic place to stay for both business and family. With shops and restaurants nearby the hotel, you will not get disappointed with your stay. Currently, renovation work is going on but I felt all the warm service, consistency, and kindness by all the staff members at hotel throughout my stay really offset limitation of access to facilities. I could have stayed at another hotel but I am glad I chose Grand Hyatt for my destination to stay.

title: Staycation at Grand Hyatt
desc: Booked the 2 bedroom deluxe for my family‚Äôs staycation. Room is spacious and comfortable. My main gripe was that the room smelt musty whenever I raised the room temperature beyond 22 degrees. Didn‚Äôt expect that from a premium hotel, honestly. As hotel is currently undergoing renovations, pool is not available, but there‚Äôs a lot of things to explore around the area. Check in process was pretty fuss free, I booked a slot via their chatbot prior to arriving. Room wasn‚Äôt ready and they brought us up to the lounge for complimentary snacks and drink which was a really nice gesture. Kids were entertained the moment they got there with an activity book and crayons! I thought checkin queue instructions could be clearer as during the time I was there, there were 2 queues and the staff

title: Spouse Birthday
desc: Immaculate experience From check-in to check-out The people, the service, room, facilities, f&b and location, I couldn't ask for more. Happy wife = happy life. The pillow!!! Yes, that was quite a slumber I had....

title: Love Hyatt
desc: Third time staying there and still love it. The room rate has increased a lot since covid. I used points to book which was really good value. They upgraded us to a Junior suite . Room Quality is very good. Breakfast was excellent. many options for Asian food.

title: spacious hotel
desc: i do always stay here every time my visit to SG, most spacious hotel room near orchard. the restaurant breakfast food was just so good! and the pete a place italy restaurant was so yummy too unfortunately because the hotel is under renovation that was closed. cant wait to stay again next with the new renovated Hotel! see you on 2023!

title: Grand Hyatt Singapore a grand old lady
desc: The hotel is currently closing and will reopen in 2013 after a full make over. Rooms are large and suites exceptional. Plenty of lifts, club floor and staff excellent, Location is good with easy access to the tube, major shopping areas as well as discount malls. Breakfast and lunch or dinner is not to be missed with a variety of local cuisine exceptionally well presented. The use of robots in the restaurant's to assist staff is both a novelty and work well. Beds exceptionally comfortable as are the pillows on offer. A well established grand old hotel the upgrades planned to be finished in 2013 will make this hotel even more desirable than it currently is.

title: Great Hotel
desc: Rooms are a bit tired, but are soon to be renovated. Room sizes are excellent. Service is super. Location is super. During my visit most of the F and B outlets were closed for renovation, and this is a problem, but a temporary problem.

title: grand hyatt singapore
desc: the room are old. need total renovation. cleanliness of the room not so well maintained. they need total renovation of the room. location are perfect but housekeeping do not well clean the room. overall we are dissapointed for the price we paid.

title: Expensive & Lack Facilities & Hotel operator unfriendly voice
desc: Rate was too expensive. Renovation works annoying. The hotel club was noisy, Very crowded dining hall & lack fresh air. The breakfast food options not so adventurous, Hotel operator did not sound friendly & always reluctant to entertain request. The lobby interior decorator out of date. The crowds beyond were control blocking front entry.

title: PASMISS 2022
desc: Great arrangements for business meeting. I will recommend this hotel for great business meetings. The rooms were great, very clean and very well maintained. The conference venues were very well managed.

title: Great location
desc: We chose Grand Hyatt for our first time back in Singapore because of the size of the rooms and we weren‚Äôt disappointed. I liked having a separate sitting area to relax and chat after a long day of shopping, sightseeing. The walk in wardrobe and spacious bathroom was also great. It‚Äôs location next to orchard road was the top reason also for choosing grand Hyatt. I also like the breakfast buffet assortment - the pancakes are so yummy. Would love to be back here again.

title: Great location
desc: Hotel staff very accommodating. It‚Äôs location is very near malls, underpass, MTR. Other than on-going renovation noise, everything else was great. Would have been better if rooms had coffee and tea service like before in their other locations.

title: Warning about the loud music from the club.
desc: I don't often write reviews but wish I had know about the night club music. We had stayed here before but this time our room was in the building above the brix night club and we could hear the bass until 1 or 2am each night. If you are hoping to find a place to have a nice restful sleep I recommend you find another hotel. Reception didn't seem to care too much either. We were planning to stay here again on our return through Singapore but will look for another place to stay and don't plan to return to this Hyatt property. Rooms are spacious but need to be renovated which is happening (loud construction most of the day).

title: Stay in July 2022
desc: The Front Office Manager has been helpful and attentive to my requests. The overall hotel and room condition is expected to improve after the renovation. There were a few broken items in the room during my stay, and only two restaurants were available for breakfast. It was a bit noisy (but tolerable) in the daytime. The upside is that the location is very convenient with lots of shopping malls and good restaurants nearby, and the room is very spacious.

title: Family Staycation
desc: Experience inconsiderate travellers who did heavy cooking in the room causing our room to be filled with cooking smell. Thanks to hyatt fronts desk manager who acted promptly to our request to change our room.

title: The Hyatt delivers
desc: The Grand Hyatt is always excellent. Great rooms , great service , great staff and great food. It is also in such a great location - very central to everything and easy to commute to most places. i highly recoomend staying there

title: Starting to feel dated, but still decent
desc: Location is very close to Orchard Road, which has extensive shopping and eating options within 2 mins walk. Rooms are large and have lots of complimentary bottled water and everything you would expect. Wifi was an acceptable speed. They are, however, pretty dated and seem to be designed by someone who never thought about their use - magnifying mirror is mounted way too low, arbitrary arrangement of furniture, etc. There is a lot of refurbishment happening and some restaurants are closed. Also, you may hear construction noise during the day, but it wasn‚Äôt an issue at night

title: Great Day with Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: Excellent vacation provided by Grand Hyatt Singapore. Staff are extremely helpful during the entire stay despite they are under going car park and some renovation. We'll plan our next vacation back with Grand Hyatt Singapore.

title: Hyatt review
desc: An older hotel that needs an renovation. The bed was very hard but the bathroom was luxurious. No hot water in the shower though. Hyatt need to check everything in every room to keep the rooms up to date. No smart tv

title: Excellent hospitality
desc: The room was great with the friendly staffs able to assist at any time during the stay. The location of the hotel is excellent and easily accessible to public transportation. The breakfast offerings are also great and can cater to almost everyone.

title: Style, friendliness and great service
desc: This hotel is well located -close enough to Orchard Road and Orchard MRT. One of the key features of this hotel is the Straits Kitchen - one of the very best hotel breakfast buffets and dinner buffets. Particularly it caters very well for vegetarians especially with the Indian menu. There are great food options from Chinese, to Western with a great selection of local favourites.

title: Globalist Experience
desc: Booked for one night using points. Upgrade: comp upgrade to king club access, they claim this is the junior suite reserved for suite upgrades. The layout is like a suite as it has two rooms, one for the bed and the other to lounge Room: had snacks and fridge full of complimentary drinks. Spacious room with Balmain shampoo, conditioner, shower gel. Lounge: serves wine, hard liquor, and beer for cocktail hour. Also had really good food, opted for the sushi and it was tasty. Breakfast: globalist breakfast served at the straits restaurant on ground floor. Lots of food options, laksa was tasty. Conclusion: great location, generous lounge offerings, and breakfast at straits restaurant was delicious. Minus one star as the hotel and rooms are pretty dated, lots of carpet.

title: Very nice and big room
desc: The room is big, dedicated living room, work desk area and bedroom. Nice to work inside the room. Dedicated bath tub, very enjoyable. the location is convenient, 5 mins walk to Ion shopping mall and MRT station. Overall is good.

title: Excellent Service!
desc: I held my wedding lunch at the Grand Hyatt Singapore. The hotel staff did all that they could to ensure that it was a great success. My 3D2N stay at the hotel thereafter was excellent, with nearly all my needs ‚Äî ranging from amenities to porterage ‚Äî attended to. I‚Äôd recommend the Grand Hyatt Singapore to anyone searching for a venue to hold their wedding banquet!

title: No Grand Hyatt staff effort for the Grand Hyatt Singapore customer
desc: A catastrophic non-interest of the staff starting from not following requests for the hotel limousine airport-hotel, reserving the room for one person only for USD 600 despite several reminders for two, refusing to serve two breakfasts, not system-accepting the credit card payment in the hotel bar. Everything in the hotel looked very pesimistic and shabby.

title: Singapore is hot - AC!
desc: The hotel was under renovations, and the AC was not working in the whole lobby area (expansive) or in the main dining room. Sucks to have breakfast sweating. The hotel did not flag this, and when I raised it, they said so sorry. Not good enough.

title: Decent stay.
desc: Very nice, met all my expectations. Will definitely come back once all the renovations are completed. The gym was downsized for the time being due to construction going on. Restrooms around the lobby area are nonexistent or either well hidden as I could not find them.

title: Recent stay at Grand Hyatt Singapore
desc: Excellend services and room as always. Very spacious and clean room with fresh scent all around. Hassle free travel whenever I'm staying at any Hyatt hotel including this one. Highly recommended for any travellers and also for family staycation too! Not to mention its valud for money as well given its location at Orchard the main shopping street.

title: Grand Hyatt SINGAPORE
desc: While this hotel is due for closure for renovation, the experience was very positive, the staff are superb and the facilities that were not already under renovation were excellent. The location is central and convenient.

title: Grand hyatt Business as usual
desc: fentastic experience after two years of gape.. the courteous staff recognised me and i was really touched .One of my favorite hotels. Incredibly friendlystaff , treat you like family as I was a regular guest. the Grand Club lounge is out of this world.Everyone is amazing here , full of energy !! Special thanks to the Hotel Director Mr Timothy Parr for his promptness and recognising my long relation and loyalty. Truly a fantastic Experience, feel at home.

title: A home away from home
desc: Staycation is still so relevant even when the world is opening up. There is a need for busy working moms like myself to get a break from both work and home tasks and to just rest without any disturbances. Grand Hyatt's hospitality facilitates that. Comfy bed, clean room, amazing toilet (bath tub and bidet!) and it's location on Orchard Road where the best food can be found. The hotel staffs were helpful too. I think I called Room Service a few times for help and they came within minutes! I truly appreciate that. Will I come here again for a quick break and to recharge? YES

title: Great stay, great location
desc: My second time staying in this hotel. Price is better to do an upgrade when checking in time, lady who assist suggested it. Love this hotel very much, sleep was great, I slept through the night. Everything was in order.

title: Grand Hyatt
desc: Food and beverage could have been better. Hotel was very clean. The shower in room leaked out from underneath the glass door. Room cleaning was excellent, Again, food was not explained right. They show drinks are available 24 hours and they are not. Also, the bed was the hardest thing I sleep on.

title: Great location and huge room
desc: Love the location, just walking distance to favorite shopping area, restaurants and others, and room size are big. Got upgraded almost every time I stay here. The staff are nice and helpful. Will come back again

title: Great Location in Singapore
desc: Centrally Located with very good service and amenities. Probably more veggie options required in Lounge and Room Service menus. Lots of shopping and restaurants in the vicinity. Ideal place to stay. Lounge has a great ambience.

title: Very disappointing
desc: (I wrote this review in another web property) At one point this was likely a great property that provided a great hotel experience. On this stay it was unfortunately not. It wasn‚Äôt the noise from construction and repair activity (which I had expected and the fact that my room was on a high enough floor that the noise was not audible), but the general dilapidated nature of the room fixtures (bathroom, etc) that made it a relatively unpleasant (for the money spent) experience. In addition the lobby without seating (ie couches etc) made it look like a deserted hotel. This hotel, being in such a nice location, has a lot of potential. I highly recommend an ‚Äúactive‚Äù lobby with music, preferably a lobby bar, sufficient seating area etc. As a very frequent visitor to Singapore I had

title: 1N2D STAY BIRTHDAY CELEBRATION
desc: It was my 3rd stay and it is still Excellente ! The purpose of writing this letter is to compliment your hotel and your staff for making it such a comfortable stay at your hotel. Especially Miss Charisce. I would like to compliment her for being so professional. With smile on her face, she has been really impressive in her service. I will surely come back to your hotel after the makeover.

title: Great
desc: Great location, great breakfast, great showers and beds - loved it. At check in they were super fast and the room was generously sized etc. Breakfast in the morning was a buffet which was very good. Proximity to all shopping was amazing

title: Living Up To Its Name
desc: There are lots of things that made our stay a grand one, and the check-in wasn‚Äôt part of it. There was some delay in their so-called final check of the room, although we arrived at almost 3 PM, and was told that the room was ready, but needed final checking. We got a 1-bedroom suite, and I‚Äôm not sure if that‚Äôs how they call the room though. But it was spacious and with good amenities, provided lots of bottled water and a complimentary mini bar with just the right selection of drinks and snacks. We stayed for five nights, and that meant five comfortable nights on comfy beds and good air conditioning. Breakfasts were orderly, not so busy, clean, and had a beautiful ambiance with varied, delicious selections. The bathroom was likewise spacious with good amenities and lighting. We

title: Very pleased, will return.
desc: Service was great, room was clean and comfortable, food from Straits Kitchen (in-room service and buffet) was excellent. Every staff touchpoint was pleasant and friendly. We look forward to returning again.

title: Great and consistently good service
desc: One of my favorite hotels. Incredibly friendly and helpful staff and they treat you like family once they recognize that you are regular guest. The service at the executive lounge is out of this world. Lucia, Lee and team are unbelievable!!

title: One of the great hotel in Orchard area.
desc: I have been coming to Grand Hyatt since more than 15 years. It started to show its age. The hotel is a bit outdated and in need of renovation. We'll, Last week when we stayed there, it's already began the renovation, which mean they are going to be closed for a while and for us, there's a but inconveniences when we stayed there such as noises, smells that are not supposed to be there. But overall it's still Grand Hyatt, great staff, very clean, and location is the best. I cannot wait to be back when they finish their renovation.

title: Birthday staycation
desc: Im here in singapore to celebrate my 30th birthday and i stayed here in grand hyatt hotel the room is excellent very spacious and the check in was very smooth all the staff are very accomodating i will for sure come back.

title: Perfect stay for business trips
desc: Clean and large rooms, great customer service and professional, helpful staff, and one of the best locations in Singapore. I needed to adjust my stay during check-in and it went smoothly with the front desk lady.

title: Avoid if your light sleeper
desc: We stayed at Grand Hyatt Singapore for 3 nights and didn't sleep at all for 3 nights. The music from the night club was very loud and the bass was thumping and could be heard on our room on the 8th floor.

title: Superb experience
desc: We celebrated our daughter's birthday here. Staff were warm, friendly and hospitable. Service was excellent. Place was clean and spacious. We just loved the entire experience. I have asked my daughter to book us another vacation here as soon as possible.

title: Wonderful location
desc: The hotel closes this week (9/16/22 I believe) and I cannot wait to see the new and improved. It is a wonderful property with excellent service and great food and beverage. The bot is telling me I have to write more, but since the comments will not be applicable to the newly renovated property, I have no further comments. ;-)

title: Not honest management
desc: Do not inform in the reservation hotel closure. Still Receiving the guest on Sept 15, while they want to total close the hotel at 3 pm on Sept 16. But they did not mention in the reservation. They must tell the customer in their website. Very bad experience

title: Very nice experience, but with need of renovation (that will happen soon)
desc: Amazing experience in general. Amazingly spacious rooms, simple but cool. The food (breakfast and events catering) was excellent, to say the minimum. However, it's a bit aged, the pool was not available and the gym was set in a temporary space, and the room had a smell issue probably from the bathroom. Hopefully this all will be fixed after the renovation about to happen soon. I look forward to another opportunity of staying there after the renovation.

title: Good service but can't wait for renovations!
desc: Stayed here 4 times in its last few months pre renovation, including on its last week. I do like the hotel and the staff. I like the nice big rooms. I like how the price point adjusted for its age and closure of faculties. But it definiteley needs a much welcome overhaul and renovation. I also wonder if they will redesign the actual layout to be more 'grand'. Hoping that when I return in January the rooms remain spacious but modernized. Hopefully the back tower no longer feels like an old office block! Pros - checkin staff is excellent. I like the welcome back and somehow they gave me the same room each time - location is excellent if you want to be in Orchard, with good MRT connectivity. - the rooms are a great size for Singapore standards Cons - all the aforementioned

title: Wonderful trip at Singapore heart.
desc: Thanks to Jeffery to the front desk. I arrived at the hotel with a burned out body and mind. He quickly arrange the room and meal for me to have a nice rest and prepare for the days in Singapore. Thanks to all staff and cooks in the Ground floor restaurant. Thanks Anna for her service of hot coffees. Special thanks to all the cooks serving omelette. Coffee with eggs are alllllways a fresh start of my day. Thanks to all staffs at lounge. Special thanks for Charlie and Yuyao's warm service. Nice Champaign service! Champaign for the renovation and the coming grand opening! Looking forward to have a new experience next year there.

title: Great service
desc: Attentive staff. Overall staying experience is great despite the dusty car park. There was alternate car park arrangement which was awesome. Location is definitely strategic. Room is clean and with full amenities.
